Bundle.properties

66
OmegaT ran out of memory, and will quit when you press OK.
OmegaT内存耗尽，将会在点击“确定”后退出。

lenovo
Bundle.properties

67
You may try to solve this problem in one of the following ways:
可尝试使用下列方法解决此问题：

钢
Bundle.properties

68
1) Reduce the number of source files and translate in batches;
1)减少原文数量并分批进行翻译；

lenovo
Bundle.properties

69
2) Increase the amount of memory available to OmegaT, by
specifying "java -Xmx<size-in-MB>M -jar OmegaT.jar" on the
command line or in the OmegaT start script;
The current setting is {0}MB;
2)通过在命令行或 OmegaT 启动脚本中指定 "java -Xmx<size-in-MB>M -jar OmegaT.jar" 增加 OmegaT 的可用存；                                                        当前设置为 {0} 兆字节

lenovo
Bundle.properties

70
See "Chapter 3.
查阅用户手册“第3章”

钢

Installing and running OmegaT" in the User Manual.
用户手册的《安装运行 OmegaT》章节。

钢
Bundle.properties

76
Your project does not contain any files in a supported file format.
项目中所有的文件格式都为不可支持的格式

lenovo
Bundle.properties

77
(In the user's manual, see 'Files to translate' > 'File formats' for a list of supported file formats.)
To add files to the project, click on the Copy Files to Source Folder... button in the Project Files window or call this action from the Project menu and select the source files you want to copy.
（在用户手册中，查阅”要翻译的文件“>”文件格式“,了解所支持的文件格式列表）要想向项目中添加文件的话，可以在"项目文件"窗口中点击“复制文件到原文目录”或者从“项目”菜单中进行该操作，并选择要复制的原文文件。

lenovo
Bundle.properties

78
You may also copy the files to your project's 'source' folder using your favorite file manager and reload the project by calling Reload from the Project menu.
也可以使用自己喜欢的文件管理工具将文件拷贝到项目的 'source' 文件夹，然后通过调用主菜单的 项目 -> 重新载入 重新载入项目。

钢
Bundle.properties

441
The language code should be in the form xx-YY, xxx-YY, xx_YY or xxx_YY, where 
xx or xxx is the language code and YY is the region or country code (optional).
语种代码应该以 xx-YY 或 xx_YY的形式输入，其中 xx 是语言代码而 YY 是地区或国家代码（可选）。

flycr
Bundle.properties

495
Scope:
The scope of a search is by default the project and can be set to be any files located in a specified folder hierarchy.
范围：
搜索的默认范围是本项目文件，也可以设置为指定目录下的其他文件

flycr
Bundle.properties

496
Project searches are by default performed on the source and target, reference TMs, glossaries, notes and comments of the project.
项目搜索默认将搜索源文和译文、引用的翻译记忆库、术语表、注释及项目中的评论。

flycr
Bundle.properties

497
Types:
Exact searches match the whole search string.
类型：
精确搜索将完美匹配输入的字符串。

flycr
Bundle.properties

498
Keyword searches match all the space-separated keywords regardless of their order.
关键字搜索匹配所有以空格隔开的关键词，顺序不限。

flycr
Bundle.properties

499
Regular expression searches match Java regular expressions as documented in the user manual.
正则表达式搜索匹配Java正则表达式结果，请参阅相关用户手册。

flycr
Bundle.properties

500
Wildcards:
Both exact and keyword searches support the wildcard characters * and ?.
通配符：精确搜索和关键字搜索均支持通配符 * 和 ?。

flycr
Bundle.properties

501
'*' matches zero or more characters ('run*' matches 'run', 'runs', and'running', etc.)
'?' matches exactly one character ('run?' matches 'runs' and 'rung', but not 'run' or 'running').
字符"*"匹配零个或任意数量个字符（例如'run*'将会匹配'run'、'runs'、'running'以及很多）
字符 '?' 匹配任何单个的字符（例如'run?' 将会匹配'runs' 和 'rung'，但是不匹配 'run' 或 'running'）

flycr
Bundle.properties

502
Text Replace:
The scope of a text replacement is the target segments of the project, whether they already have contents or not.
文本替换：
文本替换的范围是项目中的目标片段，不论其目前是否有内容

flycr
Bundle.properties

503
Keyword searches are not available in the search string.
您目前输入的内容无法进行关键字搜索。

flycr
Bundle.properties

504
When using regular expressions, the replacement string supports references to groups defined in the search string.
当您使用正则表达式时，您可以在正则表达式中定义组别并指定要替换内容的组别。

flycr
Bundle.properties

505
Use $n to refer to the nth group.
使用 $n 指定第n组。

flycr
Bundle.properties

DocBook
DocBook

钢
Bundle.properties

661
Note: DocBook files are recognized not only by file extension, but they also must have a DOCTYPE declaration: <!DOCTYPE book PUBLIC \"-//OASIS//DTD DocBook XML... for DocBook 4, or a Namespace: xmlns="http://docbook.org/ns/docbook" for DocBook 5
注意：DocBook 文件不仅仅根据文件扩展名判断。这些文件必须同时包括 DOCTYPE 声明： <!DOCTYPE book PUBLIC \"-//OASIS//DTD DocBook XML... （对于 DocBook 4），或者是 Namespace: xmlns="http://docbook.org/ns/docbook" （对于 DocBook 5）

About OmegaT

钢

726
Copyright © 2000-2018 Keith Godfrey, Maxym Mykhalchuk and others
未翻译

没有修改者
Bundle.properties

727
&License
许可证(&L)

puleiying
Bundle.properties

728
OmegaT is a free and open source multiplatform Computer Assisted Translation tool with fuzzy matching, translation memory, keyword search, glossaries, and translation leveraging into updated projects.
OmegaT 是一种免费开源的多平台计算机辅助翻译工具软件，它将模糊匹配、译法记忆、关键词搜索、术语表和译法杠杆等融合成了最新项目。

xulihang
Bundle.properties

729
OmegaT is the original work of Keith Godfrey.
OmegaT 最初的工作由 Keith Godfrey 完成。

钢
Bundle.properties

730
Didier Briel is the OmegaT project manager.
Didier Briel是OmegaT项目的经理。

xulihang

Bundle.properties

771
Here you may setup the source filename patterns of files the filter will process, customize the filenames of translated files, and select what encodings it will use for loading the file and saving its translated counterpart.
在此你可以设置过滤器使用的源文件的文件模式，自定义已译文件的文件名，并用来选择载入和保存已译副本的编码。

钢
Bundle.properties

772
Note: not all filters allow you to select an encoding.
注意：并非所有的过滤器允许选择某种编码。

776
View or edit file filters.
查看或编辑过滤器

钢
Bundle.properties

777
To edit what files in what encodings the filter will process, select the filter from the list and click Edit.
要想对某个过滤器以何种编码处理何种文件进行编辑，可以从列表中选中该过滤器然后点击编辑按钮。

钢
Bundle.properties

778
If the filter has any options, you may change them by clicking Options.
如果过滤器有可选项，你可以通过点击选项来改变它们。

puleiying
Bundle.properties

849
Segmentation Setup
片段分割设置

钢
Bundle.properties

850
Project Specific Segmentation Setup
项目特定的分段规则设置

钢
Bundle.properties

851
Note: All of the segmentation rule sets with a matching Language Pattern are applied in the given order.
注意：和匹配语言模式一起设置的分段规则集合将会以给出的顺序应用。

钢
Bundle.properties

852
Thus, for example, rules for Canadian French (FR-CA) should be higher than rules for French (FR.*), and higher than Default (.*) ones.
例如，为 Canadian French (FR-CA) 创建的规则优先级应该比为法语 (FR.*)创见规则的优先级要高，也比缺省规则(.*) 要高。

钢
Bundle.properties

853
Then while translating from Canadian French your project will use all the rules defined for all the language chain in the correct order.
当对加拿大法语进行翻译时，你的项目将会以正确的顺序使用所有语言链的规则定义。

钢

OmegaT is refused access to the system property containing

current folder will be used instead.
当前文件夹将作为替代。

Bundle.properties

1826
Test
测试

xulihang
Bundle.properties

1827
About <a0>OmegaT</a0> - introduction
关于 <a0>OmegaT</a0> - 介绍

钢
doc_src/AboutOmegaT.xml

1828
OmegaT highlights
OmegaT 特色

钢
doc_src/AboutOmegaT.xml

1829
<a0>OmegaT</a0> is a free multi platform Computer Aided Translation tool, with the following highlights:
<a0>OmegaT</a0>是一种免费的多平台计算机辅助翻译工具软件，具有以下特色功能：

Yujun Yin
doc_src/AboutOmegaT.xml

1830
<e0>Translation memory:</e0><a1> OmegaT</a1> stores your translations in a translation memory file.
<e0>译法记忆：</e0><a1> OmegaT</a1>将译文存储在译法记忆文件中。

Yujun Yin
doc_src/AboutOmegaT.xml

1831
At the same time, it can use memories files from previous translations for reference.
同时，OmegaT可以使用此前翻译的译法记忆文件作为翻译参考。

Yujun Yin
doc_src/AboutOmegaT.xml

1832
Translation memories can be very useful in a translation where there are numerous repetitions or reasonably similar segments of text.
如果译文中存在大量重复，或相似的句段，译法记忆文件可以有效提高效率。

Yujun Yin
doc_src/AboutOmegaT.xml

1833
OmegaT uses translation memories to store your previous translations and then suggest likely translations for the text you are currently working on.
OmegaT 使用译法记忆文件存储完成的翻译，然后根据您当前翻译的文本，给您提供相似的译文作为参考。

Yujun Yin
doc_src/AboutOmegaT.xml

1834
These translation memories can be very useful when a document that has already been translated needs to be updated.
如果您需要对已译文档进行更新，这些译法记忆可以有效提高效率。

Yujun Yin
doc_src/AboutOmegaT.xml

1835
Unchanged sentences are automatically translated, while updated sentences are shown with the translation of the most similar, older sentence.
文本中未发生变化的句子会进行自动翻译，而更新后的句子则会提供最相似的原有句段的译文以供参考。

Yujun Yin
doc_src/AboutOmegaT.xml

1836
Modifications to the original document are thus handled with greater ease.
这样，您可以轻松处理原文档中更新变化后的部分。

Yujun Yin
doc_src/AboutOmegaT.xml

1837
If you are supplied with previously created translation memories , for example by your translation agency or your client, OmegaT is able to use these as reference memories.
如果您手头有事先创建好的译法记忆文件，比如说是翻译公司或客户提供给您的译法记忆，OmegaT 也可以使用这些文件作为翻译参考。

Yujun Yin
doc_src/AboutOmegaT.xml

1838
OmegaT uses the standard tmx file format to store and access translation memories, which guarantees that you can exchange your translation material with other CAT applications supporting this file format.
OmegaT 使用标准 TMX 文件格式存储和访问译法记忆，保证您同其他支持 TMX 文件格式的 CAT 工具进行译法记忆交互。

Yujun Yin
doc_src/AboutOmegaT.xml

1839
<e0>Terminology management</e0>: Terminology management is important for translation consistency.
<e0>术语管理</e0>：术语管理对于译文的一致性至关重要。

Yujun Yin
doc_src/AboutOmegaT.xml

1840
OmegaT uses glossaries containing translations of single words or small phrases: a simplified bilingual dictionary for a specific domain.
OmegaT 的术语表包含单词或短语的翻译，即，术语表就是特定领域中的简易双语词典。

xulihang
doc_src/AboutOmegaT.xml

1841
For your reference, OmegaT displays the translation of any word that is both present in the segment and registered in the glossary.
当前句段中的单词如果存在于术语表中，OmegaT 就会显示出这个单词的译文，以供翻译参考。

xulihang
doc_src/AboutOmegaT.xml

1842
<e0>Translation process:</e0> Imagine having to translate something; from a single file to a folder containing subfolders each with a number of files in a variety of formats.
<e0>翻译处理：</e0>设想您需要进行翻译，需要翻译的可能是单个文件，也可能是一个文件夹，其中包含子文件夹以及许多种不同格式的文件。

Yujun Yin
doc_src/AboutOmegaT.xml

1843
When you let OmegaT know the files that you need to translate, it looks for the files it understands based on file filtering rules, recognizes the textual parts within them, splits up the text groups according to the segmentation rules, and displays the segments one by one so that you can proceed with the translation.
您可以通过设置选择需要翻译的文件，OmegaT可以通过文件过滤规则对文件进行查找，辨认文件中的文本部分，根据片段分割规则对文本进行分割，然后在编辑器中显示出待翻译的片段以供翻译。

Yujun Yin
doc_src/AboutOmegaT.xml

1844
OmegaT stores your translations and proposes possible translations from similar segments registered in the translation memory files.
未翻译

没有修改者
doc_src/AboutOmegaT.xml

1845
When you are ready to view the final product, you can export the translated files, open them in the appropriate application and view the translation in the final format...
如果您需要查看最终翻译成果，您可以导出已译文件，在相应的应用程序中打开，查看导出为最终格式的译文...

xulihang
doc_src/AboutOmegaT.xml

1846
Summary of chapters
章节摘要

Yujun Yin
doc_src/AboutOmegaT.xml

1847
This documentation is intended both as a tutorial and as a reference guide.
本文档为 OmegaT 的简易教程和参考指南。

Yujun Yin
doc_src/AboutOmegaT.xml

1848
Here is a short summary of the chapters and their contents.
以下是对各章节及其内容的简要说明。

Yujun Yin
doc_src/AboutOmegaT.xml

1849
<e0>Learn to use OmegaT in 5 minutes!:</e0> this chapter is intended as a quick tutorial for beginners as well as people who already know CAT tools, showing the complete procedure from opening a new translation project through to completing the translation.
<e0>5 分钟入门 OmegaT！：</e0>本章为针对初学者和已经了解 CAT 工具的用户的快速教程，本章中展示了完整的翻译过程，从打开一个全新的翻译项目，一直到完成整个翻译工作。

Yujun Yin
doc_src/AboutOmegaT.xml

1850
<e0>Installing and running OmegaT: </e0>this chapter is useful when you first begin using OmegaT.
<e0>安装运行 OmegaT：</e0>本章介绍您初次开始使用 OmegaT 需要了解的知识。

Yujun Yin
doc_src/AboutOmegaT.xml

1851
It contains the specific instructions on how to install OmegaT and run it on Windows, Mac OS X and Linux.
其中包含如何在 Windows、Mac OS X 和 Linux 操作系统上安装和运行 OmegaT 的具体操作说明。

Yujun Yin
doc_src/AboutOmegaT.xml

1852
For advanced users, the chapter describes the command line mode and its possibilities.
对于高级用户，本章还介绍了命令行模式和这种模式的功能。

Yujun Yin
doc_src/AboutOmegaT.xml

1853
<e0>The user interface</e0>,<e1>Main Menu and Keyboard Shortcuts</e1>: these two chapters are likely to be heavily consulted, since they explain the user interface of OmegaT and the functions available via the main menu and the keyboard shortcuts.
<e0>用户界面</e0>、<e1>主菜单和键盘快捷键</e1>：使用过程中主要查询的为这两章，其中介绍了 OmegaT 的用户界面，以及通过主菜单和键盘快捷键可调用的功能。

Yujun Yin
doc_src/AboutOmegaT.xml

1854
<e0>Project properties</e0>, <e1><a2>OmegaT</a2> Files and Folders:</e1> a project in the context of OmegaT is the piece of work that OmegaT as a CAT tool is able to handle.
<e0>项目属性</e0>、<e1><a2>OmegaT</a2> 文件和目录：</e1> 在 OmegaT 中，项目是指 OmegaT 作为一款 CAT 工具能够处理的工作单位。

Yujun Yin
doc_src/AboutOmegaT.xml

1855
This chapter describes the project properties, such as the source and target languages.
本章介绍了项目属性，如源语言和目标语言等。

Yujun Yin
doc_src/AboutOmegaT.xml

1856
The second of these chapters describes the various subfolders and files in a translation project and their role as well as other user and application files associated with OmegaT.
OmegaT 文件和目录章节介绍了翻译项目中不同的子目录和文件，阐述了这些子目录和文件的作用，以及其他 OmegaT 相关的用户和应用文件。

Yujun Yin
doc_src/AboutOmegaT.xml

1857
<e0>Editing field behavior:</e0> a short chapter describing how to set up the editing behavior of the segment being translated.
<e0>编辑域行为：</e0> 本章简要地介绍了如何设置正在翻译片段的编辑行为。

Yujun Yin
doc_src/AboutOmegaT.xml

1858
<e0>Working with plain text</e0> and <e1>Working with formatted text</e1>: these two chapters explain certain important points concerning texts to be translated, such as the encoding set (in the case of plain text files) and tag handling (in the case of formatted text).
<e0>使用纯文本</e0>和<e1>使用格式文本</e1>： 这两章节介绍了有关待翻译文本的重要事项，如编码集（纯文本文件）和标签处理（格式文本）。

Yujun Yin
doc_src/AboutOmegaT.xml

1859
<e0>Translation memories: </e0> explains the role of the various subfolders containing translation memories, and provides information on other important aspects relating to translation memories.
<e0>译法记忆：</e0> 本章介绍了包含译法记忆的各个子目录的作用，阐述了与译法记忆相关的其他重要信息。

Yujun Yin
doc_src/AboutOmegaT.xml

1860
<e0>Segmentation</e0>:translation memory tools work with textual units called segments.
<e0>片段分割</e0>：译法记忆工具软件处理的文本单元称作片段。

Yujun Yin
doc_src/AboutOmegaT.xml

1861
In OmegaT, segments can be based on paragraphs or on segmentation rules.
在 OmegaT 中，片段可根据段落或片段分割规则进行划分。

Yujun Yin
doc_src/AboutOmegaT.xml

1862
Paragraph segmentation is less frequently used, but can be useful in cases of so-called "creative" texts.
根据段落分割片段使用较少，但处理“创意类”文本时可提高翻译效率。

Yujun Yin
doc_src/AboutOmegaT.xml

1863
The rule-based segmentation is usually synonymous with sentence-based segmentation.
基于规则的片段分割通常就是指根据句子进行片段分割。

Yujun Yin
doc_src/AboutOmegaT.xml

1864
A number of rule sets are provided while additional rules can be defined by the user, as described in this chapter.
软件中已经内置一些规则设置，与此同时用户还可自定义其他规则，具体信息请见本章。

Yujun Yin
doc_src/AboutOmegaT.xml

1865
<e0>Searches</e0> and<e1> </e1><e2>Regular expressions</e2>: Searches in OmegaT can be as simple as "<e3>list segments with </e3><e4>the word 'kangaroo' ".
<e0>搜索</e0>和<e1> </e1><e2>正则表达式</e2>：OmegaT 的搜索非常简便，如“<e3>列出所有含有</e3><e4> 'kangaroo' 这个单词的片段”。

Yujun Yin
doc_src/AboutOmegaT.xml

1866
</e4> They can also be complex, allowing for instance to search for segments with two or more consecutive spaces.
</e4>也可以搜索复杂的关键词，如，支持搜索含有两个或更多连续空格的片段。

Yujun Yin
doc_src/AboutOmegaT.xml

1867
In this case the regular expression ^s^s+ would be used to find and list the offending segments.
为了完成上述搜索，需要用到正则表达式 ^s^s+ ，然后软件会列出所有相关的片段。

Yujun Yin
doc_src/AboutOmegaT.xml

1868
Regular expressions are also used extensively in the segmentation rules.
正则表达式还广泛地应用于片段分割规则中。

Yujun Yin
doc_src/AboutOmegaT.xml

1869
<e0>Dictionaries, Glossaries</e0>, <e1>Machine translation</e1> , <e2>Spellchecker, LanguageTool:</e2> OmegaT supports an extensive use of dictionaries and glossaries.
<e0>字典和术语表</e0>、<e1>机器翻译</e1>、<e2>拼写检查和语言工具：</e2> OmegaT 支持字典和术语表工具。

xulihang
doc_src/AboutOmegaT.xml

1870
If an Internet connection is available, various MT services such as Google Translate and Microsoft Translator can be used from within OmegaT.
如果连接到互联网，OmegaT 还可连接机器翻译服务，如谷歌翻译和 Microsoft Translator。

Yujun Yin
doc_src/AboutOmegaT.xml

1871
If spell checking is activated, spelling mistakes and typos are recognized and can be corrected during translation.
如果启用拼写检查功能，翻译过程中 OmegaT 即会辨认拼写错误和错别字并进行修改。

Yujun Yin
doc_src/AboutOmegaT.xml

1872
The open source LanguageTool can be used to correct common grammatical and stylistic mistakes.
开源语言工具可用于纠正常见的语法和风格错误。

Yujun Yin
doc_src/AboutOmegaT.xml

1873
<e0>Miscellanea</e0>: deals with other issues of interest, such as how to avoid losing data.
<e0>杂项</e0>：介绍其他相关事项，如何避免丢失数据，等。

Yujun Yin
doc_src/AboutOmegaT.xml

1874
<e0>Appendices</e0> contain the following information
<e0>附录</e0>中包含以下信息

Yujun Yin
doc_src/AboutOmegaT.xml

1875
<e0>OmegaT on the web:</e0> information regarding on-line OmegaT resources
<e0>OmegaT 网络资源：</e0>介绍有关 OmegaT 在线资源的信息

Yujun Yin
doc_src/AboutOmegaT.xml

1876
<e0>Languages:</e0> the ISO list of languages and language codes is provided
<e0>语言：</e0>语言和对应代码的 ISO 列表

Yujun Yin
doc_src/AboutOmegaT.xml

1877
<e0>Keyboard shortcuts in the editor</e0>: the list of shortcuts used in the editor
<e0>编辑器中的键盘快捷键</e0>：编辑器中可用的快捷键列表

Yujun Yin
doc_src/AboutOmegaT.xml

1878
<e0>Shortcuts customization:</e0> shortcuts can be customized to your personal preferences
<e0>快捷键自定义：</e0>可根据用户个人偏好对快捷键进行自定义

Yujun Yin
doc_src/AboutOmegaT.xml

Fu Rhong
doc_src/App_Keyboard.xml

1900
The term "Move to inside segment" means, that the cursor moves to the beginning of the segment if it was previously before the segment, and to the end of the segment if it was previously after it.
在这里“移动到片段内”是指，如果光标原来在此片段前面则移动到片段的开始处，如果在片段后面则移动到片段的末尾。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/App_Keyboard.xml

doc_src/App_Keyboard.xml

1951
The "Shift" key doesn't exhibit any special behavior per se: when the "Shift" key is pressed, all keys move the cursor in their usual manner, except in the case of the <l0>Shift+Enter</l0> combination, that inserts a line break into the text.
“Shift”键不会表现出特殊的行为：在按下 "Shift" 时使用上面快捷键也会以相同的方式移动，唯一的例外是<l0>Shift+Enter</l0>组合键会在文本中插入新行符。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/App_Keyboard.xml

1952
System-wide commands Select All (<k0>Ctrl+A</k0>), Paste (<e1>Ctrl+V</e1>), Cut (<e2>Ctrl+X</e2>), copy (<e3>Ctrl+C)</e3>, Insert Match or Selection <e4>(Ctrl+I</e4>) and Insert source (<e5>Ctrl+Shift+I</e5>) act in principle on the text within the currently open segment only.
未翻译

没有修改者
doc_src/App_Keyboard.xml

1953
It is possible to move from one pane to another (for instance, from the Editor to the Fuzzy Matches pane) using <k0>Ctrl+Tab</k0>.
未翻译

没有修改者
doc_src/App_Keyboard.xml

1954
<k1>Ctrl+Shift+Tab</k1> moves back to the previous pane.
未翻译

没有修改者
doc_src/App_Keyboard.xml

1955
The shortcuts <k2>Ctrl+A</k2> and <k3>Ctrl+C</k3> work in panes, allowing to copy all or some of the information to the clipboard.
未翻译

没有修改者
doc_src/App_Keyboard.xml

1956
Note that you can reassign the shortcuts to your own preferences.
请注意，您可以按自己的偏好重新分配快捷键。

Fu Rhong

2520
<p0>Plugins</p0> <s1>LanguageTool</s1>
<p0>插件</p0> <s1>LanguageTool</s1>

Lenovo
doc_src/App_LanguageTool_plugin.xml

2521
LanguageTool plugin
LanguageTool插件

Lenovo
doc_src/App_LanguageTool_plugin.xml

2522
Introduction
介绍

Fu Rhong
doc_src/App_LanguageTool_plugin.xml

2523
http://www.languagetool.org
http://www.languagetool.org

Fu Rhong
doc_src/App_LanguageTool_plugin.xml

2524
http://www.languagetool.org/languages/
http://www.languagetool.org/languages/

Fu Rhong
doc_src/App_LanguageTool_plugin.xml

2525
<u0>LanguageTool</u0> is an Open Source style and grammar proofreading software for English, French, German, Polish, Dutch, Romanian, and a number of other languages - see the <u1>list of supported languages</u1>.
<u0>LanguageTool</u0>是开源的语法校对软件，适用于英语、法语、德语、波兰语、荷兰语、罗马尼亚语等语言（请参阅<u1>支持语言列表</u1>）。

Lenovo
doc_src/App_LanguageTool_plugin.xml

2526
You can think of LanguageTool as a software to detect errors that a simple spell checker cannot detect, e.g. mixing up there/their, no/now etc.
LanguageTool可用于检查一般拼写检查软件无法检测出的错误，例如混用了there/their、no/now等。

Lenovo
doc_src/App_LanguageTool_plugin.xml

2527
It can also detect some grammar mistakes.
它还可以检查语法错误。

Lenovo
doc_src/App_LanguageTool_plugin.xml

2528
It does not include spell checking.
这不包括拼写检查。

Lenovo
doc_src/App_LanguageTool_plugin.xml

2529
LanguageTool will find errors for which a rule has been defined in its language-specific configuration files.
LanguageTool能检测对应针对特定语言的配置文件中已定义规则的错误。

Lenovo
doc_src/App_LanguageTool_plugin.xml

2530
The LanguageTool in OmegaT
OmegaT中的LanguageTool

Fu Rhong
doc_src/App_LanguageTool_plugin.xml

2531
Installation and Use
安装和使用

Fu Rhong
doc_src/App_LanguageTool_plugin.xml

2532
The LanguageTool plugin is included in OmegaT.
LanguageTool插件包含在OmegaT中。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/App_LanguageTool_plugin.xml

2533
It will be used automatically by OmegaT if <g0>Options > Language Checker</g0> is checked.
如果选择了<g0>选项>语言检查器</g0>，则OmegaT会自动使用这个工具。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/App_LanguageTool_plugin.xml

2534
The rules applied (if any) will depend on the source and target language of the project.
其它适用的规则取决于项目的源语言和目标语言。

Lenovo
doc_src/App_LanguageTool_plugin.xml

2535
When a rule is triggered, the corresponding phrase will be underlined in blue in the Editor (see <e1>also </e1>and <e2>I didn't do nothing</e2> in the picture above).
检查发现错误后，编辑器中相应短语会标上蓝色下划线（请参阅上图中<e1>also </e1>和<e2>I didn't do nothing）</e2>

Lenovo
doc_src/App_LanguageTool_plugin.xml

2536
When hovering the mouse over the underlined phrase, an explanation will appear.
将鼠标放在画线短语上时，会出现相应说明。

Lenovo
doc_src/App_LanguageTool_plugin.xml

2537
Incompatibilities
不兼容性

Fu Rhong
doc_src/App_LanguageTool_plugin.xml

2538
LanguageTool will not work properly if an old version is found in the /plugin folder.
如果/plugin文件夹中有旧版本的LanguageTool，则无法正常工作。

Lenovo
doc_src/App_LanguageTool_plugin.xml

2539
Remove LanguageTool from the /plugin folder before starting OmegaT.
请在启动OmegaT前删除/plugin文件夹中的LanguageTool。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/App_LanguageTool_plugin.xml

Scripts

lenovo
doc_src/App_Scripting_plugin.xml

2564
Introduction
介绍

Fu Rhong
doc_src/App_Scripting_plugin.xml

2565
OmegaT allows to run scripts written in different scripting languages.
OmegaT 允许运行使用不同脚本语言发布的脚本.

lenovo
doc_src/App_Scripting_plugin.xml

2566
Use
用

lenovo
doc_src/App_Scripting_plugin.xml

2567
Clicking <g0>Tools > </g0><g1>Scripting</g1> opens the Scripting window:<s2> <s3>Scripting window</s3> <m4> <i5> <i6/> </i5> </m4> </s2>
点击 <g0>工具 > </g0><g1>脚本</g1> o打开脚本窗口:<s2> <s3>脚本窗口</s3> <m4> <i5> <i6/> </i5> </m4> </s2>

lenovo
doc_src/App_Scripting_plugin.xml

2568
The Scripting window allows you to load an existing script into the text area and run it against the current opened project.
您可以在脚本窗口的文本区加载一个已存在的脚本并且再次运行当前打开的程序.

lenovo
doc_src/App_Scripting_plugin.xml

2569
To customize the script feature, do the following:
要定制脚本功能，请执行以下操作：

Fu Rhong
doc_src/App_Scripting_plugin.xml

2570
Load a script into the editor by clicking on its name in the list on the left panel.
点击左面板列表中的脚本名称加载脚本到编辑器中。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/App_Scripting_plugin.xml

2571
Right-click on a button from "<1>" to "<12>" in the bottom panel and select "Add".
右键点击底面板中的“<1>”到“<12>”按钮并选择“添加”。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/App_Scripting_plugin.xml

2572
In the above example, two scripts (position 1 and 2) have already been added.
在上面的例子中，已添加了两个脚本（位置1和2）。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/App_Scripting_plugin.xml

2573
When you left-click on the number, the selected script will run.
当您左键点击数字时，将运行选择的脚本。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/App_Scripting_plugin.xml

2574
You can start the selected macros from the main menu as well by using their entries in the <g0>Tools </g0>menu or by pressing<k1> Ctrl+Alt+F#</k1> (# 1 to 12).
您还可以点击<g0>工具</g0>菜单下的脚本条目或按<k1> Ctrl+Alt+F#</k1>（#表示1到12）组合键运行选择的宏。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/App_Scripting_plugin.xml

2575
By default, scripts are stored in the "scripts" folder located in OmegaT installation folder (the folder that contains the OmegaT.jar).
默认情况下，脚本存储在位于OmegaT安装文件夹（包含OmegaT.jar的文件夹）中的“scripts”文件夹里。

lenovo
doc_src/App_Scripting_plugin.xml

2576
You can add new scripts there, so they will appear in the list of available scripts in the Scripting window.
您可以在这里添加新的脚本，这些脚本会出现在脚本窗口里的可用脚本列表里。

lenovo
doc_src/App_Scripting_plugin.xml

doc_src/App_Scripting_plugin.xml

2579
Scripting languages
脚本语言

lenovo
doc_src/App_Scripting_plugin.xml

2580
The following scripting languages have been implemented:
目前已支持下列脚本语言：

Fu Rhong
doc_src/App_Scripting_plugin.xml

2581
<e0>Groovy</e0> (http://groovy.codehaus.org): is a dynamic language for the Java Virtual machine.
<e0>Groovy</e0>（http://groovy.codehaus.org）：是用于Java虚拟机的动态语言。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/App_Scripting_plugin.xml

2582
It builds upon the strengths of Java but has additional power features inspired by languages like Python, Ruby and Smalltalk.
它构建于增强的Java之上，含有从Python、Ruby和Smalltalk等语言获得灵感而实现的附加强大功能。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/App_Scripting_plugin.xml

2583
<e0>JavaScript</e0> (sometimes abbreviated JS, not to be confused with Java): is a prototype-based scripting language that is dynamic, weakly typed and has first-class functions.
<e0>JavaScript</e0>（不会与Java混淆时简写为JS）：是动态、弱类型且具有一类函数的基于原型的脚本语言。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/App_Scripting_plugin.xml

2584
It is a multi-paradigm language, supporting object-oriented, imperative, and functional programming styles.
它是多范型语言，支持面向对象、命令和函数式编程风格。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/App_Scripting_plugin.xml

2585
Being the language behind popular software such as Firefox it is a familiar and preferred programming tool in the open-source domain.
它工作于像Firefox这样流行软件的后台，是开源领域中常见和首选的编程工具。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/App_Scripting_plugin.xml

2586
All the languages have access to the OmegaT object model, with the project as the top object.
所有的语言都能访问OmegaT对象模型，其中的顶级对象为项目。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/App_Scripting_plugin.xml

2587
The following code snippet in groovy for instance scans through all the segments in all files in the current project and, if the translation exists, prints out the source and the target of the segment:
例如下面的groovy代码片段扫描当前项目所有文件中的所有片段，且当某个片段的翻译存在时打印出它的源和目标译文：

doc_src/App_Scripting_plugin.xml

2588
files = project.projectFiles;
files = project.projectFiles;

for (i in 0 ..< files.size())
for (i in 0 ..< files.size())

{

for (j in 0 ..< files[i].entries.size())

{

2593

currSegment = files[i].entries[j];

2594

if (project.getTranslationInfo(currSegment))

{

source = currSegment.getSrcText();
source = currSegment.getSrcText();

console.println(source + " >>>> " + target);

2602
Shortcuts customization
自定义快捷键>

Administrator
doc_src/App_ShortCutCustomization.xml

2603
<p0>Shortcuts</p0> <s1>Customization</s1>
自定义快捷键><p0>快捷键</p0> <s1>自定义</s1>

Administrator
doc_src/App_ShortCutCustomization.xml

2604
Shortcuts customization
自定义快捷键>

Administrator
doc_src/App_ShortCutCustomization.xml

2605
Most of the items that appear in the main menu can have a new shortcut assigned.
在主菜单中的大部分菜单项可设置新的快捷键。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/App_ShortCutCustomization.xml

2606
You can change the already assigned shortcuts and add new shortcuts by putting a shortcut definition file in your OmegaT preferences folder (see <l0>User files location</l0>).
通过 OmegaT 首选项文件夹（请参阅<l0>用户文件位置</l0>）中的快捷键定义文件，您可改变已分配的快捷键或添加新的快捷键。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/App_ShortCutCustomization.xml

2607
The shortcut definition file must be named <f0>MainMenuShortcuts.properties</f0> and must contain at most one shortcut definition per line.
快捷键定义文件名称必须为 <f0>主菜单截图..properties</f0>，同时每行最多包含一个快捷键的定义。

lenovo
doc_src/App_ShortCutCustomization.xml

2608
Empty lines are accepted and comment lines should start with "//".
可接受空行，而注释行应以 "//" 开头。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/App_ShortCutCustomization.xml

2609
Anything after the "//" will be ignored.
在 "//" 后的所有内容将被忽略。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/App_ShortCutCustomization.xml

2610
Once the <f0>MainMenuShortcuts.properties</f0> file is modified, <a1>OmegaT</a1> must be relaunched to take the new shortcuts into account.
修改 <f0>项目编译菜单项.properties</f0> 文件后，必须重新运行 <a1>OmegaT</a1> 才能让新的快捷键生效。

lenovo
doc_src/App_ShortCutCustomization.xml

2611
The shortcut definition syntax is the following: <c0><menu item code>=<shortcut></c0>, where <e1><menu item code></e1> is a code taken from the tables below and <e2><shortcut></e2> is a combination of pressed keys specified by the user
快捷键定义的语法如下：<c0><menu item code>=<shortcut></c0>，其中<e1><menu item code></e1>取自下表，而<e2><shortcut></e2>是用户指定的按键组合

Fu Rhong
doc_src/App_ShortCutCustomization.xml

2612
http://docs.oracle.com/javase/6/docs/api/javax/swing/KeyStroke.html
http://docs.oracle.com/javase/6/docs/api/javax/swing/KeyStroke.html

Fu Rhong
doc_src/App_ShortCutCustomization.xml

2613
The full syntax for keystrokes (shortcuts) is defined in the following Java 1.6 documentation from Oracle (bottom of page): <u0>Java 1.6 keystrokes shortcuts</u0>
按键（快捷键）的全部语法的定义在来自 Oracle Java 1.6 文档（页面底部）：<u0>Java 1.6 快捷键</u0>

Fu Rhong
doc_src/App_ShortCutCustomization.xml

2614
.
.

Fu Rhong
doc_src/App_ShortCutCustomization.xml

2615
<shortcut> must be of the following form: 0 or more <c0><modifier></c0> followed by 0 or 1 <c1><event></c1> followed by 1 <c2><key></c2>, where:
<shortcut>必须为下面的形式：0或多个<c0><modifier></c0>后跟着0或1个<c1><event></c1>后跟着1个<c2><key></c2>，其中：

Fu Rhong
doc_src/App_ShortCutCustomization.xml

2616
<c0><modifier></c0> can be: <e1>shift</e1>, <e2>control</e2>, <e3>ctrl</e3>, <e4>meta</e4>
<c0><modifier></c0> 可以为：<e1>shift</e1>, <e2>control</e2>, <e3>ctrl</e3>, <e4>meta</e4>

Fu Rhong
doc_src/App_ShortCutCustomization.xml

2617
On the Mac, the modifier <e0>meta</e0> must be used to specify the <e1>command</e1> key.
在 Mac 系统中，必须使用 <e0>meta</e0> 修饰符来指定 <e1>command</e1> 键。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/App_ShortCutCustomization.xml

2618
, <e0>alt</e0>, <e1>altGraph</e1>
, <e0>alt</e0>, <e1>altGraph</e1>

Fu Rhong
doc_src/App_ShortCutCustomization.xml

2619
<c0><event></c0> can be: <e1>typed</e1>, <e2>pressed</e2>, <e3>released</e3>
<c0><event></c0> 可以为：<e1>typed</e1>, <e2>pressed</e2>, <e3>released</e3>

Fu Rhong
doc_src/App_ShortCutCustomization.xml

2620
and <c0><key></c0> can be any key available on your keyboard
而 <c0><key></c0> 可以为您键盘上有效的任何键。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/App_ShortCutCustomization.xml

2937
<p0>OmegaT</p0> <s1>Team projects</s1> <s2>Team projects</s2>
<p0>OmegaT</p0> <s1>团队项目</s1> <s2>团队项目</s2>

Fu Rhong
doc_src/App_TeamProjects.xml

2938
OmegaT Team Projects
OmegaT团队项目

Fu Rhong
doc_src/App_TeamProjects.xml

2939
Version control - introduction
版本控制——介绍

Fu Rhong
doc_src/App_TeamProjects.xml

2940
http://subversion.apache.org
http://subversion.apache.org

Fu Rhong
doc_src/App_TeamProjects.xml

2941
http://git-scm.com/
http://git-scm.com/

Fu Rhong
doc_src/App_TeamProjects.xml

2942
The collaborative translation offered by OmegaT is based on the functionality of version or revision control, widely used by the software community to maintain control of changes to the code of a program and allow unimpeded collaboration within the development team.
OmegaT中的协作翻译基于版本控制功能，该功能广泛应用于软件社区的程序代码维护和开发团队内部的无阻碍协作。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/App_TeamProjects.xml

2943
OmegaT supports two of the popular version control systems (VCS for short), <u0>Apache Subversion</u0> (often abbreviated SVN, after the command name svn) and <u1>Git</u1>.
OmegaT支持两种流行的版本控制系统（简写为VCS）：<u0>Apache Subversion</u0>（在命令名称svn后常被简称为SVN）和<u1>Git</u1>。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/App_TeamProjects.xml

2944
The advantages of a VC system for a team of translators can be summarized as follows:
版本控制系统给团队成员带来的好处可概括如下：

Fu Rhong
doc_src/App_TeamProjects.xml

2945
Several team members can work on the translation project simultaneously without interfering with each other
多个团队成员可同时工作在一个翻译项目而不会彼此冲突

Fu Rhong
doc_src/App_TeamProjects.xml

2946
They can share common material, like project translation memory and its glossary
他们可以共用材料，如项目的翻译记忆和术语表

xulihang
doc_src/App_TeamProjects.xml

2947
Every three minutes by default, an updated version of data shared is available to the rest of the team
缺省情况下，每三分钟就会把更新的版本分享给团队其他成员

Fu Rhong
doc_src/App_TeamProjects.xml

2948
The system maintains versioning for data shared
由系统维护共享数据的版本

Fu Rhong
doc_src/App_TeamProjects.xml

2949
Conflicts - for instance alternative translations of the same segment or glossary entry - can be monitored, resolved and merged
可以发现并解决冲突（例如相同片段或术语的可选译文）

Fu Rhong
doc_src/App_TeamProjects.xml

2950
The following terms, to be used in the text below, deserve a short explanation:
这里对后面的文本中使用的术语作个简短的说明：

Fu Rhong
doc_src/App_TeamProjects.xml

2951
<e0>VCS server - </e0>i.e. SVN or Git server is the environment where the common material is kept and maintained on the net.
<e0>VCS服务器：</e0>即SVN或Git服务器是网上保存和维护公用材料的地方。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/App_TeamProjects.xml

2952
The server can exist in the local network but in the majority of cases it will be available on internet, i.e. via URL address.
服务器可以在本地网络，但大部分情况下它在因特网上，即通过网址访问。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/App_TeamProjects.xml

2953
One member of the team, the project administrator, needs to be acquainted with handling the server side, i.e. the job of setting up the environment, importing the OmegaT project, assigning the access rights for the team members, resolving the conflicts, etc.
项目的其中一个成员——项目管理员，需要熟悉服务器端事务，即设置工作环境、导入OmegaT项目、设置团队成员的访问权限、解决冲突等。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/App_TeamProjects.xml

2954
http://tortoisesvn.net/
http://tortoisesvn.net/

Fu Rhong
doc_src/App_TeamProjects.xml

2955
http://code.google.com/p/tortoisegit/
http://code.google.com/p/tortoisegit/

Fu Rhong
doc_src/App_TeamProjects.xml

2956
<e0>VCS client: </e0>To interface with the server an SVN or Git client must be installed on computers of "project managers" involved in the OmegaT project.
<e0>VCS客户端：</e0>要和服务器连接，SVN或Git客户端必须安装在包含OmegaT项目的“项目管理员”的电脑上。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/App_TeamProjects.xml

2957
Very popular clients for Windows environment are <u1>TortoiseSVN</u1> and <u2>TortoiseGit</u2>.
Windows系统中最常用的客户端分别为<u1>TortoiseSVN</u1>和<u2>TortoiseGit</u2>。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/App_TeamProjects.xml

2958
Other operating systems (Linux, OS X) offer similar packages.
其他操作系统（Linux、OS X）提供了类似的软件。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/App_TeamProjects.xml

2959
<e0>repository: </e0>the place where the shared material is saved and maintained, either on a local access network or in Internet.
<e0>版本库：</e0>保存和维护共享材料的位置，在本地网或因特网上。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/App_TeamProjects.xml

2960
Project members connect with it via their VCS client.
项目成员需要VCS客户端与其连接。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/App_TeamProjects.xml

2961
<e0>checkout:</e0> the operation that creates a working copy from the repository to your local computer.
<e0>检出：</e0>该操作从版本库创建工作副本到本地电脑。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/App_TeamProjects.xml

2962
The server keeps the information on checkouts, so that later commits (see below) can be performed in an orderly fashion.
服务器维护了检出的信息，所以以后的提交（参阅下面）可以平滑地进行。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/App_TeamProjects.xml

2963
<e0>commit: </e0>once a new local version of the checked-out material is ready, it can be committed to the repository and thus made available to the rest of the team.
<e0>提交：</e0>当检出材料的新的本地版本准备好后，就可以提交到版本库而共享给团队其他成员。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/App_TeamProjects.xml

2964
The server makes sure that any conflicting changes, due to two members working on the same checked-out contents, will be resolved.
服务器会确保在两个成员工作于相同的检出内容时引起的冲突得到解决。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/App_TeamProjects.xml

2965
<e0>administrator: </e0>the person responsible for the creation and maintaining of the repository, i.e. taking care of the server side of the task.
<e0>管理员：</e0>创建和维护版本库（如处理服务端事务）的人。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/App_TeamProjects.xml

2966
To avoid any problems, one person only should have these rights at least initially.
要避免问题，最初的设置中每个人只应该具有基本的这些权利。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/App_TeamProjects.xml

2967
<e0>user</e0>: a member of the team, collaborating on the common project.
<e0>用户</e0>：团队成员，协作于共同的项目。

Fu Rhong

2970
There are two possibilities to run an SVN server: you can install SVN on your own server or you can use a hosted service.

Fu Rhong
doc_src/App_TeamProjects.xml

2971
When using an external service you must be aware of the possible implications in terms of confidentiality, since you are loading the original document on a server outside of your direct control.
使用外部服务时您必须注意到可能的机密泄漏，因为您是在不受自己直接控制的服务器上加载文档的。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/App_TeamProjects.xml

2972
Alternatively, to avoid this issue you can set a private SVN server, for example if you already have an Apache server that includes the software in question (e.g. VisualSVN).
或者，为了避免此问题您可以建立私有的SVN服务器，例如如果您已经有了包含正在讨论的软件（如VisualSVN）的Apache服务器。

3015
Avoid in any case adding <f6>bak</f6> files, <f7>project_stats.txt</f7> and <f8>project_stats_match.txt</f8>, in the <f9>omegat</f9> subfolder, as they would without any need or profit just bloat the repository.
在任何情况下都必须排除<f9>omegat</f9>子文件夹中的<f6>bak</f6>文件、<f7>project_stats.txt</f7>及<f8>project_stats_match.txt</f8>，因为它们除了让版本库变得臃肿外得不到丝毫好处。

3027
It will first commit the current contents to the server repository and then update the local copy of the repository - i.e. the contents of .svn subfolder - so that it is up to date with the latest repository version.
它会首先提交当前内容到服务器版本库，接着更新版本库的本地副本（即.svn子文件夹的内容），这样它就是版本库的最新版本了。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/App_TeamProjects.xml

3028
<e0>update local files from the local repository copy</e0> - the changes received from the server repository reside within the .svn subfolder but not yet in the files and folders themselves.
<e0>从本地版本库副本更新本地文件</e0>——从服务器版本库的.svn子文件夹接收到的变更但还不是文件和文件夹本身的更新。

Fu Rhong

3029

Fu Rhong

doc_src/App_TeamProjects.xml

3038
OmegaT will recognize it is a team project, and will synchronize everything automatically, every three minutes by default.
OmegaT会识别出团队项目，并在缺省的情况下每隔三分钟自动同步所有内容。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/App_TeamProjects.xml

3039
Tokenizers
分词器

gavin7
doc_src/App_Tokenizer_plugin.xml

3040
Tokenizers
分词器

gavin7
doc_src/App_Tokenizer_plugin.xml

3041
<p0>Lucene</p0> <s1>Tokenizer</s1>
<p0>Lucene</p0> <s1>解析器</s1>

Fu Rhong
doc_src/App_Tokenizer_plugin.xml

3042
<p0>Stemmer</p0> <s1>Tokenizer</s1>
<p0>Stemmer</p0> <s1>解析器</s1>

Fu Rhong
doc_src/App_Tokenizer_plugin.xml

3043
Introduction
介绍

Fu Rhong
doc_src/App_Tokenizer_plugin.xml

3044
Tokenizers (or stemmers) improve the quality of matches by recognizing inflected words in source and translation memory data.
分词器（或 stemmer，词干分析器）通过识别源语言和翻译记忆数据中的词形变化来提高翻译匹配质量。

gavin7
doc_src/App_Tokenizer_plugin.xml

3045
They also improve glossary matching.
同时也提高了术语表的匹配度。

xulihang
doc_src/App_Tokenizer_plugin.xml

3046
A stemmer for English, for example, should identify the string "cats" (and possibly "catlike", "catty" etc.) as based on the root "cat", and "stemmer", "stemming", "stemmed" as based on "stem".
英语中的词干分析器，例如能识别字符串 "cats"（以及 "catlike", "catty" 等）的词根是 "cat"，而 "stemmer", "stemming", "stemmed" 的词根是 "stem"。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/App_Tokenizer_plugin.xml

3047
A stemming algorithm reduces the words "fishing", "fished", "fish", and "fisher" to the root word, "fish".
词干分析算法能还原单词 "fishing"、"fished"、"fish" 以及 "fisher" 为相应的词根 "fish"。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/App_Tokenizer_plugin.xml

3048
This is especially useful in case of languages that use pre- and postfix forms for the stem words.
这对处理使用了词根加上前缀和后缀形式组成的单词的语言来说特别有用。

gavin7
doc_src/App_Tokenizer_plugin.xml

3049
Borrowing an example from Slovenian, here "good" in all possible grammatically correct forms:
看看斯洛文尼亚语的一个例子，这些是 "good" 的所有正确的语法形式：

Fu Rhong
doc_src/App_Tokenizer_plugin.xml

3050
lep, lepa, lepo - singular, masculine, feminine, neutral
lep, lepa, lepo - singular, masculine, feminine, neutral

Fu Rhong
doc_src/App_Tokenizer_plugin.xml

3051
lepši, lepša, lepše .
lepši, lepša, lepše .

Fu Rhong
doc_src/App_Tokenizer_plugin.xml

3052
- comparative, nominative, masculine, feminine, neutral, resp. Plural form of the adjective
- comparative, nominative, masculine, feminine, neutral, resp. 形容词的复数形式

gavin7
doc_src/App_Tokenizer_plugin.xml

3053
najlepših - superlative, plural, genitive for M,F,N
najlepših - superlative, plural, genitive for M,F,N

Fu Rhong
doc_src/App_Tokenizer_plugin.xml

3054
Languages selection
语言选择

gavin7
doc_src/App_Tokenizer_plugin.xml

3055
Tokenizers are included in OmegaT and active by default.
OmegaT里包含了分词器并且默认为开启状态。

gavin7
doc_src/App_Tokenizer_plugin.xml

3056
OmegaT automatically selects a tokenizer for the source and the target language according to the language settings of the project.
OmegaT会根据项目语言设置中的源语言和目标语言自动选择相应的分词器。

gavin7
doc_src/App_Tokenizer_plugin.xml

3057
It is possible to select another tokenizer (Language Tokenizer) or a different version of the tokenizer (Tokenizer Behavior) from the Project Properties window.
可以从项目属性窗口中选择另一个分词器（语言分词器）或分词器（分词器行为）的不同版本。

gavin7
doc_src/App_Tokenizer_plugin.xml

3058
In case no tokenizer exists for the current languages, OmegaT uses Hunspell instead (in that case, make sure that relevant Hunspell dictionaries are installed).
如果当前语言没有标记器，OmegaT会使用Hunspell（在这种情况下，确保安装了相关的Hunspell字典）。

gavin7
doc_src/App_Tokenizer_plugin.xml

3059
Incompatibilities
不兼容性

Fu Rhong
doc_src/App_Tokenizer_plugin.xml

3060
OmegaT will not launch if tokenizers are found in the /plugin folder.
如果在/plugin文件夹找到分词器则OmegaT将不会运行它。

gavin7
doc_src/App_Tokenizer_plugin.xml

3061
Remove all the tokenizers from the /plugin folder before starting OmegaT.
在启动OmegaT前请删除/plugin文件夹中的所有分词器。

gavin7
doc_src/App_Tokenizer_plugin.xml

3079
Remember that every good bug report needs just three things:
请记住每份良好的 BUG 报告至少包括三方面内容：

Fu Rhong

3084

Fu Rhong
doc_src/App_Website.xml

3085
You should add copies of files, portions of the log, screen shots, and anything else that you think will help the developers to find and fix your bug.
您应该将文件的副本、部分日志、屏幕截图以及其他任何可以帮助开发人员找到并处理您所遇到的Bug的内容添加到报告中。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/App_Website.xml

3086
Note that bug reports and requests for enhancements are publicly visible, so you should not add any sensitive files.
需要注意的是：BUG 报告和改进要求是公开可见的，因此请不要将敏感文件加入其中。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/App_Website.xml

3087

如果您想知道您的报告后续处理情况，您需要注册成为 SourceForge 用户，登录并提交一份 BUG 报告，或者只需点击报告顶部的监控器。

3114

doc_src/Dictionaries.xml

3115
Download the file - it should be a <f0>tarball</f0> archive (extension <e1>tar.bz</e1> or <e2>tar.bz2</e2>).
下载文件——其须为<f0>tarball</f0> 存档（扩展名为 <e1>tar.bz</e1> 或 <e2>tar.bz2</e2>

xulihang
doc_src/Dictionaries.xml

3116
Use untar utility (or its equivalent, for instance<f0> winrar</f0> in Windows) to extract its contents into the project folder "Dictionary".
使用 untar （或类似工具，例如 Windows 中的 <f0> winrar</f0>）将内容解压至项目文件夹 "Dictionary" 中。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Dictionaries.xml

3117
There should be three files, with extensions <e1>dz, idx </e1>and <e2>ifo</e2>.
其应该包括三份文件，扩展名分别为：<e1>dz, idx </e1>和 <e2>ifo</e2>。

3134

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Dictionaries.xml

3135

文件夹中是否包含了三个名称相同，且带扩展名的文件?

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Dictionaries.xml

3136

如果只有一份与预期相同的文件，那么检查下它的扩展名。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Dictionaries.xml

3137
If it is <e0>tar.bz</e0>, you have forgotten to unpack (untar) it.
如果扩展名为<e0>tar.bz</e0>，那是因为您忘记解压了。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/EditingBehavior.xml

3140
The dialog in <m0> <g1>Options</g1> <g2>Editing Behavior...</g2> </m0> enables the user to select, how the current segment in the editing field is to be initialized and handled:
在<m0> <g1>选项</g1> <g2>编辑行为...</g2> </m0>打开的对话框中，用户可以选择如何初始化和处理编辑区域的当前片段：

xulihang
doc_src/EditingBehavior.xml

3141
Editing behavior options
编辑行为选项

Fu Rhong
doc_src/EditingBehavior.xml

3142
You translate your files by moving from segment to segment, editing each current segment in turn.
随着对当前片段的编辑，您从文件的一个片段翻译到另一个片段。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/EditingBehavior.xml

3143
When moving between segments, you may wish to populate the editing field with an existing translation in the fuzzy match pane or with the source text.
在片段之间移动时，您可能希望用现存的译文或源文本来填充正在编辑的区域。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/EditingBehavior.xml

3144
In <m0> <g1>Options</g1> <g2>Editing Behavior...</g2> </m0> <a3>OmegaT</a3> offers you the following alternatives:
在<m0> <g1>选项</g1> <g2>编辑行为...</g2> </m0>菜单中，<a3>OmegaT</a3> 为您提供了以下选项：

xulihang
doc_src/EditingBehavior.xml

3145
The source text
源文本

Fu Rhong
doc_src/EditingBehavior.xml

3146

3165

Fu Rhong
doc_src/EditingBehavior.xml

3167

3168

Fu Rhong
doc_src/EditingBehavior.xml

3169

doc_src/FileFilters.xml

3232

doc_src/FileFilters.xml

3233

注意：在Microsoft Open XML格式(docx、xlsx等)中，如果所有标签都显示出来，那么在第一个标签之前不要写文本(它是必须始终开始片段的技术标签)。

doc_src/FileFilters.xml

3234

doc_src/FileFilters.xml

3235

Administrator
doc_src/FileFilters.xml

3236

Administrator
doc_src/FileFilters.xml

3237
Ignore file context when identifying segments with alternate translations: by default, OmegaT uses the source file name as part of the identification of an alternate translation.
当识别片段带有替代翻译时，忽略文件上下文：在默认情况下，OmegaT使用源文件名称作为替代翻译的识别的一部分。

Administrator
doc_src/FileFilters.xml

3238
if the option is checked, the source file name will not be used, and alternative translations will take effect in any file as long as the other context (previous/next segments, or some sort of ID depending on the file format) matches.
如果选中了该选项，则不会使用源文件名称，而只要其他上下文(前/下一片段，或某种依赖于文件格式的ID）匹配，替代翻译将在任何文件中生效。

3248
<e0>Allow blank translations in the target file</e0>:
<e0>允许目标文件中存在空译文</e0>：

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FileFilters.xml

3249
If on, when a PO segment (which may be a whole paragraph) is not translated, the translation will be empty in the target file.
如果启用，未翻译的 PO 片段（可能是整个段落）在目标文件中的译文是空的。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FileFilters.xml

3250
Technically speaking, the <c0>msgstr</c0> segment in the PO target file, if created, will be left empty.
从技术上说，PO 目标文件（如果创建了）中的 <c0>msgstr</c0> 片段将为空的。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FileFilters.xml

3251
As this is the standard behavior for PO files, it is on by default.
由于这是 PO 文件的标准行为，所以缺省启用。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FileFilters.xml

3252
If the option is off, the source text will be copied to the target segment.
如果关闭了此选项，则会复制源文本到目标片段中。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FileFilters.xml

3253
Skip PO header
跳过PO头部

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FileFilters.xml

3254
PO header will be skipped and left unchanged, if this option is checked.
如果选中此选项，则PO头部会被跳过而保持不变。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FileFilters.xml

3255
Auto replace 'nplurals=INTEGER; plural=EXPRESSION;' in header
自动替换头部中的‘nplurals=INTEGER; plural=EXPRESSION;’

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FileFilters.xml

3256
The option allows OmegaT to override the specification in the PO file header and use the default for the selected target language.
此选项会让OmegaT覆盖PO文件头部的规范并在选择的目标语言中使用默认规范。

Fu Rhong

3263

xulihang
doc_src/FileFilters.xml

3264

<e0>不翻译含下列属性键值对（逗号分隔）的标签内容</e0>：匹配列表中键值对的标签内容将被忽略。

doc_src/FileFilters.xml

3265

在需要根据属性值来不翻译一些标签时很有用。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FileFilters.xml

3266
For example, <l0><div class="hide"> <span translate="no"></l0> You can define key-value pairs for tags to be left untranslated.
例如，对于<l0><div class="hide"> <span translate="no"></l0>您可以定义键值对来保持其未译状态。

Fu Rhong

3267

对于上面这个例子，定义字段应包含：<l1>class=hide, translate=no </l1>

doc_src/FileFilters.xml

3298
Edit filter dialog
编辑过滤器对话框

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FileFilters.xml

3299
This dialog enables you to set up the source filename patterns of files to be processed by the filter, customize the filenames of translated files, and select which encodings should be used for loading the file and saving its translated counterpart.
该对话框允许您设置该过滤器所处理的文件的源文件名模式，定制已译文件文件名，并为它选择用何种编码来载入文件及保存已译副本。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FileFilters.xml

3300
To modify a file filter pattern, either modify the fields directly or click <e0>Edit.</e0> To add a new file filter pattern, click <e1>Add</e1>.
要修改文件过滤器模式，可直接修改该字段或点击<e0>编辑</e0>按钮。要新增文件过滤器模式，请点击<e1>新增</e1>。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FileFilters.xml

3301
The same dialog is used to add a pattern or to edit a particular pattern.
新增模式和编辑特定模式使用的是相同的对话框。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FileFilters.xml

3302
The dialog is useful because it includes a special target filename pattern editor with which you can customize the names of output files.
该对话框非常有用，因为它带有的特定目标文件名模式的编辑器，它允许您自定义输出文件的名称。

doc_src/FileFilters.xml

3304
<p0>File filters</p0> <s1>File type and name pattern</s1>
<p0>文件过滤器</p0> <s1>文件类型和文件名模式</s1>

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FileFilters.xml

3305
Source file type, filename pattern
源文件类型、文件名模式

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FileFilters.xml

3306
When OmegaT encounters a file in its source folder, it attempts to select the filter based upon the file's extension.
当 OmegaT 在源文件夹中发现一个文件时，它将首先根据文件的扩展名试着选择过滤器。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FileFilters.xml

3307
More precisely, OmegaT attempts to match each filter's source filename patterns against the filename.
更确切地说，OmegaT 尝试着用每个过滤器的源文件名模式对文件名进行匹配。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FileFilters.xml

3308
For example, the pattern <l0>*.xhtml </l0>matches any file with the <l1>.xhtml</l1> extension.
例如，<l0>*.xhtml </l0>模式将会匹配任何扩展名为 <l1>.xhtml</l1> 的文件。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FileFilters.xml

3309
If the appropriate filter is found, the file is assigned to it for processing.
如果找到了合适的过滤器，它将被用来处理该文件。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FileFilters.xml

3310
For example, by default, XHTML filters are used for processing files with the .xhtml extension.
比如说在默认情况下 XHTML 过滤器将会用来处理扩展名为 .xhtml 的文件。 

Administrator
doc_src/FileFilters.xml

3311
You can change or add filename patterns for files to be handled by each file filter.
您可以更改或添加文件名模式，以便通过每个文件过滤器处理文件。

Administrator
doc_src/FileFilters.xml

3312
Source filename patterns use wild card characters similar to those used in <e2>Searches.
源文件名模式中使用的匹配字符与<e2>搜索中所使用的类似。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FileFilters.xml

3313
</e2>The '*' character matches zero or more characters.
</e2>'*' 字符匹配零个或多个字符。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FileFilters.xml

3314
The '?' character matches exactly one character.
'?' 字符只匹配一个字符。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FileFilters.xml

3315
All other characters represent themselves.
其他所有字符代表自身。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FileFilters.xml

3316
For example, if you wish the text filter to handle readme files (<l3>readme, read.me</l3>, and <l4>readme.txt</l4>) you should use the pattern <l5>read*</l5>.
比如，如果您希望文本过滤器处理 readme 文件（<l3>readme, read.me</l3> 和 <l4>readme.txt</l4>），那么您应该使用模式 <l5>read*</l5>.

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FileFilters.xml

源文件和目标文件编码

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FileFilters.xml

3318

<p0>源文件</p0> <s1>编码</s1>

Fu Rhong

doc_src/FileFilters.xml

3320

<p0>文件过滤器</p0> <s1>源、目标——编码</s1>

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FileFilters.xml

3321
Only a limited number of file formats specify a mandatory encoding.
仅少量文件格式必须指定强制性的编码方式。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FileFilters.xml

3322
File formats that do not specify their encoding will use the encoding you set up for the extension that matches their name.
未指定编码方式的文件格式将使用您所设定的匹配该名称的扩展名的编码方式。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FileFilters.xml

3323
For example, by default <l0>.txt</l0> files will be loaded using the default encoding of your operating system.
例如，缺省情况下 <l0>.txt</l0> 文件将会使用系统缺省的编码导入。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FileFilters.xml

3324
You may change the source encoding for each different source filename pattern.
您可以对每种源文件名模式的源编码进行修改。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FileFilters.xml

3325
Such files may also be written out in any encoding.
这些文件也可以任何编码方式输出。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FileFilters.xml

3326
By default, the translated file encoding is the same as the source file encoding.
缺省情况下，已译文件的编码与源文件的编码相同。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FileFilters.xml

3327
Source and target encoding fields use combo boxes with all supported encodings included.
源和目标编码字段使用的组合框包括了所支持的全部编码。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FileFilters.xml

3328
<auto> leaves the encoding choice to <a1>OmegaT</a1>.
<自动>将编码选择工作留给 <a1>OmegaT</a1>。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FileFilters.xml

3329
This is how it works:
以下是其工作原理：

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FileFilters.xml

3330
OmegaT identifies the source file encoding by using its encoding declaration, if present (HTML files, XML based files)
OmegaT 通过（HTML 文件、基于 XML 的文件中）可能存在的编码声明来识别源文件编码。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FileFilters.xml

3331
OmegaT is instructed to use a mandatory encoding for certain file formats (Java properties etc)
OmegaT 被设置为某些文件格式（Java 属性等）使用强制性编码。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FileFilters.xml

3332
OmegaT uses the default encoding of the operating system for text files.
OmegaT 为文本文件使用缺省的系统编码。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FileFilters.xml

3333
<p0>Target files</p0> <s1>Filenames</s1>
<p0>目标文件</p0> <s1>文件名</s1>

Fu Rhong

doc_src/FileFilters.xml

3336
Sometimes you may wish to rename the files you translate automatically, for example adding a language code after the file name.
有时您也需希望系统自动将译好的的文件重新命名，比如在文件名后加上语言代码。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FileFilters.xml

3337
The target filename pattern uses a special syntax, so if you wish to edit this field, you must click <e0>Edit...</e0>and use the <i1/>Edit Pattern Dialog.

doc_src/FileFilters.xml

3338
If you wish to revert to default configuration of the filter, click <e2>Defaults.</e2> You may also modify the name directly in the target filename pattern field of the file filters dialog.
如果您想恢复到缺省的过滤器设置，点击<e2>缺省</e2>。您也可以在文件过滤器对话框中的目标文件名模式字段中直接修改名称。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FileFilters.xml

3339
The Edit Pattern Dialog offers among others the following options:
编辑模式对话框提供了以下选项：

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FileFilters.xml

3340
Default is <l0>${filename}</l0>– full filename of the source file with extension: in this case the name of the translated file is the same as that of the source file.
缺省设置是 <l0>${filename}</l0>——和源文件完全相同的文件名和扩展名：此时已译文件名和源文件名完全一样。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FileFilters.xml

3341
<l0>${nameOnly}</l0>– allows you to insert only the name of the source file without the extension.
<l0>${nameOnly}</l0>——只插入源文件的名称，而不包括扩展名。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FileFilters.xml

3342
<l0>${extension} </l0>- the original file extension
<l0>${extension} </l0>——源文件扩展名

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FileFilters.xml

3343
<l0>${targetLocale}</l0>– target locale code (of a form "xx_YY").
<l0>${targetLocale}</l0>——目标文件区域设置代码（形式为“xx_YY”）。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FileFilters.xml

3344
<l0>${targetLanguage}</l0>– the target language and country code together (of a form "XX-YY").
<l0>${targetLanguage}</l0>——目标语言和国家代码（形式为“XX-YY”）。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FileFilters.xml

3345
<l0>${targetLanguageCode}</l0> – the target language - only "XX"
<l0>${targetLanguageCode}</l0>——目标语言——仅“XX”

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FileFilters.xml

3346
<l0>${targetCountryCode}</l0>– the target country - only "YY"
<l0>${targetCountryCode}</l0>——目标国家——仅“YY”

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FileFilters.xml

3347
<l0>${timestamp-????}</l0> – system date time at generation time in various patterns
<l0>${timestamp-????}</l0>——多种格式的生成时间系统日期时间

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FileFilters.xml

3348
http://docs.oracle.com/javase/1.4.2/docs/api/java/text/SimpleDateFormat.html
http://docs.oracle.com/javase/1.4.2/docs/api/java/text/SimpleDateFormat.html

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FileFilters.xml

3349

3350

3351

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FileFilters.xml

3352

<l0>${system-host-name}</l0>——系统主机名

<l0>${targetLocaleLCID}</l0>——微软目标区域设置

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FileFilters.xml

3356
Additional variants are available for variables ${nameOnly} and ${Extension}.
对${nameOnly}和${Extension}变量还有附加变量可用。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FileFilters.xml

3357
In case the file name has ambivalent name, one can apply variables of the form <l0>${name only</l0><e1>-extension number</e1>} and <l2>${extension</l2>-<e3>extension number} </e3>.
在文件名存在疑义的情况下，其中某个可以适用于<l0>${仅文件名</l0><e1>-扩展数字</e1>} and <l2>${扩展名</l2>-<e3>扩展数字} </e3>形式的变量。

Fu Rhong

<a0>OmegaT</a0> Files and Folders

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FilesAndFolders.xml

3366
<a0>OmegaT</a0> works with three types of files.
<a0>OmegaT</a0> 运行时使用三种文件。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FilesAndFolders.xml

3367
Translation project files: These constitute a translation project.
翻译项目文件：它们构成了翻译项目。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FilesAndFolders.xml

3368
Losing them may affect the project's integrity and your ability to complete a job.
丢失这些文件可能会影响项目的完整性并导致您无法完成翻译工作。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FilesAndFolders.xml

3369
Project files are the most important files in <a0>OmegaT</a0>.
项目文件是 <a0>OmegaT</a0> 最重要的文件。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FilesAndFolders.xml

3370
They are the files you deal with on a daily basis while translating.
它们是您在翻译时处理文件的日常基础。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FilesAndFolders.xml

3371
User settings files: These are created when OmegaT's behavior is modified by user preference settings.
用户设置文件：它们是用户通过首选项改变 OmegaT 的行为时创建的文件。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FilesAndFolders.xml

3372
Losing them usually results in OmegaT reverting to its "factory settings".
丢失这些文件可能导致 OmegaT 恢复“出厂”设置。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FilesAndFolders.xml

3373
This can sometimes cause a little trouble when you are in the middle of a translation.
如果您正处于翻译工作的中期，这将会导致一个小问题。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FilesAndFolders.xml

3374
Application files: These are included in the package you download.
应用程序文件：它们包含在您下载的安装包中。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FilesAndFolders.xml

3375
Most of them are required in order for OmegaT to function properly.
其中大部分对于 OmegaT 的正常运行来说是必须的。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FilesAndFolders.xml

3376
If for some reason these files are lost or corrupted, simply download and/or reinstall OmegaT to restore them all.
如果出于某种原因丢失或损坏了这些文件，仅需下载并重新安装 OmegaT 以恢复它们。

Fu Rhong

3472

Fu Rhong

3473
Here a platform-independent package in a standard Java form is considered.
在这里应先考虑的是标准Java形式的平台独立安装包。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FilesAndFolders.xml

3474
Alternatives include a Linux .tar package, a Windows installer – with or without a Java Runtime Environment –, a Mac OS X installer, and a source code package for developers.
可选的程序包还有Linux .tar安装包、Windows安装程序（含或不含Java运行环境）、Mac OS X安装程序以及为开发人员准备的源码包。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FilesAndFolders.xml

3475
The platform-independent package can be used on any platform with a working Java 1.6 runtime environment, including the platforms for which a specific package also exists.
该平台独立安装包可在任何运行Java 1.6运行时环境的平台上使用，包括安装有特定包的平台。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FilesAndFolders.xml

3476

它是一份压缩文件（zip或tar存档），您需把它们解压缩到您选择的安装目录中。

Fu Rhong

3525
<a0>You can use OmegaT</a0> to translate files in a number of file formats.

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FilesToTranslate.xml

3526
There are basically two types of file formats, plain text and formatted text.
最基本的文件类型有两种，纯文本和格式化文本格式。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FilesToTranslate.xml

3527
<p0>Target files</p0> <s1>Plain text files</s1>
<p0>目标文件</p0> <s1>纯文本文件</s1>

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FilesToTranslate.xml

3528
<p0>Source files</p0> <s1>Plain text files</s1>
<p0>源文件</p0> <s1>纯文本文件</s1>

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FilesToTranslate.xml

3529
Plain text files
纯文本文件

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FilesToTranslate.xml

3530
<p0>File formats</p0> <s1>Unformatted</s1> <s2>Source files</s2>
<p0>文件格式</p0> <s1>无格式</s1> <s2>源文件</s2>

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FilesToTranslate.xml

3531
Plain text files contain text only, so their translation is as simple as typing the translation.
纯文本文件中只含有文本，因为对它们的翻译工作就像输入翻译一样简单。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FilesToTranslate.xml

3532
There are several methods to specify the file's encoding so that its contents are not garbled when opened in <a0>OmegaT</a0>.
有多种方法可以指定文件的编码，以确保 <a0>OmegaT</a0> 打开它们时不会显示乱码。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FilesToTranslate.xml

3533
Such files do not contain any formatting information beyond the "white space" used to align text, indicate paragraphs or insert page breaks.
这样的文本除了用于对齐文本、标示段落或插入页面的“空白”之外没有任何格式化信息。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FilesToTranslate.xml

3534
They are not able to contain or retain information regarding the color, font etc of the text.
它们无法包含或保留关于文本的颜色、字体等的信息。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FilesToTranslate.xml

3535
Currently, <a1>OmegaT</a1> supports the following plain text formats:
目前，<a1>OmegaT</a1> 支持以下纯文本格式：

Fu Rhong

Magento CE Locale CSV文件（*.csv）

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FilesToTranslate.xml

3545
Other plain text file types can be handled by <a0>OmegaT</a0> by associating their file extension to a supported file type (for example, .pod files can be associated to the ASCII text filter) and by pre-processing them with specific segmentation rules.
<a0>OmegaT</a0> 可以处理的其它的纯文本文件可以通过将其文件扩展名关联到所支持的文件类型（比方说，.pod 文件可以关联到 ASCII 文本过滤器）并使用特定的分割 规则来进行预处理。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FilesToTranslate.xml

3546
<p0>Source files</p0> <s1>PO as bilingual files</s1>
<p0>源文件</p0> <s1>PO双语文件</s1>

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FilesToTranslate.xml

3547
PO files<i0/> can contain both the source and the target text.
PO文件<i0/>可以同时包含源和目标文本。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FilesToTranslate.xml

3548
Seen from this point of view, they are plain text files<e1> plus</e1> translation memories.
从这个角度看，它们是纯文本<e1>加上</e1>翻译记忆。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FilesToTranslate.xml

3549
If for a given source segment there is as yet no existing translation in the project translation memory (project_save.tmx), the current translation will be saved in the project_save.tmx as the default translation.
如果一个片段在项目翻译记忆project_save.tmx中还没有译文，则会把当前译文作为默认译文保存到project_save.tmx中。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FilesToTranslate.xml

3550
In case, however, the same source segment already exists with a different translation, the new translation will be saved as an alternative.
然而如果相同的源片段已经存在不同的翻译，则新译文会被保存为可选译文。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FilesToTranslate.xml

3551
<p0>Target files</p0> <s1>Formatted text files</s1> <s2>Tagged text</s2>

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FilesToTranslate.xml

3552
<p0>Source files</p0> <s1>Formatted text files</s1>
<p0>源文件</p0> <s1>格式化文本文件</s1>

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FilesToTranslate.xml

3553
Formatted text files
格式化文本文件

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FilesToTranslate.xml

3554
<p0>File formats</p0> <s1>formatted</s1> <s2>Source files</s2>
<p0>文件格式</p0> <s1>格式化</s1> <s2>源文件</s2>

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FilesToTranslate.xml

3555
Formatted text files contain information such as font type, size, color etc. as well as text.
格式化文本文件除了包含文本之外，还包括字体类型、大小、颜色等信息。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FilesToTranslate.xml

3556
They are commonly created in word processors or HTML editors.
它们通常由文字处理器和 HTML 编辑器创建。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FilesToTranslate.xml

3557
Such file formats are designed to hold formatting information.
这些文件格式是设计用来保持格式信息的。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FilesToTranslate.xml

3558
The formatting information can be as simple as “this is bold”, or as complex as table data with different font sizes, colors, positions, etc.
这些格式信息可能就像 “这是粗体”一样简单，也可能是包含了不同的字体大小、颜色和位置等信息的表格数据一样复杂。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FilesToTranslate.xml

3559
In most translation jobs, it is considered important for the formatting of the original text to be retained in the translation.
在大多数翻译工作中，在译文中保留原文的格式信息是很重要的。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FilesToTranslate.xml

3560
OmegaT allows you to do this by marking the characters/words that have a special formatting with easy-to-handle tags.
通过使用易于维护的 TAG 来标记拥有特殊格式的字符或单词，OmegaT 让您能够做到这一点。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FilesToTranslate.xml

3561
Simplifying the original text formatting greatly contributes to reducing the number of tags.
对源文本格式的简化很大程度上有助于减少标签的数量。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FilesToTranslate.xml

3562
Where possible, unifying the fonts, font sizes, colors, etc. used in the document simplifies the task of translation and reduces the possible number of tag errors.
如果有可能应该考虑在文档中使用统一的字体、字体大小、颜色等，以此简化翻译工作和减少可能的标签错误。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FilesToTranslate.xml

3563
Each file type is handled differently in OmegaT.
每种文件格式在 OmegaT 中的处理方式都不同。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FilesToTranslate.xml

3564
Specific behavior can be set up in the file filters.
可在文件过滤器设置特定的动作。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FilesToTranslate.xml

3565
At the time of writing, OmegaT supports the following formatted text formats:

3587
Other formatted text file types may also be handled by OmegaT by associating their file extensions to a supported file type, assuming that the corresponding segmentation rules will segment them correctly.
其它的格式化文本文件可以通过将其文件扩展名关联到所支持的文件类型（假设相应的分割规则可以正确分割它们）来让 OmegaT 进行处理。

3589
<p0>Source files</p0> <s1>PDF files</s1>

Administrator
doc_src/FilesToTranslate.xml

3590
PDF files
PDF文件

Administrator
doc_src/FilesToTranslate.xml

3591
PDF files are a special case.
PDF文件是一个特殊的例子。

Administrator
doc_src/FilesToTranslate.xml

3592
They contain text formatting information, but such information cannot be reused by <a0>OmegaT</a0> in order to create target files.
其包含文本格式化信息，但这些信息不能被<a0>OmegaT</a0>重新使用来创建目标文件。

Administrator
doc_src/FilesToTranslate.xml

3593
Thus, PDF files are handled as plain text files, and output files are plain text files.
因此，PDF文件被当作纯文本文件处理，输出文件是纯文本文件。

Administrator
doc_src/FilesToTranslate.xml

3594
If you need to reproduce text formatting (as well as other things such as drawings) in your translation, there are three ways to try:
如果您需要在翻译中复制文本格式（以及其他东西，如绘图），有三种方法可以尝试：

Administrator
doc_src/FilesToTranslate.xml

3595
Use <a0>OmegaT’s</a0> default filter (PDF input), translate, create a target file (it will be a plain text file), add relevant formatting and items manually.
使用 <a0>OmegaT的</a0> 默认过滤器 （PDF输入），翻译， 创建目标文件（将会是纯文本文件，手动添加相关的格式和项目

Administrator
doc_src/FilesToTranslate.xml

3602
If you have a PDF file made of scanned pages (sometimes such files are referred to as ‘dead’ PDFs), you need to use an OCR (optical character recognition) program to recognize the text and convert it to a format that can be handled by OmegaT.
如果您有一个由扫描页面组成的PDF文件（有时这些文件被称为“死”PDF文件），您需要使用OCR（光学字符识别）程序来识别文本并将其转换为可由OmegaT处理的格式。

通过按下 <k0> <k1>Shift</k1> <k2>Ctrl</k2> <k3>O</k3> </k0>（字母 O 而不是数字 0）来切换不同的显示模式。

3633

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FilesToTranslate.xml

3641
When writing purely RTL text, the default (LTR) view may be used.
在编写纯自右向左文本时，将使用缺省的（自左向右）视图。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FilesToTranslate.xml

3642
In many cases, however, it is necessary to embed LTR text in RTL text.
然而在许多情况下，必须在自右向左文本中嵌入自左向右文本。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FilesToTranslate.xml

3643
For example, in OmegaT tags, product names that must be left in the LTR source language, place holders in localization files, and numbers in text.
例如，在 OmegaT 标签中，必须在自左向右源文件中保留产品名称、在本地化文件中保留占位符以及在文本中保留数字。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FilesToTranslate.xml

3644
In cases like these it becomes necessary to switch to RTL mode, so that the RTL (in fact bidirectional) text is displayed correctly.
在像这样的情况下，必须转换为自右向左模式，以正确显示自右向左（实际是双向）文本。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FilesToTranslate.xml

3645
It should be noted that when <a0>OmegaT</a0> is in RTL mode, both source and target are displayed in RTL mode.
应当注意，当 <a0>OmegaT</a0> 处于自右向左模式，源和目标都以自右向左模式显示。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FilesToTranslate.xml

3646
This means that if the source language is LTR and the target language is RTL, or vice versa, it may be necessary to toggle back and forth between RTL and LTR modes to view the source and enter the target easily in their respective modes.
这意味着如果源语言是自左向右，而目标语言是自右向左，或者反过来，就可能必须在自右向左和自左向右模式之间来回切换，以轻松地在相应的模式下查看源文件和输入译文。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FilesToTranslate.xml

3647
<p0>Right to left languages</p0> <s1>OmegaT tags in RTL languages</s1>

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FilesToTranslate.xml

3649
As stated above, OmegaT tags are LTR strings.
如上所述，OmegaT 标签是自左向右字符串。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FilesToTranslate.xml

3650
When translating between RTL and LTR languages, correctly reading the tags from the source and entering them properly in the target may require the translator to toggle between LTR and RTL modes numerous times.
如需在自右向左和自左向右之间进行翻译工作，为从源文件中正确读取标签以及在目标中正确输入，有可能需要在自左向右和自右向左模式之间来回切换多次。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FilesToTranslate.xml

3651
If the document allows, the translator is strongly encouraged to remove style information from the original document so that as few tags as possible appear in the OmegaT interface.
如果允许，极力倡导翻译人员将原始文档的风格信息删除，以确保在 OmegaT 中尽可能少地显示标签。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FilesToTranslate.xml

3652
Follow the indications given in Hints for tags management.
按照提示中提供的线索进行标签管理.

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FilesToTranslate.xml

3653
Frequently validate tags (see Tag validation) and produce translated documents (see below and Menu) at regular intervals to make it easier to catch any problems that arise.
经常验证标签（见标签验证）和每隔固定时间制作已译文档（见下文及菜单）可以更加轻松地发现导致的问题。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FilesToTranslate.xml

3654
A hint: translating a plain text version of the text and adding the necessary style in the relevant application at a later stage may turn out to be less hassle.
提示：先翻译文本的纯文本版本，稍后再通过相应程序添加必须的风格被证明是更少争议的。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FilesToTranslate.xml

Creating translated RTL documents
创建已译自右向左文档

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FilesToTranslate.xml

3659
When the translated document is created, its display direction will be the same as that of the original document.
在创建已译文档时，其显示方向将与源文本相同。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FilesToTranslate.xml

3660
If the original document was LTR, the display direction of the target document must be changed manually to RTL in its viewing application.
如果源文档是自左向右的，目标文档的显示方向可以在其查看程序中手动修改为自右向左。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FilesToTranslate.xml

3661
Each output format has specific ways of dealing with RTL display; check the relevant application manuals for details.
每个输出方式都有特定方法来处理自右向左显示，可查阅相关应用程序手册了解更多细节。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FilesToTranslate.xml

3662
For .docx files, a number of changes are however done automatically:
无论如何对于.docx文件会自动进行一些更改：

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FilesToTranslate.xml

3663
Paragraphs, sections and tables are set to bidi
段落、节和表被设为双向

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FilesToTranslate.xml

3664
Runs (text elements) are set to RTL
阅读方向（文本元素）被设为RTL

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FilesToTranslate.xml

3665
To avoid changing the target files display parameters each time the files are opened, it may be possible to change the source file display parameters such that such parameters are inherited by the target files.
为避免每次打开目标文件时都要改变其显示参数，可能修改源文件的显示参数以确保这些参数被目标文件所继承。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FilesToTranslate.xml

3666
Such modifications are possible in ODF files for example.
举例来说，这样的修改对ODF文件是可行的。

3667
<p0>Target files</p0> <s1>Formatted text</s1>

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FormattedText.xml

3668
<p0>Source files</p0> <s1>Formatted text</s1>
<p0>源文件</p0> <s1>格式化文本</s1>

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FormattedText.xml

3669
Working with formatted text
处理格式化文本

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FormattedText.xml

3670
Formatting information present in the source file usually needs to be reproduced in the target file.
在源文件中表示的格式化信息通常需要在目标文中重新创建。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FormattedText.xml

3671
The in-line formatting information made possible by the supported formats (in particular DocBook, HTML, XHTML, Open Document Format(ODF) and Office Open XML (MS Office 2007 and later) at the time of writing) is presented as tags in OmegaT.
在OmegaT中，由所支持格式（尤其是在写入DocBook、HTML、XHTML、开放文档格式（ODF）和 Office 开放 XML（MS Office 2007及更高版本）的时候）产生的内部格式化信息以标签的形式出现。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FormattedText.xml

3672
Normally tags are ignored when considering the similarity between different texts for matching purposes.
一般情况下，为匹配目的而比较不同文本的相似性时将忽略标签。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FormattedText.xml

3673
Tags reproduced in the translated segment will be present in the translated document.
在已译片段中重新创建的标签将会出现在译后文档中。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FormattedText.xml

3674
Tags
标签

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FormattedText.xml

3675
Formatting tags
格式化标签

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FormattedText.xml

3676
<p0>Tags</p0> <s1>Naming</s1>
<p0>标记</p0> <s1>命名</s1>

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FormattedText.xml

3677
Tag naming:
标签的命名：

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FormattedText.xml

3678
The tags consist of one to three characters and a number.
标签由一到三个字符和一个数字组成。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FormattedText.xml

3679
Unique numbering allows tags, corresponding to each other to be grouped together and differentiates between tags, that have the same shortcut character, but are in fact different.
唯一的编号允许我们将彼此相对应的标签组织在一起，不同的标签允许有相同的快捷字符，但实际上并不一样。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FormattedText.xml

3680
The shortcut characters used try to reflect the underlying meaning of the tag (e.g. b for bold, i for italics, etc.)
使用的快捷字符尝试反映标签所代表的格式含义（例如 b 表示粗体，i 表示斜体）。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FormattedText.xml

3681
<p0>Tags</p0> <s1>Numbering</s1>
<p0>标签</p0> <s1>编号</s1>

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FormattedText.xml

3682
Tag numbering:
标签的编号：

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FormattedText.xml

3683
Tags are numbered incrementally by tag group.
标签以标签组自增长方式进行编号。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FormattedText.xml

3684
"Tag groups" in this context are a single tag (such as <i0> and </i0>).
在这里“标签组”是单个标签（例如 <i0> 和 </i0>）。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FormattedText.xml

3685
Within a segment, the first group (pair or single) receives the number 0, the second the number 1 etc.
在片段中，第一个组（成对或单个的）获得编号 0，第二个编号为 1，以此类推。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FormattedText.xml

3686
The first example below has 3 tag groups (a pair, a single, and then another pair), the second example has one group only (a pair).
下面的第一个例子中有3个标签组（一组成对的，一组单个，另一组成对的），第二个例子中只有一组（成对的）。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FormattedText.xml

3687
<p0>Tags</p0> <s1>Pairs and singles</s1>
<p0>标签</p0> <s1>成对的和单个的</s1>

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FormattedText.xml

3688
Pairs and singles:
成对的和单个的：

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FormattedText.xml

3689
Tags are always either singles or paired.
标签不是单个的就是成对的。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FormattedText.xml

3690
Single tags indicate formatting information that does not affect the surrounding text (an extra space or line break for example).
单个标签指的是对周边文本没有影响的格式化信息（例如：额外的空格或者行终止）。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FormattedText.xml

3691
<b0><Ctr+N></b0>, <br1>
<b0><Ctr+N></b0>, <br1>

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FormattedText.xml

3692
<b2><Enter></b2><segment 2132>
<b2><Enter></b2><片段 2132>

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FormattedText.xml

3693
<br1>
<br1>

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FormattedText.xml

3694
is a single tag and does not affect any surrounding text.
是单个标签，对周围的文本不产生任何影响。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FormattedText.xml

3695
Paired tags usually indicate style information that applies to the text between the opening tag and the closing tag of a pair.
成对标签通常指对开标签和闭标签之间的文本使用格式信息的标签对。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FormattedText.xml

3696
<b0> and </b0> below are paired and affect the text log.txt.
下面的 <b0> 和 </b0> 是成对的且影响文本 log.txt。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FormattedText.xml

3697
Note that the opening tag must always come before the corresponding closing tag:
请注意开标签总是出现在闭标签的前面：

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FormattedText.xml

3698
<<l0>Log file (<b0>log.txt</b0>) for tracking operations and errors.<segment 3167></l0>
<<l0>记录文件(<b0>log.txt</b0>) for tracking operations and errors.<片段 3167></l0>

Administrator
doc_src/FormattedText.xml

3699
<a0>OmegaT</a0> creates its tags before the process of sentence segmenting.
<a0>OmegaT</a0> 在分割句子之前就进行标签创建工作。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FormattedText.xml

3700
Depending upon the segmenting rules, the pair of tags may get separated into two consecutive segments and the tag validation will err on the side of caution and mark the two segments.
根据分割规则，标签对可能会被分成两部分并出现在两个连续的片段，而标签检验会检查到这两处的部分标签并提示这两个片段出现错误。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FormattedText.xml

3701
<p0>Tags</p0> <s1>Operations</s1>
<p0>标签</p0> <s1>操作</s1>

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FormattedText.xml

3702
Tag operations
标签操作

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FormattedText.xml

3703
Care must be exercised with tags.
对于标签的操作必须谨慎。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FormattedText.xml

3704
If they are accidentally changed, the formatting of the final file may be corrupted.
如果它们被意外地改变，最终的文件格式也许会被破坏。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FormattedText.xml

3705
The basic rule is that the sequence of tags must be preserved in the same order.
基本的做法是标签序列必须保持相同的顺序。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FormattedText.xml

3706
However, it is possible, if certain rules are strictly followed, to deviate from this basic rule.
然而，在可能的情况下，如果必须严格遵循某些规则，则不必拘泥于这个基本做法。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FormattedText.xml

3707
<p0>Tags</p0> <s1>Duplication</s1>
<p0>标签</p0> <s1>复制</s1>

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FormattedText.xml

3708
Tag duplication:
标签的复制：

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FormattedText.xml

3709
To duplicate tag groups, just copy them in the position of your choice.
要复制标签组，只需将它们复制到您选择的位置。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FormattedText.xml

3710
Keep in mind that in a pair group, the opening tag must come before the closing tag.
但请记住：成对的标签组中，开标签必须出现在闭标签之前。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FormattedText.xml

3711
The formatting represented by the group you have duplicated will be applied to both sections.
您复制的标签组所代表的格式将会应用到原标签和复制标签的两个部分。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FormattedText.xml

例如：

<b0>此格式</b0>即将被复制到此处。<片段 0001>

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FormattedText.xml

3716
<p0>Tags</p0> <s1>Group deletion</s1>

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FormattedText.xml

3717
Tag group deletion:
标签组删除：

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FormattedText.xml

3718
To delete tag groups, just remove them from the segment.
要删除标签组，仅需将它们从片段中移除。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FormattedText.xml

3719
Keep in mind that a pair group must have both its opening and its closing tag deleted to ensure that all traces of the formatting are properly erased, otherwise the translated file may become corrupted.
请记住：必须同时删去一个标签组的开标签和闭标签，以确保它们所进行的格式化操作被完全清除，否则译后文件可能遭破坏而无法打开。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FormattedText.xml

3720
By deleting a tag group you will remove the related formatting from the translated file.
删除一个标签组的同时，您将会从已译文件中删除相关的格式。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FormattedText.xml

3721
Example:
例如：

Fu Rhong

<b0>此格式</b0>即将被删除。<片段 0001>

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FormattedText.xml

删除后：

Fu Rhong
