This formatting has been deleted.<segment 0001>
此格式已经被删除。<片段 0001>

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FormattedText.xml

3725
<p0>Tags</p0> <s1>Group nesting</s1>
<p0>标签</p0> <s1>组嵌套</s1>

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FormattedText.xml

3726
Tag group nesting
标签组嵌套

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FormattedText.xml

3727
Modifying tag group order may result in the nesting of a tag group within another tag group.
对标签组的顺序进行修改也许会导致一个标签组嵌套在另一个标签组中。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FormattedText.xml

3728
This is acceptable, provided the enclosing group totally encloses the enclosed group.
当封闭的组完全将另一个封闭组封装在里面时，这是可行的。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FormattedText.xml

3729
In other words, when moving paired tags, ensure that both the opening and the closing tag are both either inside or outside other tag pairs, or the translated file may be corrupted and fail to open.
换句话说，在移动成对标签时请确保开标签和闭标签同时被移动到其他标签对的内部或外部，否则译后文件可能遭破坏而无法打开。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FormattedText.xml

3730
Example:
例如：

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FormattedText.xml

3731
<b0>Formatting</b0> <b1>one</b1> is going to be nested inside formatting zero.<segment 0001>
<b0>格式</b0><b1>一</b1>即将嵌套到格式零的内部。<片段 0001>

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FormattedText.xml

3732
After nesting:
嵌套后：

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FormattedText.xml

3733
<b0>Formatting <b1>one</b1></b0> has been nested inside formatting zero.<segment 0001>
<b0>格式<b1>一</b1></b0>已经嵌套到格式零的内部。<片段 0001>

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FormattedText.xml

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FormattedText.xml

3735
Tag group overlapping
标签组重叠

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FormattedText.xml

3736
Overlapping is the result of bad manipulations of tag pairs and is guaranteed to result in formatting corruption and sometimes in the translated file not opening at all.
对标签对的错误维护将会导致重叠，也肯定会导致格式破坏以及某些情况下根本无法打开已译文件。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FormattedText.xml

例如：

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FormattedText.xml

3739

错误维护后：

Fu Rhong

3740
<b0>Formatting <b1>one</b0> </b1>is very messed up now.<segment 0001>
<b0>格式<b1>一</b0> </b1>正被弄乱了。<segment 0001>

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FormattedText.xml

3741
Tag validation options
标签验证选项

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FormattedText.xml

3742
To customize the work with tags, one can set down some of the rules in the <g0>Options > Tag validation...</g0> window:
要定制标签的操作，可在<g0>选项>标签验证</g0>窗口中设置一些规则：

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FormattedText.xml

3743
The behaviour, stated here, applies to all the source files and not just to some of the file types, like formatted text.
此处的行为、状态适用于所有的源文件而不只是某些类型的文件，如格式化文本。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FormattedText.xml

3744
Printf variables - do not check, check simple, check all
Printf变量——不检查、简单检查、全检查

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FormattedText.xml

3745
OmegaT can check that programming variables (like %s for instance) in the source exist in the translation.
OmegaT可以检查源文本中的程序变量如（%s）在译文中是否存在。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FormattedText.xml

3746
You can decide not to check at all, check for simple printf variables (like %s %d etc) or for print variables of all types.
您可以决定是否检查、检查简单的printf变量（如%s %d等）或检查所有类型的printf变量。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FormattedText.xml

3747
Check simple java MessageFormat patterns
检查简单的java MessageFormat模式

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FormattedText.xml

3748
Activating this check box will cause OmegaT to check if simple java MessageFormat tags (like {0}) are processed correctly.
选中该复选框能让OmegaT检查简单的java MessageFormat标签（如{0}）是否处理正确。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FormattedText.xml

3749
Custom tag(s) regular expression
自定义标签正则表达式：

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FormattedText.xml

3750
A regular expression entered here will cause OmegaT treat the detected instances as customer tags.
此处输入的正则表达式会让OmegaT把它的匹配实例视为客户标签。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FormattedText.xml

3751
It checks that the number of tags and their order is identical, just like it is the case for omegat-tags.
它会检查标签的编号和顺序是否一致，就如同检查omegat标签一样。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FormattedText.xml

3752
Fragment(s) that should be removed from the translation regular expression
应从译文中移除的碎片正则表达式

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FormattedText.xml

3753
One can enter a regular expression for unwanted contents in the target.
可以输入表示希望在目标删除的内容的正则表达式。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FormattedText.xml

3754
Any matches in the target segment will then be painted red, i.e. easy to identify and correct.
之后在目标片段中的任何匹配将显示为红色，这样就很容易发现和纠正。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FormattedText.xml

3755
When looking for fuzzy matches, the remove pattern is ignored.
寻找模糊匹配时，会忽略移除模式。.

17012
doc_src/FormattedText.xml

3756
A fixed penalty of 5 is added if the removed part does not match some other segment, so the match does not show up as 100%.
如果被移除的部分与其它片段不匹配，罚分为五分，因此匹配不为100%。

17012
doc_src/FormattedText.xml

3757
<p0>Tags</p0> <s1>Group validation</s1>
<p0>标签</p0> <s1>组检验</s1>

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FormattedText.xml

3758
Tag group validation
标签组检验

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FormattedText.xml

3759
<p0>Shortcuts</p0> <s1>Tag validation - Ctrl+T</s1>
<p0>快捷键</p0> <s1>标签验证——Ctrl+T</s1>

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FormattedText.xml

3760
The validate tags function detects changes to tag sequences (whether deliberate or accidental), and shows the affected segments.
验证标签功能检测发生变化的标签序列（无论是有意的还是无意的），并显示受影响的片段。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FormattedText.xml

3761
Launching this function – <g0>Ctrl+Shift+V<i1/></g0> - opens a window containing all segments in the file containing suspected broken or bad tags in the translation.
启动这一功能 – <g0>Ctrl+Shift+V<i1/></g0> -打开包含文件所有片段的窗口，这些片段中包括翻译中碎片标签或者坏的标签.

17012
doc_src/FormattedText.xml

3762
Repairing the tags and recreating the target documents is easy with the validate tags function.
通过标签检验功能可以轻松地修正标签和重新创建目标文档。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FormattedText.xml

3763
The window that opens when <g2>Ctrl+Shift+V</g2> is pressed features a 3-column table with a link to the segment, the original segment and the target segment.
按住 <g2>Ctrl+Shift+V</g2>后，窗口将打开，并出现一个表格，三列表格分别为该片段的链接，原始片段以及目标片段

17012
doc_src/FormattedText.xml

3764
Tag validation entry
标签检验条目

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FormattedText.xml

3765
The tags are highlighted in bold blue for easy comparison between the original and the translated contents.
标签用加粗蓝色突出显示，以便于对源内容和译后内容进行比较。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FormattedText.xml

3766
Click on the link to activate the segment in the Editor.
点击链接可在编辑器中激活该片段。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FormattedText.xml

3767
Correct the error if necessary (in the case above it is the missing <i2></i2> pair) and press <g0>Ctrl+Shift+V</g0> to return to the tag validation window to correct other errors.
如果有必要的话，更正错误（上例为缺失对）<i2></i2> 按下 <g0>Ctrl+Shift+V</g0> 返回标签验证窗口更正其它错误。.

17012
doc_src/FormattedText.xml

3768
Tag errors are tag sequences in the translation in which the same tag order and number as in the original segment is not reproduced.
标签错误指的是译文中的标签序列没有完全按照源片段中的标签顺序和数量复制。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FormattedText.xml

3769
Some tag manipulations are necessary and are benign, others will cause problems when the translated document is created.
某些标签操作是必要的和良性的，但有些在创建已译文档时会导致问题。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FormattedText.xml

3770
<p0>Tags</p0> <s1>Hints</s1>
<p0>标签</p0> <s1>提示</s1>

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FormattedText.xml

3771
Hints for tags management
标签管理的几点提示

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FormattedText.xml

3772
Simplify the original text
简化源文本

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FormattedText.xml

3773
Tags generally represent formatting in some form of the original text.
标签通常代表了原始文本中的某种格式。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FormattedText.xml

3774
Simplifying the original formatting greatly contributes to reducing the number of tags.
对源文本格式的简化很大程度上有助于减少标签的数量。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FormattedText.xml

3775
Where circumstances permit, unifying used fonts, font sizes, colors, etc. should be considered, as it could simplify the translation and reduce the potential for tag errors.
如果有可能，应该尽可能考虑使用统一的字体、字体大小、颜色等，以此简化翻译工作和减少可能的标签错误。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FormattedText.xml

3776
Read the tag operations section to see what can be done with tags.
查阅标签操作部分了解可以对标签做哪些处理。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FormattedText.xml

3777
Remember that if you find tags a problem in OmegaT and formatting is not extremely relevant for the current translation, removing tags may be the easiest way out of problems.
记住：如果标签问题困扰着您，而格式又不是当前翻译工作最至关紧要的事情的话，删除标签将会是解决问题的最简单途径。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FormattedText.xml

3778
Pay extra attention to tag pairs
对标签对应特别小心

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FormattedText.xml

3779
If you need to see tags in OmegaT but do not need to retain most of the formatting in the translated document you are free not to include tags in the translation.
如果需要在 OmegaT 中看到标签，但是却不需要在已译文档中保留绝大多数格式的话，可以不向译文中添加任何标签。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FormattedText.xml

3780
In this case pay extra attention to tag pairs since deleting one side of the pair but forgetting to delete the other is guaranteed to corrupt your document's formatting.
在这种情况下，要对标签对格外小心，因为删除成对标签中的一个而忘记了删除另一个的话，肯定将破坏文档格式。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FormattedText.xml

3781
Since tags are included in the text itself, it is possible to use segmentation rules to create segments with fewer tags.
因为标签包含在文本自身里面，因此可以使用片段规则来创建包含更含更少标签的片段。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FormattedText.xml

3782
This is an advanced feature and some experience is required in order for it to be applied properly.
这是一种高级功能，如果想正确使用必须具备一些经验。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FormattedText.xml

3783
OmegaT is not yet able to detect mistakes in formatting fully automatically, so it will not prompt you if you make an error or change formatting to fit your target language better.
OmegaT 目前还无法自动检测格式错误，因此如果犯了错误或者改变格式以更好适应您使用的目标语言时，它不会对您作任何提示。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FormattedText.xml

3784
Sometimes, however, your translated file may look strange, and – in the worst case – may even refuse to open.
然而有时，这些错误会导致译出的文件看起来不正常，在最坏的情况中甚至可能无法打开。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/FormattedText.xml

3785
<p0>Windows and panes in OmegaT</p0> <s1>Glossary pane</s1>
<p0>OmegaT 窗口和窗格</p0> <s1>术语表窗格</s1>

xulihang
doc_src/Glossaries.xml

3786
Glossaries
术语表

钢
doc_src/Glossaries.xml

3787
Glossaries
术语表

钢
doc_src/Glossaries.xml

3788
Glossaries are files created and updated manually for use in <a0>OmegaT</a0>.
术语表是用于 <a0>OmegaT</a0> 的文件，它由用户手工创建和更新。

xulihang
doc_src/Glossaries.xml

3789
If an <a0>OmegaT</a0> project contains one or more glossaries, any terms in the glossary which are also found in the current segment will be automatically displayed in the Glossary viewer.
如果某个 <a0>OmegaT</a0> 项目包含一个或多个术语表文件，当前片段中出现的任何术语将自动显示在术语表查看器中。

xulihang
doc_src/Glossaries.xml

3790
You define its location and name in the project properties dialog.
您可以在项目属性对话框中设定其位置和名称。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Glossaries.xml

3791
The extension must be <f0>.txt</f0> or <f1>.utf8</f1> (if not, it will be added).
扩展名必须为<f0>.txt</f0> or <f1>.utf8</f1> （如果不是的话，加上扩展名）.

17012
doc_src/Glossaries.xml

3792
The location of the file must be within the <f2>/glossary</f2> folder, but it can be in a deeper folder (e.g., <f3>glossary/sub/glossary.txt</f3>).
文件必须保存在 <f2>/glossary</f2>文件夹中，但它可以保存在/glossary的子文件夹中，如, <f3>glossary/sub/glossary.txt</f3>).

17012
doc_src/Glossaries.xml

3793
The file does not need to exist when setting it, it will be created (if necessary) when adding a glossary entry.
在设置时该文件可以不存在，在添加词条时会自动创建该文件（如果需要）。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Glossaries.xml

3794
If the file already exists, no attempt is done to verify the format or the character set of the file: the new entries will always be in tab-separated format and UTF-8.
如果该文件已存在，不会对其格式或字符集进行检查：新条目总是以tab分隔并使用UTF-8编码。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Glossaries.xml

3795
As the existing content will not be touched, damage to an existing file would be limited.
由于不会操作已有的内容，这样对已有文件的破坏则受到了限制。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Glossaries.xml

3796
Usage
用法

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Glossaries.xml

3797
<p0>Project files</p0> <s1>Glossary subfolder</s1>
<p0>项目文件</p0> <s1>术语表子目录</s1>

xulihang
doc_src/Glossaries.xml

3798
To use an existing glossary, simply place it in the<i0/> <f1>/glossary</f1> folder after creating the project.
要使用现有的术语表，只需在创建项目后将它放到<i0/> <f1>/glossary</f1> 目录下。

xulihang
doc_src/Glossaries.xml

3799
<a2>OmegaT</a2> automatically detects glossary files in this folder when a project is opened.
在打开项目时，<a2>OmegaT</a2> 自动检测该目录下的术语表文件。

xulihang
doc_src/Glossaries.xml

3800
Terms in the current segment which <a3>OmegaT</a3> finds in the glossary file(s) are displayed in the Glossary pane:
从术语表中找到当前片段中的术语后，<a3>OmegaT</a3> 将会在术语表窗格将它们显示出来。

xulihang
doc_src/Glossaries.xml

3801
Glossaries, Glossary pane
术语表，术语表窗格

xulihang
doc_src/Glossaries.xml

3802
Glossary pane
术语表窗格

xulihang
doc_src/Glossaries.xml

3803
The word before the = sign is the source term, and its translation is (or are) the words after =.
等号之前的单词是源术语，其翻译在等号（＝）之后。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Glossaries.xml

3804
The vocabulary entry can have a comment added.
词条可以有附加的注释。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Glossaries.xml

3805
The glossary function only finds exact matches with the glossary entry (e.g. does not find inflected forms etc.).
术语表功能只能找到与术语表条目精确匹配的词汇（也就是说不会找到变化的词形）。

xulihang
doc_src/Glossaries.xml

3806
New terms can be added manually to the glossary file(s) during translation, for example in a text editor.
在翻译时可以手动添加术语到术语表中，比如在文本编辑器中。

xulihang
doc_src/Glossaries.xml

3807
Newly added terms will not be recognized once the changes in the text file have been saved.
在文件中新增的术语保存后不会马上被发现。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Glossaries.xml

3808
The source term does not have to be a single-word item, as the next example shows:
源术语可以不是一个单词，例如：

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Glossaries.xml

3809

3811
The underlined item "pop-up menu" can be found in the glossary pane as "pojavni menu".
添加了下划线的项“pop-up menu”可以在术语表窗格找到并提示“pojavni menu”。

xulihang
doc_src/Glossaries.xml

3812
Highlighting it in the Glossary pane and then rightclicking insets at the cursor position in the target segment.
在术语表窗格中高亮该项，接着点击右键将其插入到当前目标片段的光标处。

xulihang
doc_src/Glossaries.xml

3813
Note that in the above case, this is just half (or even less) of the story, as the target language (Slovenian) uses declension.
必须注意在这种情况中，到这里只说到一半（甚至更少），因为目标语言（斯洛文尼亚语）具有词形变化。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Glossaries.xml

3814
So the inserted "pojavni meni" in the nominative form - has to be changed to "pojavnem meniju" , i.e. to the locative.
所以被插入的主格“pojavni meni”需要改变为“pojavnem meniju”，即转变为位置格。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Glossaries.xml

3815
So it is probably faster to type the term correctly right away without bothering with the glossary and its shortcuts.
因此直接输入术语而不通过术语表及其快捷方式可能会更快。

xulihang
doc_src/Glossaries.xml

3816
<p0>Glossaries</p0> <s1>File format</s1>
<p0>术语表</p0> <s1>文件格式</s1>

xulihang
doc_src/Glossaries.xml

3817
<p0>Project files</p0> <s1>User files</s1> <s2>Glossaries</s2>
<p0>项目文件</p0> <s1>用户文件</s1> <s2>术语表</s2>

xulihang
doc_src/Glossaries.xml

3818
File format
文件格式

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Glossaries.xml

3819
Glossary files are simple plain text files containing three-column, tab-delimited lists with the source and target terms in the first and second columns respectively.
术语表文件是简单的纯文本文件，包含了以制表符分隔的三列列表，其中第一和第二列分别对应源词汇和目标术语。

xulihang
doc_src/Glossaries.xml

3820
The third column can be used for additional information.
第三列用来保存附加信息。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Glossaries.xml

3821
You can have entries with the target column missing, i.e. just containing the source term and the comment.
您可以添加目标列为空的条目，即只包含源术语和注释。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Glossaries.xml

3822
The encoding of glossaries is determined automatically.
术语表的编码是自动决定的。

17012
doc_src/Glossaries.xml

3823
Of course, the encoding must be compatible with both the languages contained, so Unicode is recommended.
当然，编码必须和术语语言兼容，因此建议使用Unicode码。

17012
doc_src/Glossaries.xml

3824
Also supported is the CSV format.
还支持 CSV 格式。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Glossaries.xml

3825
This format is the same as the tab separated one: source term, target term.
该格式和 TAB 分隔的相同：源术语，目标术语。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Glossaries.xml

3826
Comment fields are separated by a comma ','.
注释字段使用逗号 ',' 分隔开来。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Glossaries.xml

3827
Strings can be enclosed by quotes ", which allows having a comma inside a string:
字符串需要括在引号 " 里面，这样可以在字符串中使用逗号：

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Glossaries.xml

3828
"This is a source term, which contains a comma","c'est un terme, qui contient une virgule"
"This is a source term, which contains a comma","c'est un terme, qui contient une virgule"

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Glossaries.xml

3829
<p0>Glossaries</p0> <s1>TBX format</s1>
<p0>术语表</p0> <s1>TBX 格式</s1>

xulihang
doc_src/Glossaries.xml

3830
In addition to the plain text format, TBX format <i0/> is also supported as a read-only glossary format.
除了纯文本格式， <i0/> 也支持TBX格式的只读术语。

17012
doc_src/Glossaries.xml

3831
The location of the <f1>.tbx</f1> file must be within the <f2>/glossary</f2> folder, but it can be in a deeper folder (e.g., <f3>glossary/sub/MyGlossary.tbx</f3>).
<f1>.tbx</f1> 文件的地址必须在 <f2>/glossary</f2>文件夹中，但也能存在其子文件夹下，如 <f3>glossary/sub/MyGlossary.tbx。</f3>).

doc_src/Glossaries.xml

3832
http://www.microsoft.com/Language/en-US/Terminology.aspx
http://www.microsoft.com/Language/en-US/Terminology.aspx

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Glossaries.xml

3833
<p0>Glossaries</p0> <s1>Microsoft Terminology collection</s1>
<p0>术语表</p0> <s1>微软术语集</s1>

xulihang
doc_src/Glossaries.xml

3834
TBX - Term Base eXchange - is the open, XML-based standard for exchanging structured terminological data, TBX has been approved as an international standard by LISA and ISO.
TBX（Term Base eXchange）是用于交换结构化术语数据的基于 XML 的开放标准，已经被LISA和ISO批准为国际标准。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Glossaries.xml

3835
If you have an existing terminology handling system it is quite possible it offers the export of terminology data via TBX format.
如果你已经有术语处理系统，那它很可能提供通过 TBX格式到处术语数据。.

17012
doc_src/Glossaries.xml

3836
<u0>Microsoft Terminology Collection</u0> <i1/> can be downloaded in nearly 100 languages and can serve as a cornerstone IT glossary.
<u0>可以下载Microsoft Terminology Collection</u0> <i1/>它有将近100种语言，可以作为基础的IT词汇表。

17012
doc_src/Glossaries.xml

3837
Note: the <f0>.tbx</f0> output of MultiTerm seems to not be reliable (November 2013), it is better to use the <f1>.tab</f1> output of MultiTerm instead.
注意：<f0>MultiTerm导出的.tbx格式</f0>文件似乎不太可靠（2013年11月），建议使用MultiTerm的<f1>.tab</f1>文件。

<p0>术语表</p0> <s1>创建术语表</s1>

xulihang
doc_src/Glossaries.xml

3839
How to create glossaries
如何创建术语表

xulihang
doc_src/Glossaries.xml

3840
The project setting allows one to enter a name for a writable glossary file (see beginning of this chapter).
你可以在项目设置时输入术语表文件的名字来创建可写入术语表（见本章开端）。.

17012
doc_src/Glossaries.xml

3841
Right-click in the glossary pane or press <k0>Ctrl+Shift+G</k0> to add a new entry.
在术语表窗格点击右键或按下<k0>Ctrl+Shift+G</k0>来添加新条目。

xulihang
doc_src/Glossaries.xml

3842
A dialog opens, allowing you to enter the source term, target term and any comments you may have:
在打开的对话框中可以输入源术语、目标术语及注释。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Glossaries.xml

3843
The contents of glossary files are kept in memory and are loaded when the project is opened or reloaded.
术语表文件的内容会存放到内存中，在打开或重新载入项目时加载它们。

xulihang
doc_src/Glossaries.xml

3844
Updating a glossary file is thus rather simple: press <k0>Ctrl+Shift+G</k0> and enter the new term, its translation and any comments you may have (ensuring you press tab between the fields) and save the file.
因此更新术语表变得非常简单：按下<k0>Ctrl+Shift+G</k0>并输入新术语、其翻译及注释（确保在字段间使用了TAB）并保存文件。

xulihang
doc_src/Glossaries.xml

3845
The contents of the glossary pane will be updated accordingly.
因此术语表窗格的内容将会被更新。

xulihang
doc_src/Glossaries.xml

3846
<p0>Glossaries</p0> <s1>Location of the writable glossary file</s1>
<p0>术语表</p0> <s1>可写术语表的位置</s1>

xulihang
doc_src/Glossaries.xml

3847
The location of the writable glossary file can be set in the <g0>Project > Properties ... </g0>dialog.
可写术语表的位置可在<g0>项目>属性...</g0>对话框中设定。

xulihang
doc_src/Glossaries.xml

3848
The recognized extensions are <f1>TXT</f1> and <f2>UTF8</f2>
可识别出的扩展名为<f1>TXT</f1>和<f2>UTF8</f2>

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Glossaries.xml

3849
<e0>Note: </e0>Of course there are other ways and means to create a simple file with tab delimited entries.
<e0>注：</e0>还有其他创建含TAB分隔条目的简单文件的方法。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Glossaries.xml

3850
Nothing speaks against using Notepad++ on Windows, GEdit on Linux for instance or some spreadsheet program for this purpose: any application, that can handle UTF-8 (or UTF-16 LE) and that can show white space (so that you do not miss the required <k1>TAB</k1> characters) can be used.
在Windows平台上使用 Notepad++，在Linux平台上使用 GEdit， 或者用电子表格完成都是可以的：任何能处理 UTF-8 (或者UTF-16 LE) ，以及能能显示空格（你不会漏掉必要的 <k1>TAB</k1> 字符）的应用都可以使用。

17012
doc_src/Glossaries.xml

3852
Priority glossary
优先术语

17012
doc_src/Glossaries.xml

3853

优先术语表 (默认的glossary/glossary.txt) 结果会在术语窗口和翻译建议中中优先出现。

17012
doc_src/Glossaries.xml

3854

优先术语表和非优先术语表中的术语可能混合，优先术语表中的词汇以粗体展现。

使用Trados MultiTerm

3857
Data exported from Trados MultiTerm can be used as <a0>OmegaT</a0> glossaries without further modification, provided they are given the file extension <f1>.tab</f1> and the source and target term fields are the first two fields respectively.
在 Trados MultiTerm 导出的数据可以不加修改地用作 <a0>OmegaT</a0> 术语表，只需以 <f1>.tab</f1>为扩展名，并让对应的源词汇和目标术语分别为头两个字段。

3861
Common glossary problems
常见术语表问题

xulihang
doc_src/Glossaries.xml

3862
Problem: No glossary terms are displayed - possible causes:
问题：未显示术语表术语——可能的解决方法：

xulihang
doc_src/Glossaries.xml

3863
No glossary file found in the "glossary" folder.
"glossary" 目录中没有找到术语表文件。

xulihang
doc_src/Glossaries.xml

3864
The glossary file is empty.
术语表文件为空。

xulihang
doc_src/Glossaries.xml

3865
The items are not separated with a TAB character.
词条的各项间未使用 TAB 字符分隔。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Glossaries.xml

3866
The glossary file does not have the correct extension (.tab, .utf8 or .txt).
术语表文件没有正确的拓展名 (.tab, .utf8 or .txt)。

17012
doc_src/Glossaries.xml

3867
There is no EXACT match between the glossary entry and the source text in your document - for instance plurals.
术语表词条和文档中的原文未完全匹配－－例如该词条是复数形式。

xulihang
doc_src/Glossaries.xml

3868
The glossary file does not have the correct encoding.
术语表文件没有采用正确的编码。

xulihang
doc_src/Glossaries.xml

3869
There are no terms in the current segment which match any terms in the glossary.
当前片段中没有任何术语与术语表中的术语相匹配。

xulihang
doc_src/Glossaries.xml

3870
One or more of the above problems may have been fixed, but the project has not been reloaded.
上述一个或多个问题已经被修正，但项目还没有被重新载入。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Glossaries.xml

3871
Problem: In the glossary pane, some characters are not displayed properly
问题：在术语表窗格中某些字符显示不正确。

xulihang
doc_src/Glossaries.xml

3872
...but the same characters are displayed properly in the Editing pane: the extension and the file encoding do not match.
...但在编辑窗格中能正确显示这些字符：扩展名与文件编码方式不匹配。

xulihang

3893

3894
<i2/>The options for the program start-up in this case will be read from the <e3><a4>OmegaT</a4>.l4J.ini </e3>file, which resides in the same folder as the exe file and which you can edit to reflect your setup.
<i2/>在此情形下，将从 <e3><a4>OmegaT</a4>.l4J.ini </e3> 文件读取程序选项，该文件与可执行文件在同一目录，您可对它进行修改以反映您的设置。

doc_src/InstallingAndRunning.xml

3895
The following example for the INI file reserves 1GB of memory, requests French as the user language and Canada as the country:
下面的 INI 文件将保留 1GB 内存，以法语为用户语言，将国家设置为加拿大：

Fu Rhong
doc_src/InstallingAndRunning.xml

3896
# OmegaT.exe runtime configuration
# To use a parameter, remove the '#' before the '-'
# Memory
-Xmx1024M
# Language
-Duser.language=FR
# Country
-Duser.country=CA
# OmegaT.exe runtime configuration
# To use a parameter, remove the '#' before the '-'
# Memory
-Xmx1024M
# Language
-Duser.language=FR
# Country
-Duser.country=CA

-Dsun.java2d.noddraw=false

doc_src/InstallingAndRunning.xml

3900
Upgrading OmegaT
升级 OmegaT

Fu Rhong
doc_src/InstallingAndRunning.xml

3901
This information applies only to the "Traditional" Windows versions of OmegaT.
这里的内容只适用于通过“传统”方式安装的 OmegaT 的 Windows 版本。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/InstallingAndRunning.xml

3902
It does not apply to the Web Start versions, which are upgraded automatically, nor to cross-platform versions installed on Windows.
它不适用于 Web Start 版本（它会自动更新），也不适用在 Windows 上安装的跨平台版本。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/InstallingAndRunning.xml

3903
If you already have a version of OmegaT installed on your PC and wish to upgrade to a more recent version, you have two options:
如果您已经在电脑上安装了某个版本的 OmegaT 且希望升级到最新的版本，有两种方法：

Fu Rhong
doc_src/InstallingAndRunning.xml

3904
<e0>Install over the existing installation.
<e0>使用覆盖方式进行安装。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/InstallingAndRunning.xml

3905
</e0>To do this, simply select the same installation folder as the existing installation when installing the new version.
</e0>要实现这个操作，只需将新版本安装到现有安装所在的目录。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/InstallingAndRunning.xml

3906
The "old" version of OmegaT will be overwritten, but any settings from it will be retained.
旧版本的 OmegaT 会被覆盖，不过将保留所有的设置。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/InstallingAndRunning.xml

3907
This includes preferences set from within OmegaT, any changes you have made to your<f1> OmegaT.l4J.ini</f1> file, and also your launch script (.bat file), if you are using one.
其中包括 OmegaT 中的首选项设置，对 <f1> OmegaT.l4J.ini</f1> 文件进行的所有更改以及您使用的启动脚本（.bat 文件）。

Fu Rhong

Fu Rhong
doc_src/InstallingAndRunning.xml

4023
Java Web Start technology (part of Java 1.6 and above) can be used to deploy standalone Java software applications with a single click over the network.
通过Java Web Start技术（Java 1.6及以上版本的一部分），只需一次点击就可通过网络部署独立的Java应用软件。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/InstallingAndRunning.xml

4024
Java Web Start ensures that the latest version of the application will be deployed, as well as the correct version of the Java Runtime Environment (JRE) used.
Java Web Start 能够保证部署应用程序的最新版本以及使用正确 Java运行环境（JRE）版本。

Fu Rhong

doc_src/InstallingAndRunning.xml

4077
<e0>-Duser.language=XX</e0><i1/> Normally, i.e. when <a2>OmegaT</a2> is launched without any arguments, the program first detects the language of the user's operating system.
<e0>-Duser.language=XX</e0><i1/> 正常情况下，也就是 <a2>OmegaT</a2> 不带任何参数启动的情况下，程序将首先检测用户操作系统所使用的语言。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/InstallingAndRunning.xml

4078
If a user interface in this language is available, <a3>OmegaT</a3> uses it.
如果存在所用语言的界面， <a3>OmegaT</a3> 将会使用它。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/InstallingAndRunning.xml

4079
So, if the user's operating system is Russian and <a4>OmegaT</a4> has been localized in Russian, <a5>OmegaT</a5> is displayed with a Russian user interface, Russian menus, etc.
因此，如果用户的操作系统为俄语版，而 <a4>OmageT</a4> 有俄语版的本地化版本，<a5>OmegaT</a5> 将显示为俄语用户界面、俄语菜单等等。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/InstallingAndRunning.xml

4080
If the language of the user's system is not available, <a6>OmegaT</a6> defaults to English.
如果不存在用户系统的语言，<a6>OmegaT</a6>缺省使用英语。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/InstallingAndRunning.xml

4081
This is the standard behavior.
这是标准行为。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/InstallingAndRunning.xml

4082
The <e0>"-Duser.language=XX"</e0> argument causes <a1>OmegaT</a1> to use the language specified rather than the language of the user's operating system.
<e0>"-Duser.language=XX"</e0> 参数会使得 <a1>OmegaT</a1> 使用指定的语言而不是用户操作系统的语言。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/InstallingAndRunning.xml

4083
"XX" in the command stands for the two-digit code of the desired language.
命令中的 "XX" 代表所需语言的双数字代码。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/InstallingAndRunning.xml

4084

4094

4096

4128
<p0>Running OmegaT</p0> <s1>Command line mode</s1>
<p0>运行 OmegaT</p0> <s1>命令行模式</s1>

Fu Rhong
doc_src/InstallingAndRunning.xml

4129
OmegaT in the command line mode
以命令行模式运行 OmegaT

Fu Rhong
doc_src/InstallingAndRunning.xml

4130
The purpose of the console mode is to use OmegaT as a translation tool in a scripting environment.
控制台模式的目的是将 OmegaT 用作脚本环境的翻译工具。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/InstallingAndRunning.xml

4131
When started in console mode, no GUI is loaded (so it will work on any console) and the given project is automatically processed as requested.
在控制台模式下，将不会载入任何图形化界面（因此仅在某控制台中运行），同时会自动按要求翻译指定的项目。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/InstallingAndRunning.xml

4132
Prerequisites
先决条件

Fu Rhong
doc_src/InstallingAndRunning.xml

4133
To run <a0>OmegaT</a0> in the command line mode, a valid <a1>OmegaT</a1> project must be present.
要以命令行模式运行 <a0>OmegaT</a0>，必须指定有效的 <a1>OmegaT</a1> 项目。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/InstallingAndRunning.xml

4134
The location does not matter, since you have to add it to the command line at the start-up anyway.
位置并不重要，因为无论如何启动时您都必须将位置添加到命令行。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/InstallingAndRunning.xml

4135
If you need altered settings, the configuration files must be available.
如果需要变更设置，必须提供配置文件。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/InstallingAndRunning.xml

4136
This can be achieved in two ways:
可通过两种方式达到这个目的：

Fu Rhong
doc_src/InstallingAndRunning.xml

4137
Run <a0>OmegaT</a0> normally (with the GUI) and specify the settings.
正常运行 <a0>OmegaT</a0> （带图形用户界面）并进行设置。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/InstallingAndRunning.xml

4138
If you start <a1>OmegaT</a1> in console mode, it will use the same settings.
如果以控制台模式启动 <a1>OmegaT</a1>，它将使用相同的设置。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/InstallingAndRunning.xml

4139
If you can't run <a0>OmegaT</a0> normally (no graphical environment available): copy the settings files from some other <a1>OmegaT</a1> installation on another machine to a specific folder.
如果您无法正常运行<a0>OmegaT</a0>（没有可用的图形界面）：可将另一机器上安装的<a1>OmegaT</a1>设置文件复制到特定的文件夹。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/InstallingAndRunning.xml

4140
The location does not matter, since you can add it to the command line at startup.
位置并不重要，因为无论如何，启动时您都必须将位置添加到命令行。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/InstallingAndRunning.xml

4141
The relevant files are <l2>filters.conf</l2> and <l3>segmentation.conf</l3> and can be found in the user home folder (e.g. <l4>C:\Documents and Settings\%User%\<a5>OmegaT</a5></l4> under Windows, <l6>%user%/.omegat/</l6> under Linux)
相关的文件是可在用户主目录找到的<l2>filters.conf</l2>和<l3>segmentation.conf</l3>（如：Windows系统中的<l4>C:\Documents and Settings\%User%\<a5>OmegaT</a5></l4>或Linux系统中的<l6>%user%/.omegat/</l6>）

Fu Rhong
doc_src/InstallingAndRunning.xml

4153
<l0><project-dir></l0> tells <a1>OmegaT</a1> where to find the project to translate.
<l0><project-dir></l0> 告知 <a1>OmegaT</a1> 要翻译项目的位置。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/InstallingAndRunning.xml

4154
If given, <a2>OmegaT</a2> starts in console mode and will translate the given project.
如果给出了该参数，则 <a2>OmegaT</a2> 以控制台模式启动并翻译指定的项目。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/InstallingAndRunning.xml

4155
<l0>--config-dir=<config-dir></l0> tells <a1>OmegaT</a1> in which folder the configuration files are stored.
<l0>--config-dir=<config-dir></l0>告知<a1>OmegaT</a1>配置文件所在文件夹。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/InstallingAndRunning.xml

4156
If not given, <a2>OmegaT</a2> reverts to default values (<a3>OmegaT</a3> folder under user home or, if unavailable, the current working folder).
如果没有给出该参数，<a2>OmegaT</a2>将转而使用缺省值（即用户主目录中的<a3>OmegaT</a3>文件夹，如果不可用的话则是当前的工作目录）。

Fu Rhong

Fu Rhong

4167

4169

在该模式中，OmegaT 将对齐在项目的<l0> /source/ </l0> 目录找到的 Java 属性文件在指定位置的内容。

Fu Rhong

4170

4181
All HTML files will be translated - note that the period in the usual *.html has to be escaped (\.) as specified by the rules for regular expressions

4184

如果在其子目录下有名为test.html的文件，它们会被忽略。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/InstallingAndRunning.xml

4201
This option allows the tag validation in a batch mode.
该选项支持在批处理模式中进行标签验证。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/InstallingAndRunning.xml

4202
If <l0>abort </l0>is selected, the tag validator will stop on the first invalid segment.
如果选择了<l0>abort </l0>，则标签验证器会在遇到首个非法片段时停止。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/InstallingAndRunning.xml

4203
If <l1>warn</l1> is specified, the tag validator will process all segments and write warnings about any segments with invalid tags into the file specified.
如果使用<l1>warn</l1>，则标签验证器会处理所有片段并把含非法标签片段的警告写入指定文件。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/InstallingAndRunning.xml

4204
<l0>--no-team</l0> addresses projects set up for team work.
<l0>--no-team</l0> 解决为团队工作设立的项目。.

17012
doc_src/InstallingAndRunning.xml

4205
Use it if OmegaT is not to synchronize the project contents.
使用此参数能让OmegaT不同步项目内容。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/InstallingAndRunning.xml

4206
<l0>--disable-project-locking</l0> allows, under Windows, to open the same project with several instances of OmegaT.
<l0>--disable-project-locking</l0>允许在Windows平台下打开有几个OmegaT例子的同一个项目。

17012
doc_src/InstallingAndRunning.xml

4207
By default, under Windows, <l1>omegat.project</l1> is locked, and an error message is received when trying to open a project already opened in another instance of OmegaT.
默认条件下， Windows平台下的 <l1>omegat.project</l1>文件是锁定的，试图打开在另一个OmegaT例子中已经打开的项目会报错。

17012
doc_src/InstallingAndRunning.xml

4208
With that option, no locking occurs.
在那种选项下，不会锁住。.

17012
doc_src/InstallingAndRunning.xml

4209
Quiet option
静默选项

Fu Rhong
doc_src/InstallingAndRunning.xml

4210
An extra command line parameter specific to console mode: <l0>--quiet.</l0> In the quiet mode, less info is logged to the screen.
控制台模式专用的一个附加命令行参数： <l0>--quiet</l0>。在静默【Quiet】模式下，屏幕上将显示更少的日志信息。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/InstallingAndRunning.xml

4211
The messages you would usually find in the status bar are not displayed.
在状态栏通常可以看到的所有信息都不会被显示。

4212

doc_src/InstallingAndRunning.xml

4214
Another extra command line parameter specific to console mode: <l0>--tag-validation=[abort|warn].</l0> When this parameter is added, tag validation is done prior to translation/aligning.
控制台模式专用的一个附加命令行参数：<l0>--tag-validation=[abort|warn]。</l0>添加此参数后，会在翻译/文本对齐之前验证标签。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/InstallingAndRunning.xml

4215
If the value is <l1>abort</l1>, then on tag errors the errors are printed and the program stops.
如果该参数值为 <l1>abort</l1>，那么在遇到标签错误时打印出错误，同时程序停止。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/InstallingAndRunning.xml

4216
If the value is <l2>warn</l2> then the errors are printed but OmegaT continues.
如果该参数值为 <l2>warn</l2>，则打印错误且 OmegaT 继续执行。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/InstallingAndRunning.xml

4217
Usage: <l0>java -jar <a1>OmegaT</a1>.jar /path/to/project --mode=console-translate --tag-validation=abort</l0>
用法：<l0>java -jar <a1>OmegaT</a1>.jar /path/to/project --mode=console-translate --tag-validation=abort</l0>

Fu Rhong
doc_src/InstallingAndRunning.xml

4218
<p0>Running OmegaT</p0> <s1>Building OmegaT from source</s1>
<p0>运行 OmegaT</p0> <s1>从源代码编译 OmegaT</s1>

Fu Rhong
doc_src/InstallingAndRunning.xml

4219
Building <a0>OmegaT</a0> From Source
从源代码编译 <a0>OmegaT</a0>

Fu Rhong
doc_src/InstallingAndRunning.xml

4220
Note that you will need the ant program (<e0>http://ant.apache.org/bindownload.cgi</e0>) to build your own version of OmegaT.
请注意您还需要 ant 程序（<e0>http://ant.apache.org/bindownload.cgi</e0>）来编译 OmegaT。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/InstallingAndRunning.xml

4221
Unpack the <e1>OmegaT_3.n.n_Source.zip</e1> file and enter the OmegaT_3.n.n_Source folder or enter the <e2>./omegat/</e2> folder of the SVN checked out code.
解压<e1>OmegaT_3.n.n_Source.zip</e1>文件并进入OmegaT_3.n.n_Source文件夹或SVN检出代码的<e2>./omegat/</e2>文件夹。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/InstallingAndRunning.xml

4222
Please make sure that a build.xml file is present in that folder.
请确认 build.xml 文件存在该目录中。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/InstallingAndRunning.xml

4223
Then, on the command line, type:
然后，在命令行输入：

Fu Rhong
doc_src/InstallingAndRunning.xml

4224
$ ant jar release
$ ant jar release

Fu Rhong
doc_src/InstallingAndRunning.xml

4225
This will create a full distribution of <a0>OmegaT</a0> in the ./dist/ folder, where you will find all the files necessary to run <a1>OmegaT</a1>.
该命令将在 ./dist/ 目录中创建一份完整的 <a0>OmegaT</a0> 发行文件，其中包含运行 <a1>OmegaT</a1> 需要的所有文件。

Learn to use OmegaT in 5 minutes!
Learn to use OmegaT in 5 minutes!

钢
doc_src/InstantStartGuide.xml

4227
<p0>Project</p0> <s1>Create / open new</s1>
<p0>项目</p0> <s1>新创建/打开</s1>

Fu Rhong
doc_src/InstantStartGuide.xml

4228
Set up a new project
创建新项目

Fu Rhong
doc_src/InstantStartGuide.xml

4229
<r0>Note:</r0> On an Apple Mac, use the <k1>Command</k1> key instead of the <k2>Control</k2> key.
<r0>注：</r0>在Apple Mac上，请使用<k1>Command</k1>代替<k2>Control</k2>键。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/InstantStartGuide.xml

4230
<p0>Menu Project</p0> <s1>New...</s1>
<p0>项目菜单</p0> <s1>新建...</s1>

xulihang
doc_src/InstantStartGuide.xml

4231
To start using OmegaT, first create a project that will hold all your files, such as your source file, translation memories, glossaries, and eventually your translated file.
开始使用OmegaT时首先要创建项目，用来保存您的所有文件，例如源文件、翻译记忆、术语表及您要翻译的文件。

xulihang
doc_src/InstantStartGuide.xml

4232
In the <g0>Project</g0> menu, select <m1><g2>New...</g2></m1> and type a name for your project.
在<g0>项目</g0>菜单中选择<m1><g2>新建...</g2></m1>并输入项目名称。

xulihang
doc_src/InstantStartGuide.xml

4233
Remember where you are creating the project, because you will need to return to it later.
记住您创建项目的位置，之后还需要返回这里。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/InstantStartGuide.xml

4234
After you give your project a name, the <g0>Create New Project</g0> dialog will open.
给项目命名后将出现<g0>创建新项目</g0>对话框。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/InstantStartGuide.xml

4235
At the top of that dialog, select your source file's language and the language that your translated file will be, and click <g1>OK</g1> to continue.
在该对话框顶端选择源文件语言和目标语言，并点击<g1>OK</g1>继续。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/InstantStartGuide.xml

4236
If you are interested in other settings of this dialog, you can return to it any time by pressing <k0>Ctrl+E.</k0>
如果对该对话框中的其他设置有兴趣，您可在任何时候按下<k0>Ctrl+E</k0>来将其打开。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/InstantStartGuide.xml

4237
Next, the <g0>Project Files</g0> dialog opens.
接着，<g0>项目文件</g0>对话框出现。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/InstantStartGuide.xml

4238
Click on <g1>Copy Files to Source Folder...</g1> to select your source files.
点击<g1>导入源文件...</g1>按钮选择源文件。

xulihang
doc_src/InstantStartGuide.xml

4239
OmegaT will then copy the selected files to the <f2>/source/</f2> subfolder of your newly created project.
OmegaT跟着会复制选择的文件到新建项目的<f2>/source/</f2>子文件夹。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/InstantStartGuide.xml

4240
After the source files have loaded in the <g3>Editor</g3> pane, you can close the <g4>Project Files</g4> dialog.
当<g3>编辑器</g3>窗格中加载了源文件后，您可以关闭<g4>项目文件</g4>对话框。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/InstantStartGuide.xml

4241
Translate the file
翻译文件

Fu Rhong
doc_src/InstantStartGuide.xml

4242
OmegaT will present one segment at a time for you to translate.
OmegaT每次呈现一个片段供您翻译。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/InstantStartGuide.xml

4243
After you have translated each segment, press <k0>Ctrl+U</k0> to move to the next untranslated segment (or <k1>Ctrl+Shift+U</k1> to move to the next translated segment).
翻译一个片段后，按下<k0>Ctrl+U</k0>将前往下一个未译片段（或使用<k1>Ctrl+Shift+U</k1>前往下一个已译片段）。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/InstantStartGuide.xml

4244
Whenever you want to see what your translation will look like in its final format, press <k2>Ctrl+D</k2> to generate the translated documents, which will be created in the <f3>/target/</f3> subfolder of your project folder.
当您想看看译文的最终格式时，按下<k2>Ctrl+D</k2>会生成已译文档，它们在项目文件夹中的<f3>/target/</f3>子文件夹。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/InstantStartGuide.xml

4245
During translation, use the <g4>Edit</g4> and <g5>Go To</g5> menus to perform various useful functions.
在翻译过程中使用<g4>编辑</g4>和<g5>前往</g5>菜单可以执行多种有用的功能。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/InstantStartGuide.xml

4246
Validate your tags
检验标签

Fu Rhong
doc_src/InstantStartGuide.xml

4247
If your source files are formatted files, e.g. Microsoft Word, LibreOffice Writer or HTML, OmegaT will convert the formatting into tags that surround the text that you translate.
如果源文件是格式化文件，如Microsoft Word、LibreOffice Writer或HTML，OmegaT会把待译文本周围的格式转换为标签。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/InstantStartGuide.xml

4248
Often documents will also have tags that have nothing to do with formatting, but which are also important in the source files (and in the translated files).
经常文档都会含有无需处理的格式标签，但它们对源文件（和已译文件）也很重要。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/InstantStartGuide.xml

4249
A source sentence might look like:
源语言也许类似这样：

Fu Rhong
doc_src/InstantStartGuide.xml

4250
OmegaT, however, will present this sentence in the following fashion:
但OmegaT会把该语句以下面的样式呈现：

Fu Rhong
doc_src/InstantStartGuide.xml

4251
The tags in OmegaT are greyed, so they are easy to recognise.
OmegaT中的标记为灰色，因此很容易识别。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/InstantStartGuide.xml

4252
They are protected, so that you cannot modify their contents, but you can delete them, enter them by hand or move them around in the target sentence.
这些标签受到保护，这样您无法修改它们的内容，可以删除、手动输入或移动它们在目标语句中的位置。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/InstantStartGuide.xml

4253
However, if you made mistakes when you typed the formatting tags, your translated files might fail to open.
无论如何当您输入了错误的格式标签，那么已译文件可能无法打开。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/InstantStartGuide.xml

4254
Therefore, press <k0>Ctrl+Shift+V</k0> before you generate your translated files, to validate that your tags are correct.
因此，在生成已译文件前请按下<k0>Ctrl+Shift+V</k0>以检验标签是否正确。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/InstantStartGuide.xml

4255
Generate the translated file
生成已译文件

Fu Rhong
doc_src/InstantStartGuide.xml

4256
Once you have made certain that there are no tag errors in your translation, press <k0>Ctrl+D</k0> to generate the target files, which will be created in the <f1>/target/</f1> subfolder of your project folder.
当您确定在翻译中没有标签错误后，按下<k0>Ctrl+D</k0>则会在项目文件夹的<f1>/target/</f1>子文件夹中生成目标文件。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/InstantStartGuide.xml

4257
Few more things to remember
了解更多

Fu Rhong
doc_src/InstantStartGuide.xml

4258
If a file does not load into the <g0>Editor</g0> pane, then it could be that it is in a format that doesn't work in OmegaT.
如果某个文件无法加载到<g0>编辑器</g0>窗格，那么该文件可能是OmegaT无法处理的格式。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/InstantStartGuide.xml

4259
See <l1>File Filters</l1> for a list of file formats that OmegaT can handle.
请参阅<l1>文件过滤器</l1>了解OmegaT能处理的文件格式列表。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/InstantStartGuide.xml

4260
You can create a new project for each new job, and you can add new source files to a project at anytime.
你可以为每一份新工作创建一个新项目，可以在任何时候增添新的源文档到项目中。

17012
doc_src/InstantStartGuide.xml

4261
To remind yourself of the project's initial settings, open the project properties dialog by pressing <k0>Ctrl+E</k0>.
为了记住项目的初始设置，按下<k0>Ctrl+E</k0>打开项目属性对话框。.

17012
doc_src/InstantStartGuide.xml

4262
To see a list of files in the project, open the <g1>Project Files</g1> dialog by pressing <k2>Ctrl+L</k2>.
要查看项目中文件列表，请按下<k2>Ctrl+L</k2>打开<g1>项目文件</g1>对话框。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/InstantStartGuide.xml

4263
At the end of your translation, OmegaT exports three translation memories called <f0>level1</f0>, <f1>level2</f1> and <f2>omegat</f2> to your project folder.
在翻译结束后，OmegaT会导出名称分别为<f0>level1</f0>、<f1>level2</f1>和<f2>omegat</f2>的三种翻译记忆文件到项目文件夹。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/InstantStartGuide.xml

4264
The <f3>level1</f3> and <f4>level2</f4> memories can be shared with users of other translation programs.
<f3>level1</f3>和<f4>level2</f4>翻译记忆可以共享给使用其他翻译工具的用户。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/InstantStartGuide.xml

4265
The memory named <f5>omegat</f5> can be used by OmegaT itself, in future projects that you create.
名称为<f5>omegat</f5>的翻译记忆可被OmegaT自身用于将来创建的项目。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/InstantStartGuide.xml

4266
If you place such translation memory files in the <f6>/tm/</f6> subfolder of a project, OmegaT will automatically search them for similar segments, called "fuzzy matches".
如果您把这种翻译记忆文件放在项目的<f6>/tm/</f6>子文件夹，则OmegaT会自动在其中搜索类似的片段（被称为“模糊匹配”）。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/InstantStartGuide.xml

4267
You can add a new term to the glossary by pressing <k0>Ctrl+Shift+G</k0>, or copy existing glossaries to the <f1>/glossary/</f1> subfolder of your project folder, and OmegaT will automatically look up words in them.
按下<k0>Ctrl+Shift+G</k0>可以添加新术语到术语表，也可以复制现有的术语表到项目文件夹的<f1>/glossary/</f1>子文件夹，OmegaT会自动在其中搜索单词。

xulihang
doc_src/InstantStartGuide.xml

4268
It is often useful to search for words and phrases in the source text and in your translation, so press <k0>Ctrl+F</k0> for the <g1>Text Search</g1> dialog at any time.
常常需要在源文本和翻译中搜索单词和短语，需要时请按下<k0>Ctrl+F</k0>打开<g1>文本搜索</g1>对话框。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/InstantStartGuide.xml

4321
1.

Fu Rhong
doc_src/license.txt

4322
Source Code.
未翻译

没有修改者
doc_src/license.txt

4323
The "source code" for a work means the preferred form of the work
for making modifications to it.
未翻译

没有修改者
doc_src/license.txt

4324
"Object code" means any non-source
form of a work.
未翻译

没有修改者
doc_src/license.txt

4325
A "Standard Interface" means an interface that either is an official
standard defined by a recognized standards body, or, in the case of
interfaces specified for a particular programming language, one that
is widely used among developers working in that language.
未翻译

没有修改者
doc_src/license.txt

4326
The "System Libraries" of an executable work include anything, other
than the work as a whole, that (a) is included in the normal form of
packaging a Major Component, but which is not part of that Major
Component, and (b) serves only to enable use of the work with that
Major Component, or to implement a Standard Interface for which an
implementation is available to the public in source code form.
未翻译

没有修改者
doc_src/license.txt

4327
A
"Major Component", in this context, means a major essential component
(kernel, window system, and so on) of the specific operating system
(if any) on which the executable work runs, or a compiler used to
produce the work, or an object code interpreter used to run it.
未翻译

没有修改者
doc_src/license.txt

4328
The "Corresponding Source" for a work in object code form means all
the source code needed to generate, install, and (for an executable
work) run the object code and to modify the work, including scripts to
control those activities.
未翻译

没有修改者
doc_src/license.txt

4329
However, it does not include the work's
System Libraries, or general-purpose tools or generally available free
programs which are used unmodified in performing those activities but
which are not part of the work.
未翻译

没有修改者
doc_src/license.txt

4330
For example, Corresponding Source
includes interface definition files associated with source files for
the work, and the source code for shared libraries and dynamically
linked subprograms that the work is specifically designed to require,
such as by intimate data communication or control flow between those
subprograms and other parts of the work.
未翻译

没有修改者
doc_src/license.txt

4331
The Corresponding Source need not include anything that users
can regenerate automatically from other parts of the Corresponding
Source.
未翻译

没有修改者
doc_src/license.txt

4332
The Corresponding Source for a work in source code form is that
same work.
未翻译

没有修改者
doc_src/license.txt

measure under any applicable law fulfilling obligations under article
11 of the WIPO copyright treaty adopted on 20 December 1996, or
similar laws prohibiting or restricting circumvention of such
measures.
未翻译

doc_src/license.txt

4347
When you convey a covered work, you waive any legal power to forbid
circumvention of technological measures to the extent such circumvention
is effected by exercising rights under this License with respect to
the covered work, and you disclaim any intention to limit operation or
modification of the work as a means of enforcing, against the work's
users, your or third parties' legal rights to forbid circumvention of
technological measures.

4421
A "User Product" is either (1) a "consumer product", which means any
tangible personal property which is normally used for personal, family,
or household purposes, or (2) anything designed or sold for incorporation
into a dwelling.
未翻译

没有修改者
doc_src/license.txt

4422
In determining whether a product is a consumer product,
doubtful cases shall be resolved in favor of coverage.
未翻译

没有修改者
doc_src/license.txt

4423
For a particular
product received by a particular user, "normally used" refers to a
typical or common use of that class of product, regardless of the status
of the particular user or of the way in which the particular user
actually uses, or expects or is expected to use, the product.
未翻译

没有修改者
doc_src/license.txt

4424
A product
is a consumer product regardless of whether the product has substantial
commercial, industrial or non-consumer uses, unless such uses represent
the only significant mode of use of the product.
未翻译

没有修改者
doc_src/license.txt

4425
"Installation Information" for a User Product means any methods,
procedures, authorization keys, or other information required to install
and execute modified versions of a covered work in that User Product from
a modified version of its Corresponding Source.
未翻译

没有修改者
doc_src/license.txt

4426
The information must
suffice to ensure that the continued functioning of the modified object
code is in no case prevented or interfered with solely because
modification has been made.
未翻译

没有修改者
doc_src/license.txt

4427
If you convey an object code work under this section in, or with, or
specifically for use in, a User Product, and the conveying occurs as
part of a transaction in which the right of possession and use of the
User Product is transferred to the recipient in perpetuity or for a
fixed term (regardless of how the transaction is characterized), the
Corresponding Source conveyed under this section must be accompanied
by the Installation Information.
未翻译

没有修改者
doc_src/license.txt

4428
But this requirement does not apply
if neither you nor any third party retains the ability to install
modified object code on the User Product (for example, the work has
been installed in ROM).
未翻译

没有修改者
doc_src/license.txt

4429
The requirement to provide Installation Information does not include a
requirement to continue to provide support service, warranty, or updates
for a work that has been modified or installed by the recipient, or for
the User Product in which it has been modified or installed.

没有修改者

4466

license from a particular copyright holder is reinstated (a)
provisionally, unless and until the copyright holder explicitly and
finally terminates your license, and (b) permanently, if the copyright
holder fails to notify you of the violation by some reasonable means

4467

violation by some reasonable means, this is the first time you have

4494

then you must either (1) cause the Corresponding Source to be so

patent license for this particular work, or (3) arrange, in a manner
consistent with the requirements of this License, to extend the patent
license to downstream recipients.

country that you have reason to believe are valid.

you grant is automatically extended to all recipients of the covered

Machine Translation
机器翻译

钢
doc_src/MachineTranslation.xml

4565
Machine Translation
机器翻译

钢
doc_src/MachineTranslation.xml

4566
<p0>Machine Translation</p0> <s1>Introduction</s1>
<p0>机器翻译</p0> <s1>介绍</s1>

Fu Rhong
doc_src/MachineTranslation.xml

4567
Introduction
介绍

Fu Rhong
doc_src/MachineTranslation.xml

4568
As opposed to user-generated translation memories (as in the case of <a0>OmegaT</a0>) Machine translation (MT) tools use rule-based linguistic tools to create a translation of the source segment without the need for a translation memory.
与用户生成的翻译记忆（就像 <a0>OmegaT</a0>）相对的是机器翻译 (MT) 工具，它使用基于规则的语言学工具而不是翻译记忆来创建源片段的翻译。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/MachineTranslation.xml

4569
Statistical learning techniques, based on source and target texts, are used to build a translation model.
使用根据源和目标文本的统计学习技术来构建翻译模型。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/MachineTranslation.xml

4570
Machine translation services have been achieving good and steadfastly improving results in research evaluations.
机器翻译服务已经在研究评估中实现了较好且稳定的结果改善。

weiyi
doc_src/MachineTranslation.xml

4571
To activate any of the Machine Translation services, go to <g0>Options > Machine Translate ...</g0> and activate the service desired.
要激活某种机器翻译服务，请前往<g0>选项>机器翻译...</g0>，然后激活需要的服务。

xulihang
doc_src/MachineTranslation.xml

4572
Note that they are all web-based: you will have to be on-line if you want to use them.
需要注意的是它们都是基于网络：您必须在线才能使用它们。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/MachineTranslation.xml

4573
<p0>Machine Translation</p0> <s1>Google Translate</s1>
<p0>机器翻译</p0> <s1>谷歌翻译</s1>

Fu Rhong
doc_src/MachineTranslation.xml

4574
Google Translate
谷歌翻译

Fu Rhong
doc_src/MachineTranslation.xml

4575
Google Translate is a payable service offered by Google, for translating sentences, web sites and complete texts between an ever-growing number of languages.
谷歌翻译是由谷歌提供的付费服务，可用于翻译句子，网站和日益增多的语言的竞争文本。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/MachineTranslation.xml

4576
At the time of writing the list includes more than 50 languages, from Albanian to Yiddish, including of course all the major languages.
在编写此文档时，其支持的语言超过50多种，从阿尔巴尼亚语到意第绪语，其中当然包括所有主要语言。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/MachineTranslation.xml

4577
The current version of the service is based on usage, with the price of 20 USD per million characters at the time of writing.
该服务的当前版本根据使用付费的，在编写此文档时每百万字符 20美元 的价格。

weiyi
doc_src/MachineTranslation.xml

4578
https://developers.google.com/translate/v2/pricing?hl=en-US
https://developers.google.com/translate/v2/pricing?hl=en-US

Fu Rhong
doc_src/MachineTranslation.xml

4579
<e0>Important: </e0>Google Translate API v2 requires billing information for all accounts before you can start using the service (see <u1>Pricing and Terms of Service</u1> for more).
<e0>重要提示：</e0>在您使用谷歌翻译 API v2 的服务前需要所有客户的账单信息（请参阅<u1>价格和服务条款</u1>了解更多信息）。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/MachineTranslation.xml

4580
To identify yourself as a valid user for the Google services, you use your private unique key sent to you by Google, when you have registered for the service.
为了向谷歌服务表明您是合法用户，您需要使用在注册服务后谷歌发给您的唯一的API Key。

weiyi
doc_src/MachineTranslation.xml

4581
See chapter <l2>Installing and Running</l2>, section Launch command arguments, for details on how to add this key to the OmegaT environment.
请参阅<l2>安装和运行</l2>章节的运行命令参数部分，了解如何添加该API Key到 OmegaT 环境中的详细情况。

weiyi
doc_src/MachineTranslation.xml

4582
The quality of the Google Translate translation depends on one side on the reservoir of target-language texts and the availability of their bilingual versions, on the other hand on the quality of the models built.
谷歌翻译的质量当然一方面取决于目标语言文本和双语版本的可用性，另一方面取决于所创建模型的质量。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/MachineTranslation.xml

4583
It is pretty much certain that while the quality may be insufficient in some cases, it will definitely get better with time and not worse.
有一点可以肯定，在某些情况下，其质量肯定不够好。但翻译质量肯定会在不断提高。

weiyi
doc_src/MachineTranslation.xml

4584
<a0>OmegaT</a0> users and Google Translate
<a0>OmegaT</a0> 用户和谷歌翻译

Fu Rhong
doc_src/MachineTranslation.xml

4585
The <a0>OmegaT</a0> user is not forced to use Google Translate.
<a0>OmegaT</a0> 并不强迫用户使用谷歌翻译。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/MachineTranslation.xml

4586
If used, neither the user's decision to accept the translation nor the final translation are made available to Google.
如果用了，既不表示用户要接受该译文，更不表示最终译文会提供给谷歌。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/MachineTranslation.xml

4587
The following window shows an example of a) the English source b) Spanish and c) Slovenian Google Translate translation.
下面的窗口展示了一个 a) 英文原文 b) 西班牙语 和 c) 斯洛文尼亚语 的谷歌翻译译文。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/MachineTranslation.xml

4588
Google Translate - example
谷歌翻译 - 示例

Fu Rhong
doc_src/MachineTranslation.xml

4589
The Spanish translation is better than the Slovenian.
西班牙语译文要好于斯洛文尼亚语的。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/MachineTranslation.xml

4590
Note <e0>interesar</e0> and<e1> navegar</e1> in Spanish, are correctly translated as the verbs interest and sail respectively.
注意西班牙语中的 <e0>interesar</e0> 和 <e1> navegar</e1> 被正确地翻译成动词 "interest" 和 "sail"。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/MachineTranslation.xml

4591
In the Slovenian version both words have been translated as nouns.
在斯洛文尼亚语版本中，两个词都被译成了名词。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/MachineTranslation.xml

4592
It is actually quite probable that the Spanish translation is based at least partially on the actual translation of the book.
很可能西班牙语的翻译至少部分基于实际的书籍译文。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/MachineTranslation.xml

4593
<p0>Shortcuts</p0> <s1>Machine Translate - Ctrl+M</s1>
<p0>快捷键</p0> <s1>机器翻译——Ctrl+M</s1>

Fu Rhong
doc_src/MachineTranslation.xml

4594
Once you have activated the service, a suggestion for the translation will appear in the Machine Translate pane every time a new source segment is opened.
当您激活了该服务后，每次打开新的源片段时，其对应的翻译建议将会出现在机器翻译窗格中。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/MachineTranslation.xml

4595
If you find the suggestion acceptable, press <k0> <k1><i2/>Ctrl</k1> <k3>M</k3> </k0> to replace the target part of the opened segment with the suggestion.
如果发现了可接受的建议，按下<k0> <k1><i2/>Ctrl</k1> <k3>M</k3> </k0> 可使用它替换已打开片段的目标部分。

weiyi
doc_src/MachineTranslation.xml

4596
In the above segment, for instance, <k4> <k5>Ctrl</k5> <k6>M</k6> </k4> would replace the Spanish version with the Slovenian suggestion.
例如在上面的片段中，使用 <k4> <k5>Ctrl</k5> <k6>M</k6> </k4> 将会用斯洛文尼亚语的建议版本覆盖西班牙语的版本。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/MachineTranslation.xml

4597
If you do not wish <a0>OmegaT</a0> to send your source segments to Google to get translated, untick the Google Translate menu entry in Options.
如果不希望 <a0>OmegaT</a0> 把源片段发送至谷歌获取译文，请取消选项菜单中的谷歌翻译菜单项。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/MachineTranslation.xml

4598
Note that nothing but your source segment is sent to the MT service.
提示：除了源片段外，其他任何内容不会发送至机器翻译服务。

weiyi
doc_src/MachineTranslation.xml

4599
The online version of Google Translate allows the user to correct the suggestion and send the corrected segment in.
谷歌翻译的在线版本允许用户纠正翻译建议和发送正确的片段。

然而此功能在 OmegaT 中尚未实现。

doc_src/MachineTranslation.xml

4605
<p0>Machine Translation</p0> <s1>Apertium</s1>
<p0>机器翻译</p0> <s1>Apertium</s1>

Fu Rhong
doc_src/MachineTranslation.xml

4606
Apertium
Apertium

钢
doc_src/MachineTranslation.xml

4607
http://www.apertium.org/
http://www.apertium.org/

Fu Rhong
doc_src/MachineTranslation.xml

4608
<u0>Apertium</u0> is a free/open-source machine translation platform, initially aimed at related-language pairs, like CA, ES, GA, PT, OC and FR but recently expanded to deal with more divergent language pairs (such as English-Catalan).
<u0>Apertium</u0> 是自由、开源的机器翻译平台，最初致力于相关的语言对，例如 CA、ES、GA、PT、OC 以及 FR，不过最近扩展为能够处理更多的其他语言对（例如英语-加泰罗尼亚语）。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/MachineTranslation.xml

4609
Check the web site for the latest list of implemented language pairs.
请参阅网站了解已实现语言对的最新列表。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/MachineTranslation.xml

4610
The platform provides
该平台提供

Fu Rhong
doc_src/MachineTranslation.xml

4611
a language-independent machine translation engine
语言独立的机器翻译引擎

Fu Rhong
doc_src/MachineTranslation.xml

4612
tools to manage the linguistic data necessary to build a machine translation system for a given language pair
工具用来管理必要语言学数据，确保可以根据已有语言对建立机器翻译系统

weiyi
doc_src/MachineTranslation.xml

4613
linguistic data for a growing number of language pairs
用于不断增长的语言对数目的语言学数据

Fu Rhong
doc_src/MachineTranslation.xml

4614
Apertium uses a shallow-transfer machine translation engine which processes the input text in stages, as in an assembly line: de-formatting, morphological analysis, part-of-speech disambiguation, shallow structural transfer, lexical transfer, morphological generation, and re-formatting.
Apertium 使用浅层传播机器翻译引擎（shallow-transfer machine translation engine ）来处理输入的文本，就像汇编行：去除格式，形态分析，语音消歧，浅层结构传播，词汇传播，形态生成以及重新格式化。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/MachineTranslation.xml

4615
It is possible to use Apertium to build machine translation systems for a variety of language pairs; to that end, Apertium uses simple XML-based standard formats to encode the linguistic data needed (either by hand or by converting existing data), which are compiled using the provided tools into the high-speed formats used by the engine.
使用 Apertium 为各种语言对构建机器翻译系统是可行的，在底端，Apertium 使用基于 XML 的简单标准格式对需要的语言学数据（通过手工或转换现有数据）进行编码，并使用提供的工具被编译为引擎可用的高级格式。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/MachineTranslation.xml

4899
Aggressive Font Fallback
突出后备字体

weiyi
doc_src/Menu.xml

4900
Check this option in case OmegaT does not display some glyphs properly (even if the fonts containing the relevant glyphs are installed on your machine).
选中此选项以防止OmegaT不能正确显示某些字形（即使相关字体已在您的计算机中安装）。

Andrew
doc_src/Menu.xml

4901
Note: on Windows it seems that this manual font fallback mechanism can interfere with standard font fallback, causing undesirable font substitution.
注意：Windows操作系统中手动突出后备字体可能会影响标准后备字体，导致不理想的字体替换。

Andrew
doc_src/Menu.xml

4902
For that reason, it is OFF by default.

钢
doc_src/Menu.xml

4922
Displays the Match Statistics for the project: the number of repetitions, exact matches, fuzzy matches and no-matches, for segments, words and in characters.
显示当前项目的匹配统计：对于片段、单词和字符的重复、精确匹配、模糊匹配和无匹配的数目。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Menu.xml

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Menu.xml

4924

4935
Machine Translate
机器翻译

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Menu.xml

4936
Allows you to activate/deactivate the Machine Translation tools offered.
允许您激活/取消激活程序提供的机器翻译工具。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Menu.xml

4937
When active, <k0> <k1>Ctrl</k1> <k2>M</k2> </k0> will insert the suggestion into the target part of the current segment.
激活后，使用 <k0> <k1>Ctrl</k1> <k2>M</k2> </k0> 可将翻译建议插入到当前片段的目标部分。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Menu.xml

4938
For confidentiality reasons, you may want to not send all the segments to the Machine Translation tool.
由于保密原因，您可能不想将所有的片段上传至机器翻译工具。

weiyi
doc_src/Menu.xml

4939
By unchecking <e0>Automatically Fetch Translations</e0> option, machine translations will be fetched only upon invoking <k1> <k2>Ctrl</k2> <k3>M</k3> </k1> (<k4> <k5>Cmd</k5> <k6>M</k6> </k4> on OS X) on the current segment.
关闭<e0>自动获取翻译</e0>选项，程序只会在按下<k1> <k2>Ctrl</k2> <k3>M</k3> </k1> （在OS X操作系统中为<k4> <k5>Cmd</k5> <k6>M</k6> </k4>）后获取当前片段的机器翻译。

Andrew
doc_src/Menu.xml

4940
Then you must use <k7> <k8>Ctrl</k8> <k9>M</k9> </k7> a second time, to insert the suggestion.
随后，您必须再次使用 <k7> <k8>Ctrl</k8> <k9>M</k9> </k7> 以插入建议。

weiyi
doc_src/Menu.xml

4941
Check <e0>Untranslated Segments Only</e0> option to deactivate Machine Translation tools on already translated segments.
选择<e0>仅未翻译片段</e0>选项为已翻译片段关闭机器翻译工具。

Andrew
doc_src/Menu.xml

4942
Note: in that case, <k1> <k2>Ctrl</k2> <k3>M</k3> </k1> can still be used, to force a Machine Translation call on an already translated segment.
提示：在上述情况中，<k1> <k2>Ctrl</k2> <k3>M</k3> </k1>仍可用来为已翻片段获取机器翻译。

Andrew
doc_src/Menu.xml

4943
Glossary
术语表

xulihang
doc_src/Menu.xml

4944
The <g0>Display Context Description for TBX Glossaries</g0> option allows to show or hide contextual information with the terms (that come from TBX glossaries located in <f1>glossary</f1> folder) in the Glossary pane.
<g0>展示TBX术语表文本描述</g0> 选项可在术语表窗口展示或隐藏术语文本信息（来自TBX术语表中的<f1>glossary</f1> 文件夹）。

Andrew
doc_src/Menu.xml

4945
If <g0>Use Terms Appearing Separately in the Source Text</g0> option is ON, the glossary entry "itema itemb" will be found in the source text "itema other word itemb".
如果 <g0>源文件中使用分开出现的术语</g0>选项开启，术语条目 "itema itemb" 会在源文件 "itema other word itemb" 中显示。

Andrew
doc_src/Menu.xml

4946
If the option is OFF, the glossary entry above will not be found.
如果关闭此选项，上述术语条目将不会显示。

Andrew
doc_src/Menu.xml

4947
If <g0>Use Stemming for Glossary Entries</g0> option is ON, with an English source text, the glossary entry "element" will be found if the source text contains "elements".
如果<g0>使用词干提取自术语条目</g0>选项开启，英文原文中若存在 "elements"，术语条目 "element" 将会显示。

Andrew
doc_src/Menu.xml

4948
If the option is OFF, the glossary entry above will not be found.
如果关闭此选项，上述术语条目将不会显示。

Andrew
doc_src/Menu.xml

4949
The <e0>Replace Glossary Hits when Inserting Source Text</e0> option allows to replace automatically glossary hits with the target term when source text is inserted.
<e0>插入原文时替换匹配术语表中的术语</e0> 选项可插入原文时，程序自动替换匹配表中的术语。

Andrew
doc_src/Menu.xml

4950
This is effective upon <e1>Edit > Replace with Source</e1>, <e2>Edit > Insert Source</e2>, and when entering a segment when <e3>Options > Editing Behavior > [Insert] The source text</e3> is enabled.
此选项于<e1>编辑 > 以原语替换</e1>、<e2>编辑 > 插入原语</e2>和（在<e3>选项 > 编辑操作 > [I插入] 源文本</e3>开启时键入片段时生效。 

Andrew
doc_src/Menu.xml

4951
When multiple target terms are available, the first one (as shown in the Glossary pane) will be used.
当多个目标术语可用时，（在术语表窗格中显示的）第一条术语会被使用。

Andrew
doc_src/Menu.xml

4952
Glossary matching does not use stemming or stop words, but is case-insensitive.
术语表匹配不使用词干提取或停用词，但大小写不敏感。

weiyi
doc_src/Menu.xml

4953
An attempt is made to match the capitalization of the source word.
大写的原词语也会尝试匹配。

Andrew
doc_src/Menu.xml

4954
The 3 other options are described in the specific page concerning <l0>TaaS</l0> (Terminology as a Service).
其它三种选项在关于<l0>TaaS</l0> （术语即服务）的页面中介绍。

Andrew
doc_src/Menu.xml

4955
TransTips
翻译提示

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Menu.xml

4956
Allows you to activate/deactivate <e0>TransTips </e0>feature and set its option<e1> Exact Match.</e1> With <e2>TransTips</e2> activated a right click on a highlighted word in the source will open a pop up menu with the glossary entries for the word you clicked.
可以让您激活/取消激活<e0>翻译提示</e0>功能，并设置<e1>精确匹配</e1>选项。激活<e2>翻译提示</e2>后，在原文中突出显示的单词上右击，可显示含有术语表条目的弹出菜单。

Andrew
doc_src/Menu.xml

4957
You can then click on the preferred translation to insert it into the target segment at the current position.
接着可以点击喜欢的翻译来将其插入目标片段的当前位置。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Menu.xml

4958
With <e3>TransTips/Exact Match </e3> checked, only complete words will be checked, otherwise parts of words will be matched as well.
选中<e3>翻译提示/精确匹配</e3>时只检查完整的单词，否则也会匹配部分单词。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Menu.xml

4959
Auto-completion

weiyi
doc_src/Menu.xml

4960
Click on <g0>Glossary...</g0> to configure the Auto-completer Glossary View.
点击<g0>术语表...</g0>设置自动完成器术语表视图。

Andrew
doc_src/Menu.xml

4961
Click on <g0>Auto-text...</g0> to configure Auto-text options and to add or remove entries.
点击<g0>自动文本...</g0> 配置自动文本选项并添加或移除条目。

weiyi
doc_src/Menu.xml

4962
Click on <g0>Character Table...</g0> to set the Character table auto-completer options.
点击 <g0>字符表...</g0> 设置字符表自动完成器选项。

weiyi
doc_src/Menu.xml

4963
Auto-completer is launched within the target segment via <e0>Ctrl+Space</e0> shortcut.
目标片段可通过快捷键 <e0>Ctrl+Space</e0> 启动自动完成器。

weiyi
doc_src/Menu.xml

4964
If <e0>Show Relevant Suggestions Automatically</e0> option is checked, Auto-completer is launched automatically by typing the first letter of a translated glossary entry, or by typing "<" in case of tags.
如果<e0>自动显示相关建议</e0>选项被选中，输入已翻译术语表中条目的首字母或输入标签的“<"后自动完成器会启动。

weiyi
doc_src/Menu.xml

4965
Font...
字体...

xulihang
doc_src/Menu.xml

4966
Shows the dialog to modify the text display font.
显示对话框以修改文本显示字体。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Menu.xml

4967
Users of old computers who feel window resizing is very slow can try changing the font.

Fu Rhong

5018

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Menu.xml

5019
When another window is on the foreground, click on the main window to bring it to the foreground or press <k0>Esc</k0> to close the other window.
当其他窗口挡在前面时，点击主窗口使它位于前方，或者按 <k0>Esc</k0> 键关闭当前窗口。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Menu.xml

5020

Fu Rhong

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Menu.xml

5022

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Menu.xml

5023
Ctrl is used on Windows, UNIX and UNIX-like operating systems with keyboards featuring a <k0>Ctrl</k0> / <k1>Control key</k1>.
Ctrl 键在 Windows 系统中使用，UNIX 和类 UNIX 操作系统使用 <k0>Ctrl</k0> / <k1>Control 键</k1>。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Menu.xml

5024
Mac users should instead use the <g2>cmd+key.</g2> On Apple keyboards the <g3>cmd</g3> key either has a command label or an Apple icon on it.
Mac 用户则使用 <g2>cmd+key。</g2><g3>Cmd</g3> 键就是在苹果键盘上印有 "command" 或“苹果”符号的那个键。

5134
<p0>Miscellanea</p0> <s1>OmegaT console mode</s1>
<p0>杂项</p0> <s1>OmegaT 控制台模式</s1>

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Miscelanea.xml

5135
<a0><i1/>OmegaT</a0> Console Mode
<a0><i1/>OmegaT</a0> 控制台模式

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Miscelanea.xml

5136
Of interest for advanced users only!
这些内容为感兴趣的高级用户准备的！

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Miscelanea.xml

5137
The purpose of the console (i.e. command line) mode is to permit the use <a0>of OmegaT</a0> as translation tool in a scripting environment.
控制台（即命令行）模式的目的是将 <a0>of OmegaT</a0> 用作脚本环境的翻译工具。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Miscelanea.xml

5138
When launched in console mode, no GUI is loaded ( it will work therefore on any console) and the given project is automatically translated.
在控制台模式下，将不会载入任何图形化界面（因此仅在某控制台中运行），同时会自动按要求翻译指定的项目。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Miscelanea.xml

5139
An example would be a software project, with GUI localized in a number of languages.
这样的一个例子是需要把图形用户界面本地化为多种语言的软件项目。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Miscelanea.xml

5140
Using the console mode, one can make generating a localized interface a part of the build process.
使用控制台模式就可以在它的构建过程中生成本地化界面。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Miscelanea.xml

5141
Prerequisites
先决条件

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Miscelanea.xml

5142
To run OmegaT, a valid OmegaT project must be available.
为运行 OmegaT，必须存在有效的 OmegaT 项目。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Miscelanea.xml

5143
The location is irrelevant, since it must be specified explicitly on the command-line at launch.
位置并不重要，因为无论如何，启动时您都必须在命令行中明确指定它的位置。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Miscelanea.xml

5144
If you need non-standard settings, the corresponding configuration files (<l0>filters.conf</l0> and <l1>segmentation.conf</l1>) must be present.
如果不使用标准设置，则必须提供相应的配置文件（<l0>filters.conf</l0>和<l1>segmentation.conf)</l1>）。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Miscelanea.xml

5145
This can be achieved in two ways:
可通过两种方式达到这个目的：

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Miscelanea.xml

5146
Run <a0>OmegaT</a0> normally (with the GUI) and set the settings.
正常运行 <a0>OmegaT</a0> （带图像用户界面）并进行设置。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Miscelanea.xml

5147
If you start <a1>OmegaT</a1> in console mode, it will use the settings you configured.
如果以控制台模式启动 <a1>OmegaT</a1>，它将使用您配置的设置。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Miscelanea.xml

5148
If you are unable to run <a0>OmegaT</a0> normally (no graphical environment available): copy the settings files from some other <a1>OmegaT</a1> installation on another machine to a specific folder.
如果您无法正常运行<a0>OmegaT</a0>（没有可用的图形界面）：可将另一机器上安装的<a1>OmegaT</a1>设置文件复制到指定文件夹。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Miscelanea.xml

5149
The location does not matter, since you can add it to the command line at launch (see below).
位置并不重要，因为无论如何，启动时您都必须将位置添加到命令行。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Miscelanea.xml

5150
The relevant files <l2>filters.conf</l2> and <l3>segmentation.conf</l3> can be found in the user home folder (E.g. <l4>C:\Documents and Settings\%User%\<a5>OmegaT</a5></l4> under Windows, <l6>%user%/.omegat/</l6> under Linux)
相关的文件<l2>filters.conf</l2>和<l3>segmentation.conf</l3>可在用户主目录找到（如Windows 系统中的<l4>C:\Documents and Settings\%User%\<a5>OmegaT</a5></l4>或Linux系统中的<l6>%user%/.omegat/</l6>）

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Miscelanea.xml

5151
Launching OmegaT in console mode
以控制台模式运行 OmegaT

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Miscelanea.xml

5152
To launch OmegaT in console mode, additional parameters must be specified at launch.
要以控制台模式启动 OmegaT，必须在启动时传入另外的参数。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Miscelanea.xml

5153
The most important of these is <l0><project-dir></l0>, and optionally <l1>--config-dir=<config-dir></l1>.
其中最重要的是<l0><project-dir></l0>，还可以加上<l1>--config-dir=<config-dir></l1>。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Miscelanea.xml

5154

例如：

Fu Rhong

--config-dir=/path/to/config-files/ \

5159

5160
Explanation:
说明：

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Miscelanea.xml

5161
<l0><project-dir></l0> tells <a1>OmegaT</a1> where to find the project to be translated.
<l0><project-dir></l0> 告知 <a1>OmegaT</a1> 要翻译项目的位置。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Miscelanea.xml

5162
If given, <a2>OmegaT</a2> launches in console mode and translates the given project.
如果给出了该参数，则 <a2>OmegaT</a2> 以控制台模式启动并翻译指定的项目。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Miscelanea.xml

5163
<l0>--config-dir=<config-dir></l0> enables OmegaT to be instructed in which folder the configuration files are stored.
<l0>--config-dir=<config-dir></l0> 向 OmegaT 指示配置文件所在的目录。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Miscelanea.xml

5164
If not specified, OmegaT reverts to default values (the OmegaT folder in the user home folder, or if not available: the current working folder).
如果没有给出该参数，OmegaT 将转而使用缺省值（即用户主目录中的OmegaT文件夹，如果不可用的话则是当前的工作目录）。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Miscelanea.xml

5165
<l0>--mode=console-translate </l0> <a1>OmegaT</a1> launches in console mode and translates the given project
<l0>--mode=console-translate </l0> <a1>OmegaT</a1> 以控制台模式运行并翻译指定的项目。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Miscelanea.xml

5166
<l0>--source-pattern={regexp} </l0>The files to be translated can be specified this way.
<l0>--source-pattern={regexp} </l0>可使用这种方式指定要翻译的文件。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Miscelanea.xml

5167
Here is an example of the regular expression: <f1>test\.html</f1>
这是一个正则表达式的例子：<f1>test\.html</f1>

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Miscelanea.xml

5168
<l0>--tag-validation=[abort|warn] </l0> On abort, the program is aborted when tag validation finds errors.
<l0>--tag-validation=[abort|warn]</l0>若使用abort，在标签检验发现错误时会中止。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Miscelanea.xml

5169
On warn the errors are printed but the program continues.
用warn则打印错误且OmegaT继续执行。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Miscelanea.xml

5170
In all other cases no tag validation is done.
在其他情况下（即不使用此参数时）不会进行标签验证操作。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Miscelanea.xml

5171
Quiet option
静默选项

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Miscelanea.xml

5172
An extra command line parameter specific to console mode: <l0>--quiet</l0>.
控制台模式专用的一个附加命令行参数：<l0>--quiet</l0>。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Miscelanea.xml

5173
In the quiet mode, less info is logged to the screen.
在静默模式下，屏幕上将显示更少的日志信息。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Miscelanea.xml

5174
The messages you would usually find in the status bar are not displayed.
在状态栏通常可以看到的所有信息都不会被显示。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Miscelanea.xml

5175
Usage: <l0>java -jar <a1>OmegaT</a1>.jar /path/to/project --mode=console-translate --quiet</l0>
用法：<l0>java -jar <a1>OmegaT</a1>.jar /path/to/project --mode=console-translate --quiet</l0>

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Miscelanea.xml

5176
Tag validation option
标记验证选项

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Miscelanea.xml

5177
Another extra command line parameter specific to console mode: <l0>--tag-validation=[abort|warn]</l0>.
控制台模式专用的另一个附加命令行参数： <l0>--tag-validation=[abort|warn]</l0>。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Miscelanea.xml

5178
When this parameter is added, tag validation is done prior to translation/aligning.
添加此参数后，标签验证操作先于翻译/对齐进行。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Miscelanea.xml

5179
If the value is <l1>abort</l1>, then on tag errors the errors are printed and the program stops.
如果该参数值为 <l1>abort</l1>，那么在遇到标签错误时打印出错误，同时程序停止。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Miscelanea.xml

5180
If the value is <l2>warn</l2> then the errors are printed but OmegaT continues.
如果该参数值为 <l2>warn</l2>，则打印错误且 OmegaT 继续执行。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Miscelanea.xml

5181
Usage: <l0>java -jar <a1>OmegaT</a1>.jar /path/to/project --mode=console-translate --tag-validation=abort</l0>
用法：<l0>java -jar <a1>OmegaT</a1>.jar /path/to/project --mode=console-translate --tag-validation=abort</l0>

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Miscelanea.xml

OmegaT 可以在控制台模式中对齐 Java .properties。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Miscelanea.xml

5185
If you have the source and the target Properties files for one and the same contents in your language pair, this procedure will create a corresponding tmx file for these contents.
如果您有以您需要的语言对表示的源和目标属性文件，这个过程将创建包含这些内容的 TMX 文件。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Miscelanea.xml

5186
Usage:
用法：

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Miscelanea.xml

5187

java -jar OmegaT.jar --mode=console-align /my-project-dir --alignDir=/translatedFiles/

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Miscelanea.xml

5188
<f0>alignDir </f0>must contain a translation in the target language of the project.
<f0>alignDir </f0> 必须包含项目目标语言的翻译。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Miscelanea.xml

5189
E.g., if the project is EN->FR, alignDir must contain a bundle ending with _fr.
例如，如果项目为 EN->FR，则 alignDir 必须包含以 _fr 结尾的包。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Miscelanea.xml

5190
The resulting tmx is stored in the <l1>omegat </l1>folder under the name <f2>align.tmx</f2>.
生成的 TMX 保存在 <l1>omegat</l1> 目录，名称为 <f2>align.tmx</f2>。
