Fu Rhong
doc_src/Miscelanea.xml

5203
<e0>Note: </e0>In some cases it may take quite some time for OmegaT to update the display after the font setting has been changed.
<e0>注意：</e0>在某些情况下，修改字体设置后 OmegaT 可能需要一些时间来更新显示。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Miscelanea.xml

5204
This is especially the case when a large file containing many segments is open in the editor, and/or slow hardware is used.
特别是在编辑器中打开了一份拥有大量片段的大文件或使用慢速硬件的时候。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Miscelanea.xml

5205
Note also that some fonts behave better for some language pairs than for others.
同时，就某些语言而言，某些字体比另一些的表现更佳。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Miscelanea.xml

5206
In particular, if you are translating between two languages with different alphabets/writing systems (such as Russian and Japanese), select a font that can be used for both.
特别是当您在不同的语系/书写系统间进行翻译（例如俄语和日语），请选择一种适用于两者的字体。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Miscelanea.xml

5207
<p0>Miscellanea</p0> <s1>Preventing data Loss</s1>
<p0>杂项</p0> <s1>防止数据丢失</s1>

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Miscelanea.xml

5208
Preventing data loss
防止数据丢失

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Miscelanea.xml

5209
<a0>OmegaT</a0> is a robust application.
<a0>OmegaT</a0> 是健壮的应用程序。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Miscelanea.xml

5210
However, you should take precautions against data loss when using <a1>OmegaT</a1>, just as with any other application.
然而就像使用其他任何程序一样，使用 <a1>OmegaT</a1> 时还是应该对数据丢失保持警惕。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Miscelanea.xml

5211
When you translate your files, <a2>OmegaT</a2> stores all your progress in the translation memory <l3>project_save.tmx</l3> that resides in the project's <l4>/omegat</l4> subfolder.
在翻译文件时，<a2>OmegaT</a2>在项目的<l4>/omegat </l4>子文件夹的翻译记忆文件<l3>project_save.tmx</l3>中储存您所有的进度信息。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Miscelanea.xml

5212
OmegaT also backs up the translation memory to project_save.tmx.YEARMMDDHHNN.bak in the same subfolder each time a project is opened or reloaded.
OmegaT 在每次打开或重新载入项目时，也将翻译记忆备份到同一子目录下的 project_save.tmx.YEARMMDDHHNN.bak 文件中。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Miscelanea.xml

5213
YEAR is the 4-digit year, MM is the month, DD the day of the month, and HH and NN are the hours and minutes when the previous translation memory was saved.
YEAR 是 4 位数的年份；MM 是月份；DD 是日期；而 HH 和 NN 是前一份翻译记忆保存时的小时和分钟。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Miscelanea.xml

5214
If you believe that you have lost translation data, you can use the following procedure to restore the project to its most recently saved state, usually not older than approximately 10 minutes or so:
如果您觉得丢失了翻译数据，那么可以参照下列步骤恢复项目到最近保存的数据，通常是大约 10 分钟以内：

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Miscelanea.xml

5215
close the project
关闭项目

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Miscelanea.xml

5216
rename the current <f0>project_save.tmx </f0>file (e.g. to <f1>project_save.tmx.temporary</f1>)
重命名当前的 <f0>project_save.tmx </f0>文件（例如改名为 <f1>project_save.tmx.temporary</f1>）

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Miscelanea.xml

5217
select the backup translation memory that is the most likely to contain the data you are looking for
选择最有可能包含所需数据的翻译记忆备份

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Miscelanea.xml

5218
rename it <l0>project_save.tmx</l0>
将其更名为 <l0>project_save.tmx</l0>

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Miscelanea.xml

5219
open the project
打开项目

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Miscelanea.xml

5220
To avoid losing important data:
为避免丢失重要数据：

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Miscelanea.xml

5221
Make regular copies of the file /omegat/project_save.tmx to backup media, such as CD or DVD.
必须定期备份 /omegat/project_save.tmx，例如复制到 CD 或 DVD。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Miscelanea.xml

5222
Until you are familiar with <a0>OmegaT</a0>, create translated files at regular intervals and check that the translated file contains the latest version of your translation.
在熟悉 <a0>OmegaT</a0> 之前，应该定期创建已译文件，并查看已译文件是否包含了您所翻译的最新版本。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Miscelanea.xml

5223
Take particular care when making changes to the files in <l0>/source</l0> while in the middle of a project.
在项目进行过程中，对<l0>/source</l0>目录中的文件进行修改要特别小心。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Miscelanea.xml

5224

如果在开始翻译后对源文件进行了修改，<a1>OmegaT</a1> 也许会找不到您已经翻译的某个片段。

5236
Working with plain text
处理纯文本

Fu Rhong
doc_src/PlainText.xml

5237
<p0>Encoding</p0> <s1>Plain text files</s1>
<p0>编码</p0> <s1>纯文本文件</s1>

Fu Rhong
doc_src/PlainText.xml

5238
<p0>Source files</p0> <s1>Encoding</s1>
<p0>源文件</p0> <s1>编码</s1>

Fu Rhong
doc_src/PlainText.xml

5239
Default encoding
缺省编码

Fu Rhong
doc_src/PlainText.xml

5240
Plain text files - in most cases files with a txt extension - contain just textual information and offer no clearly defined way to inform the computer which language they contain.
纯文本文件（在大多数情况下扩展名为 txt）只包含了文本信息，目前还没有明确的办法告诉计算机该文件包含了何种语言的内容。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/PlainText.xml

5241
The most that OmegaT can do in such a case, is to assume that the text is written in the same language the computer itself uses.
在这种情况下，一般 OmegaT 会假设该文本写入时使用了当前计算机所使用相同语言。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/PlainText.xml

5242
This is no problem for files encoded in Unicode using a 16 bit character encoding set.
这对于使用 16 位字符集 Unicode 进行编码的文件不会产生问题。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/PlainText.xml

5243
If the text is encoded in 8 bits, however, one can be faced with the following awkward situation: instead of displaying the text, for Japanese characters...
然而，如果文本使用 8 位编码，那么可能会遇到这样困惑的情况：不是显示日文的文本...

xulihang
doc_src/PlainText.xml

5244
...the system will display it like this for instance:
相反地，系统将显示类似这样的内容：

Fu Rhong
doc_src/PlainText.xml

5245
The computer, running OmegaT, has Russian as the default language, and thus shows the characters in the Cyrillic alphabet and not in Kanji.
运行 OmegaT 的电脑的缺省语言为俄语，因此它使用西里尔字符集而不是汉字字符集显示字符。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/PlainText.xml

5246
The <a0>OmegaT</a0> solution
<a0>OmegaT</a0> 解决方案

Fu Rhong
doc_src/PlainText.xml

5247
There are basically three ways to address this problem in <a0>OmegaT</a0>.
基本上 <a0>OmegaT</a0> 中有三种方法解决这个问题。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/PlainText.xml

5248
They all involve the application of file filters in the<e1> Options </e1>menu.
它们都与<e1>选项</e1>菜单中的文件过滤器应用程序有关。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/PlainText.xml

5249
Change the encoding of your files to Unicode
将文件编码改为 Unicode

Fu Rhong
doc_src/PlainText.xml

5250
open your source file in a text editor that correctly interprets its encoding and save the file in <e0>"UTF-8"</e0> encoding.
使用能够正确解析编码的文本编辑器打开源文件，并使用 <e0>"UTF-8"</e0> 编码保存文件。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/PlainText.xml

5251
Change the file extension from <l1>.txt</l1> to <l2>.utf8.</l2> <a3>OmegaT</a3> will automatically interpret the file as a UTF-8 file.
将文件扩展名由 <l1>.txt</l1> 改为 <l2>.utf8。</l2><a3>OmegaT</a3> 会自动将文件解析为 UTF-8 文件。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/PlainText.xml

5252
This is the most common-sense alternative, sparing you problems in the long run.
这是最常用的有效方案, 可最大程度减少您的问题.

Fu Rhong
doc_src/PlainText.xml

5253
Specify the encoding for your plain text files
指定纯文本文件的编码

Fu Rhong
doc_src/PlainText.xml

5254
- i.e. files with a <f0>.txt </f0>extension - : in the <e1>Text files </e1>section of the file filters dialog, change the <e2>Source File Encoding</e2> from <auto> to the encoding that corresponds to your source <f3>.txt</f3> file, for instance to .jp for the above example.
即扩展名为 <f0>.txt </f0> 的文件：在文件过滤器对话框的<e1>文本文件</e1>部分，将<e2>源文件编码</e2>从<自动>修改为 <f3>.txt</f3> 文件的编码，例如对于上述例子则修改为 .jp。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/PlainText.xml

5255
Change the extensions of your plain text source files
修改纯文本文件的扩展名

Fu Rhong
doc_src/PlainText.xml

5256
for instance from <f0>.txt</f0> to <f1>.jp</f1> for Japanese plain texts: in the <e2>Text files</e2> section of the file filters dialog, add new <e3>Source Filename Pattern</e3> (<f4>*.jp</f4> for this example) and select the appropriate parameters for the source and target encoding
例如对于日文纯文本文件将 <f0>.txt</f0> 修改为 <f1>.jp</f1>：在文件过滤器对话框的<e2>文本文件</e2>部分，新增一个新的<e3>源文件名模式</e3>（在此例中为 <f4>*.jp</f4>）并为该源文件和目标文件的编码选择适当的参数。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/PlainText.xml

5257
<a0>OmegaT</a0> has by default the following short list available to make it easier for you to deal with some plain text files:
缺省情况下，<a0>OmegaT</a0> 使用下面的短名单帮助您处理一些纯文本文件：

Fu Rhong
doc_src/PlainText.xml

5258
<l0>.txt</l0> files are automatically (<auto>) interpreted by <a1>OmegaT</a1> as being encoded in the computer's default encoding.
<l0>.txt</l0> 文件会自动 (<自动>) 被 <a1>OmegaT</a1> 以计算机缺省的编码进行解释。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/PlainText.xml

5259
<p0>Encoding</p0> <s1>Western</s1>
<p0>编码</p0> <s1>西方</s1>

Fu Rhong
doc_src/PlainText.xml

5260
<l0>.txt1</l0> files are files in ISO-8859-1, covering most <e1>Western Europe</e1> languages.
<l0>.txt1</l0> 是以 ISO-8859-1 进行编码的，包括绝大多数<e1>西欧</e1>语言。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/PlainText.xml

5261
<p0>Encoding</p0> <s1>Central and Eastern European</s1>
<p0>编码</p0> <s1>中欧和东欧</s1>

Fu Rhong
doc_src/PlainText.xml

5262
<l0>.txt2</l0> files are files in ISO-8859-2, that covers most <e1>Central and Eastern Europe</e1> languages
<l0>.txt2</l0> 文件是以 ISO-8859-2 进行编码的，包括绝大多数<e1>中欧和东欧</e1>语言

Fu Rhong
doc_src/PlainText.xml

5263
<p0>Encoding</p0> <s1>Unicode</s1>
<p0>编码</p0> <s1>Unicode</s1>

Fu Rhong
doc_src/PlainText.xml

5264
<l0>.utf8</l0> files are interpreted by <a1>OmegaT</a1> as being encoded in UTF-8 (an encoding that covers almost all languages in the world).
<l0>.utf8</l0> 文件会被 <a1>OmegaT</a1> 以 UTF-8 编码进行解释（一种几乎涵盖了世界上所有语言的编码）。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/PlainText.xml

5265
You can check that yourself by selecting the item <e0>File Filters</e0> in the menu <e1>Options</e1>.
可以通过在<e1>选项</e1>菜单中选择<e0>文件过滤器</e0>菜单项来检查是不是这样。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/PlainText.xml

5266
For example, when you have a Czech text file (very probably written in the <e2>ISO-8859-2</e2> code) you just need to change the extension<l3> .txt</l3> to <l4>.txt2 </l4>and <a5>OmegaT</a5> will interpret its contents correctly.
比方说，当您拿到一份捷克文本文件（非常有可能使用 <e2>ISO-8859-2</e2> 编码编写），您仅需将扩展名 <l3>.txt</l3> 修改为 <l4>.txt2</l4>，而 <a5>OmegaT</a5> 将会正确地解析其内容。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/PlainText.xml

5267
And of course, if you wish to be on the safe side, consider converting this kind of file to Unicode, i.e. to the <l6>.utf8 </l6>file format.
当然，如果您希望更加安全，可以将这类文件转换为 Unicode，即 <l6>.utf8</l6> 文件格式。

Fu Rhong

5270
Generalities
概述

Doris
doc_src/ProjectProperties.xml

5271
The <m0> <s1> <k2> <k3>Ctrl</k3> <k4>E</k4> </k2> </s1> <g5>Project</g5> <g6>Properties...</g6> </m0> dialog is used to define and modify the project folders and languages.
<m0> <s1> <k2> <k3>Ctrl</k3> <k4>E</k4> </k2> </s1> <g5>项目</g5> <g6>属性...</g6> </m0>对话框可用来修改项目文件夹和语种。

xulihang
doc_src/ProjectProperties.xml

5272
It is possible to modify the project properties during a translation session.
可以在翻译进行的过程中对项目的属性进行修改。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/ProjectProperties.xml

5273
Note that changes to the project setup may have some consequences, especially, when the project has already been started.
请注意对项目设置的变更可能已经产生结果，特别是在重新加载项目后。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/ProjectProperties.xml

5274
Until you have some experience with OmegaT, it is safest to consider all settings final once the translation has started – unless of course you realize a major mistake has been made.
在您还没有丰富的OmegaT使用经验时，最安全的办法是在翻译开始的时候决定好所有的设置——除非您意识到自己犯了一个严重的错误。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/ProjectProperties.xml

5275
See the section Preventing data loss for ways and means of protecting your work.
查阅防止数据丢失部分了解如何保护您的工作成果。

Fu Rhong

5278

必须要记住：修改语言可能会导致当前使用的翻译记忆变得不可用，由于它的语言对不再与新语言相匹配。

doc_src/ProjectProperties.xml

5281
Options
选项

钢
doc_src/ProjectProperties.xml

5282
Enable Sentence-level segmentation
未翻译

没有修改者
doc_src/ProjectProperties.xml

5283
The segmentation settings only address the way the source files are handled by <a0>OmegaT</a0>.
分割规则设置只影响 <a0>OmegaT</a0> 处理源文件的方式。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/ProjectProperties.xml

5284
The predominant way of segmenting the sources is the sentence-level segmenting, so this check box should in a normal case be left checked.
语句级分割是主要的分割方式，所以正常情况下应该选中该复选框。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/ProjectProperties.xml

5285
In some seldom cases the alternative, i.e. segmenting by paragraphs, may be preferred.
在一些罕见的情况下，可能优先选择其替代方案即段落级分割方式。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/ProjectProperties.xml

5286
Changing this flag does not modify the segmentation of already existing translation memories.
改变该标志不会对已经译好翻译记忆进行修改。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/ProjectProperties.xml

5287
If you decide mid-translation to switch from sentence to paragraph translation, the internal translation memory of the project will not be changed (OmegaT may upgrade old translation memories that did not use sentence segmentation, but not vice versa), but OmegaT will attempt to create paragraph fuzzy matches by glueing together existing sentence translations.
未翻译

没有修改者
doc_src/ProjectProperties.xml

5288
Changing segmentation settings may cause some already translated segments to be split or merged.
改变分割规则设置可能导致一些已经译好的片段被分拆或者合并。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/ProjectProperties.xml

5289
This will effectively return them to the "untranslated" status, as they will no longer match segments recorded in the project memory, even though their original translation is still there.
这实际上会让它们回到“未译”状态，因为它们不再和记录在翻译记忆中的片段相匹配，即便旧的的匹配翻译仍然存在。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/ProjectProperties.xml

5290

doc_src/ProjectProperties.xml

5294
Use this button to open a dialog, activate the check box <g0>Project specific segmentation rules</g0>, then proceed to adjust the segmentation rules as desired.

5295

新的规则集将和项目保存在一起，而不与通用分割规则集相冲突。

Fu Rhong

5296

5299

5300
File Filters...
文件过滤器...

xulihang
doc_src/ProjectProperties.xml

5301
In a similar fashion as above the user can create project-specific File filters, which will be stored together with the project and will be valid for the current project only.
和上面类似，用户可以创建项目专用文件过滤器，它和项目保存在一起并仅对当前项目有效。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/ProjectProperties.xml

5302
To create a project-specific set of file filters, click on the <g0>File filter ... </g0>button, then activate <g1>Enable project specific filters</g1> check box in the window that opens.
未翻译

5303

要删除项目专用文件过滤器，请取消选中此复选框。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/ProjectProperties.xml

5305
Note that in the menu <g2>Options->File Filters</g2>, the global user filters are changed, not the project filters.
注意在<g2>选项->文件过滤器</g2>菜单中，修改的是全局用户过滤器而不是项目专用过滤器。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/ProjectProperties.xml

5308
Auto-propagation of Translations
未翻译

没有修改者
doc_src/ProjectProperties.xml

5309
In case there are non-unique segments in source documents, the Auto-propagation check box offers the user the following two possibilities as regards automatic translation: if checked, the first translated segment will be assumed as the default translation and its target text will be automatically used for later hits during the translation process.
源文档中包含非唯一片段时，自动传播翻译复选框为用户提供了下面两种类似自动翻译的功能：选中时，首次翻译的片段将被假定为默认翻译，其目标文本会自动用于以后翻译过程中的提示。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/ProjectProperties.xml

5310
Mistranslated segments can of course be corrected later manually using <g0>Create Alternative Translation</g0>.
当然误译片段可以之后手动通过<g0>创建可选译文</g0>进行纠正。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/ProjectProperties.xml

5311
If the Auto-propagation check box is not checked, the segments with alternative translations are left untranslated until the user has decided which translation is to be used.
如果未选中自动传播复选框，则含可选译文的片段会保持未译状态至用户决定使用哪种译文。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/ProjectProperties.xml

5312
Remove Tags
移除标签

Fu Rhong
doc_src/ProjectProperties.xml

5313
When enabled, all the formatting tags are removed from source segments.
启用该选项后，会从源片段中移除所有格式化标签。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/ProjectProperties.xml

5314
This is especially useful when dealing with texts where inline formatting is not really useful (e.g., OCRed PDF, bad converted .odt or .docx, etc.) In a normal case it should always be possible to open the target documents, as only inline tags are removed.
在处理含无用内联格式的文本（如OCRed PDF、转换错误的.odt或.docx等）时特别有用。一般情况下都能正常打开目标文档，因为只移除了内联标签。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/ProjectProperties.xml

5315
Non-visible formatting (i.e., which doesn't appear as tags in the OmegaT editor) is retained in target documents.
不可见的格式信息（即在OmegaT编辑器中不显示为标签的那些）会保留在目标文档中。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/ProjectProperties.xml

5316
External Post-processing Command
外部后置处理命令：

钢
doc_src/ProjectProperties.xml

5317
This area allows entering an external post-processing command (for instance, a script to rename files) that will be applied each time Create Translated Documents is used.
未翻译

没有修改者
doc_src/ProjectProperties.xml

5318
This external command cannot include "pipes", etc., which is why calling a script is recommended.
未翻译

没有修改者

此处您可选择不同的子文件夹，如源文件子文件夹、目标文件子文件夹等。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/ProjectProperties.xml

5321
If you enter names of folders that do not exist yet, <a0>OmegaT</a0> creates them for you.
如果您输入了还不存在的文件夹名称，则 <a0>OmegaT</a0> 会创建它们。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/ProjectProperties.xml

5322
In case you decide to modify project folders, keep in mind that this will not move existing files from old folders to the new location.
如果您要修改项目文件夹，必须紧记这样做并不会将现有的文件从旧文件夹移动到新的位置。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/ProjectProperties.xml

5323
Clic on <g0>Exclusions...</g0> to define the files or folders that will be ignored by <a1>OmegaT</a1>.
点击<g0>Exclusions...</g0> to define the files  <a1>OmegaT</a1>.

lenovo
doc_src/ProjectProperties.xml

5324
An ignored file or folder:

doc_src/SearchAndReplace.xml

5502
Open the Search and replace window with <k0> <k1>Ctrl</k1> <k2>K</k2> </k0> and enter the word or expression you wish to replace in the <e3>Search for</e3> box.
用 <k0> <k1>Ctrl</k1> <k2>K</k2> </k0>打开查找与替换窗口，把你想要替换的单词或词组输入到 <e3>查找</e3> 框里。

doc_src/SearchAndReplace.xml

5503

10353
doc_src/SearchAndReplace.xml

5504
Enter the new word or phrase (regular expressions are not supported) in the <e0>Replace with</e0> box, then click one of the following options:
在 <e0>替换</e0> 框内输入新的单词或短语（不支持正则表达式）, 然后点击以下任一选项

10353
doc_src/SearchAndReplace.xml

5505
<e0>Replace All:</e0> operates replacement of all occurrences (after displaying a confirmation window where the number of occurrences is shown).
<e0>全部替换:</e0> 对所有显示结果进行操作（之前会显示替换内容数量的确认窗口）。

10353
doc_src/SearchAndReplace.xml

5506
<e0>Replace:</e0> operates a "one by one" replacement, by the mean of buttons in the <e1>header of the Editor pane</e1>.
<e0>替换：:</e0> 通过点击编辑窗格顶部按钮对内容进行“逐个”替换</e1>。

10353
doc_src/SearchAndReplace.xml

5507

点击 <e2>替换下一个</e2> 或 <e3>跳过</e3>，然后点击<e4>结束</e4>终止替换操作.

10353
doc_src/SearchAndReplace.xml

5508

<e0>关闭：</e0>关闭窗口，不做任何改变。

doc_src/Searches.xml

5529
<p0>Searches</p0> <s1>Using wild cards</s1>
<p0>搜索</p0> <s1>使用通配符</s1>

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Searches.xml

5530
Using wild cards
使用通配符

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Searches.xml

5531
In both exact and keyword searches, the wild card search characters '*' and '?' can be used.
无论是精确还是关键词搜索，都可以使用通配符 '*' 和 '?'。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Searches.xml

5532
They have the meaning, familiar to Word users:
它们的含义Word用户很熟悉：

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Searches.xml

5533
'*' matches zero or more characters, from the current position in a given word to its end.
‘*’匹配零个或多个字符，从指定单词的当前位置开始到它结束的部分。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Searches.xml

5534
The search term <l0>'run*'</l0> for example would match words <l1>'run'</l1>, <l2>'runs'</l2> and <l3>'running'</l3>.
例如搜索条件<l0>‘run*’</l0>将会匹配单词<l1>‘run’</l1>、<l2>‘runs’</l2>和<l3>‘running’</l3>。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Searches.xml

5535
'?' matches any single character.
‘?’匹配任何单个字符。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Searches.xml

5536
For instance, <l0>'run?'</l0> would match the word <l1>'runs'</l1> and <l2>'runn'</l2> in the word <l3>'running'</l3>.
例如，<l0>‘run?’ </l0>会匹配单词<l1>‘runs’</l1>和<l3>‘running’</l3>单词中的<l2>‘runn’</l2>。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Searches.xml

5537
The matches will be displayed in bold blue.
匹配将显示为蓝色粗体。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Searches.xml

5538
Note that '*' and '?' have special meaning in regular expressions, so wild card search, as described here, applies to exact and keyword search only (see below).
需要注意‘*’和‘?’在正则表达式中有特殊含义，所以这里所说的通配符搜索只适用于精确搜索和关键字搜索（见下文）。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Searches.xml

5539
<p0>Searches</p0> <s1>Methods and options</s1>
<p0>搜索</p0> <s1>方式和选项</s1>

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Searches.xml

5540
Search methods and options
搜索方式和选项

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Searches.xml

5541
Select the method using the radio buttons.
使用单选按钮选择搜索方法。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Searches.xml

5542
The following search methods are available:
下面是可用的搜索方式：

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Searches.xml

5543
exact search
精确搜索

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Searches.xml

5544
Search for segments containing the exact string you specified.
找出包括指定字符串的片段。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Searches.xml

5545
An exact search looks for a phrase, i.e. if several words are entered, they are found only if they occur in exactly that sequence.
精确搜索查找某条短语，也就是说，如果输入了多个词汇，只有它们以相同顺序出现时才会被找出来。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Searches.xml

5546
Searching for <l0>open file</l0> will thus find all occurrences of the string <e1><l2>open file</l2></e1>, but not <e3><l4>file opened</l4></e3> or <e5><l6>open input file</l6></e5>.
搜索 <l0>open file</l0> 将找到所有 <e1><l2>open file</l2></e1> 字符串出现的地方，但不会找到 <e3><l4>file opened</l4></e3> 或 <e5><l6>open input file</l6></e5>.

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Searches.xml

5547
keyword search
关键字搜索

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Searches.xml

5548
Search for segments containing all keywords you specified, in any order.
找出所有包括指定关键字的片段，不考虑顺序。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Searches.xml

5549
Select keyword search to search for any number of individual full words, in any order.
选择关键字搜索以搜索任何数目、任何顺序出现的所有词汇。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Searches.xml

5550
OmegaT displays a list of all segments containing all of the words specified.
OmegaT 会显示所有词汇都出现了的片段清单。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Searches.xml

5551
Keyword searches are similar to a search "with all of the words" in an Internet search engine such as Google (AND logic).
关键字搜索和互联网 Google 搜索引擎的 “使用所有词”方式相似（AND 逻辑）。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Searches.xml

5552
Using keyword search with <e0><l1>open file</l1></e0> will thus find all occurrences of the string <e2><l3>open file</l3>,</e2> as well as <e4><l5>file opened</l5>, <l6>open input file</l6>, <l7>file may not be safe to open</l7></e4>, etc.
使用关键字<e0><l1>open file</l1></e0>进行搜索将找到所有<e2><l3>open file</l3>、</e2><e4><l5>file opened</l5>、<l6>open input file</l6>以及<l7>file may not be safe to open</l7></e4>等字符串出现的地方。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Searches.xml

5553
regular expressions
正则表达式

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Searches.xml

5554
The search string will be treated as a regular expression.
搜索字符串将会被当作正则表达式进行处理。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Searches.xml

5555
The search string - [a-zA-Z]+[öäüqwß] - in the example above for instance looks for words in the target segment, containing questionable characters from German keyboard.
例如在上文示例中的搜索字符串[a-zA-Z]+[öäüqwß]在目标片段中寻找包含疑似来自德语键盘的字符的单词。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Searches.xml

5556
Regular expressions are a powerful way to look for instances of a string.
正则表达式是一种功能强大的字符串实例查找方法。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Searches.xml

5557
See more in the chapter<l0> Regular Expressions.</l0>
请到<l0>正则表达式</l0>章节了解更多信息。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Searches.xml

5558
Additionally to one of the methods above you can select the following:
对上面的几种方式，您还可以选择下列选项：

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Searches.xml

5559
<e0>case sensitive</e0>: the search will be performed for the exact string specified; i.e. capitalization is observed.
<e0>区分大小写</e0>：搜索工作将会严格匹配指定字符串，即遵循大小写状态。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Searches.xml

5560
<e0>Space matches nbsp</e0>: when this option is checked, a space character put in search entry can match either a normal space character or a non-breacking space (\u00A) character.
未翻译

没有修改者

因此，尽管 OmegaT 能充分处理 <f1> tmx</f1> 文件，但它不会在进行文件搜索时把它们纳入搜索范围。

5578
Search results display
搜索结果展示

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Searches.xml

5579
Pressing the search button after entering a string in the search field displays all the segments in the project that include the entered string.
在搜索字段输入一个字符串然后点击搜索按钮，会把项目中所有包含输入字符串的片段显示出来。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Searches.xml

5580
As <a0>OmegaT</a0> handles identical segments as one single entity, only the first unique segment is shown.
由于 <a0>OmegaT</a0> 将相同片段视为同一实体，因此将只显示第一个唯一的片段。

xulihang
doc_src/Searches.xml

5581
The segments are displayed in order of appearance in the project.
片段以在项目中出现的顺序显示。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Searches.xml

5582
Translated segments are displayed with the original text at the top and the translated text at the bottom, untranslated segments are displayed as the source only.
已译片段会以上面显示原文、下面显示译文的形式显示，而未译片段只显示原始文本。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Searches.xml

5583
Double-clicking on a segment opens it in the Editor for modifications (one single click does it when <e0>Auto-sync with Editor</e0> option is checked).
未翻译

没有修改者
doc_src/Searches.xml

5584
You can then switch back to the Search window for the next segment found, for instance to check and, if necessary, correct the terminology.
然后您可以转回搜索窗口以编辑找到的下一个片段，例如进行检查或者在必要时调整术语。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Searches.xml

5585
In the Search window, you can use standard shortcuts (<k0> <k1>Ctrl</k1> <k2>N</k2> </k0>, <k3> <k4>Ctrl</k4> <k5>P</k5> </k3>) to move from one segment to another.

doc_src/Searches.xml

5597
Source segmentation
源片段分割规则

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Segmentation.xml

5598
<p0>Project</p0> <s1>Properties</s1>
<p0>项目</p0> <s1>属性</s1>

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Segmentation.xml

5599
<p0>Project</p0> <s1>Options</s1>
<p0>项目</p0> <s1>选项</s1>

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Segmentation.xml

5600
Translation memory tools work with textual units called segments.
翻译记忆工具的使用以叫做片段的文本为单位。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Segmentation.xml

5601
<a0>OmegaT</a0> has two ways to segment a text: by paragraph or by sentence segmentation (also referred to as “rule-based segmentation”).
<a0>OmegaT</a0> 使用两种方式对文本进行片段分割：段落分割或句子分割（也被称为“基于分割的规则”）。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Segmentation.xml

5602
In order to select the type of segmentation, select <m1> <g2><i3/>Project</g2> <g4>Properties...</g4> </m1> from the main menu and tick or untick the check box provided.
要选择分割类型，请从主菜单选择<m1> <g2><i3/>项目</g2> <g4>属性...</g4> </m1>，然后选用选中或取消选中相应的复选框。

xulihang
doc_src/Segmentation.xml

5603
Paragraph segmentation is advantageous in certain cases, such as highly creative or stylistic translations in which the translator may wish to change the order of entire sentences; for the majority of projects, however, sentence segmentation is a choice to be preferred, since it delivers better matches from previous translations.
在某些情况中使用段落分割是有好处的，例如在与创造性和文学性高度相关的翻译中，译员可能需要改变整个段落的顺序；然而，对于大多数项目，应优先选择句子分割，因为这样可以与以前的翻译实现更好的匹配。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Segmentation.xml

5604
If sentence segmentation has been selected, you can setup the rules by selecting <m5> <g6><i7/>Options</g6> <g8>Segmentation...</g8> </m5>from the main menu.
如果选用了句子分割，可通过从主菜单选择<m5> <g6><i7/>选项</g6> <g8>片段分割...</g8> </m5>以设置规则。

xulihang
doc_src/Segmentation.xml

5605
Dependable segmentation rules are already available for many languages, so it is likely that you will not need to get involved with writing your own segmentation rules.
许多语言中已经包含了可靠的分割规则，所以很可能您不需要自己编写分割规则。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Segmentation.xml

5606
On the other hand this functionality can be very useful in special cases, where you can increase your productivity by tuning the segmentation rules to the text to be translated.
另一方面，该功能在特殊情况下可能非常有用，您可以针对需要翻译的文本设置分割规则来提高生产力。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Segmentation.xml

5607
<e0>Warning: </e0>because the text will segment differently after filter options have been changed, so you may have to start translating from scratch.
<e0>警告：</e0>由于在改变过滤器选项后将对文本进行不同的分割，所以您可能需要从原文开始进行翻译。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Segmentation.xml

5608
At the same time the previous valid segments in the project translation memory will turn into orphan segments.
同时，在项目翻译记忆中原来有效的片段将变成孤立片段。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Segmentation.xml

5609
If you change segmentation options when a project is open, you must reload the project in order for the changes to take effect.
如果您在项目打开的时候改变分割规则选项，您必须重新载入项目以使改变生效。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Segmentation.xml

5610
<a0>OmegaT</a0> uses the following sequence of steps:
<a0>OmegaT</a0> 使用下列步骤：

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Segmentation.xml

5611
<p0>Segmentation</p0> <s1>Source level segmentation</s1>
<p0>片段分割</p0> <s1>源层分割</s1>

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Segmentation.xml

5612
Structure level segmentation
结构层片段分割

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Segmentation.xml

5613
<a0>OmegaT</a0> first parses the text for structure-level segmentation.
<a0>OmegaT</a0> 首先将文本分割成结构级别的片段。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Segmentation.xml

5614
During this process it is only the structure of the source file that is used to produce segments.
在这个过程中，只有源文本的结构被用于创建片段。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Segmentation.xml

5615
For example, text files may be segmented on line breaks, empty lines, or not be segmented at all.
例如：文本文件可能会在行终止、空行进行片段分割或根本进行分割。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Segmentation.xml

5616
Files containing formatting (ODF documents, HTML documents, etc.) are segmented on the block-level (paragraph) tags.
格式化文件（ODF文档、HTML 文档等等）在块级别（段落）标签处进行分割。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Segmentation.xml

5617
Translatable object attributes in XHTML or HTML files can be extracted as separate segments.
XHTML 或 HTML 文件的可翻译对象属性可以被提取为独立的片段。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Segmentation.xml

5618
<p0>Segmentation</p0> <s1>Sentence level segmentation</s1>
<p0>片段分割</p0> <s1>语句级分割</s1>

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Segmentation.xml

5619
Sentence level segmentation
语句级分割

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Segmentation.xml

5620
After segmenting the source file into structural units, <a0>OmegaT</a0> will segment these blocks further into sentences.
在将源文件分割为结构单元之后， <a0>OmegaT</a0> 将进一步把这些块分割为语句。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Segmentation.xml

5621
<p0>Segmentation</p0> <s1>Rules</s1>
<p0>片段分割</p0> <s1>规则</s1>

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Segmentation.xml

5622
Segmentation rules
片段分割规则

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Segmentation.xml

5623
The process of segmenting can be pictured as follows: the cursor moves along the text, one character at a time.
片段分割过程可描绘如下：光标沿着文本移动，每次一个字符。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Segmentation.xml

5624
At each cursor position rules, consisting of a <e0>Before </e0>and <e1>After </e1>pattern, are applied in their given order to see if any of the<e2> Before</e2> patterns are valid for the text on the left and the corresponding <e3>After</e3> pattern for the text on the right of the cursor.
在每个光标位置，由 <e0>之前</e0>和<e1>之后</e1>的模式组成的规则以指定的顺序应用，即对左边的文本使用<e2>之前</e2>模式同时对光标右边的文本使用 <e3>之后</e3> 模式。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Segmentation.xml

5625
If the rule matches, either the cursor moves on without inserting a segment break (for an exception rule) or a new segment break is created at the current cursor position (for the break rule).
如果规则匹配，光标继续移动而不进行分割（对于例外规则）或者创建一个新片段（为中断规则）。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Segmentation.xml

5626
The two types of rules behave as follows:
两种类型的规则表现如下：

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Segmentation.xml

5627
<p0>Segmentation</p0> <s1>Rules</s1> <t2>Break rule</t2>
<p0>片段分割</p0> <s1>规则</s1> <t2>中断规则</t2>

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Segmentation.xml

5628
Break rule
中断规则

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Segmentation.xml

5629
Separates the source text into segments.
将源文本分割为片段。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Segmentation.xml

5630
For example, "<e0>Did it make sense?
例如，"<e0>Did it make sense?

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Segmentation.xml

5631
I was not sure</e0>." should be split into two segments.
I was not sure</e0>." 应该分割成两个句子。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Segmentation.xml

5632
For this to happen, there should be a break rule for "?", when followed by spaces and a capitalized word.
要实现这样的目的，应该在 "?" 后跟着空格和大写字符时进行中断的规则。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Segmentation.xml

5633
To define a rule as a break rule, tick the Break/Exception check box.
要定义一个中断规则，请选中中断/例外复选框。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Segmentation.xml

5634
<p0>Segmentation</p0> <s1>Rules</s1> <t2>Exception rule</t2>
<p0>片段分割</p0> <s1>规则</s1> <t2>例外规则</t2>

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Segmentation.xml

5635
Exception rule
例外规则

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Segmentation.xml

5636
specify what parts of text should NOT be separated.
指定哪部分文本不应该被分开。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Segmentation.xml

5637
In spite of the period, <e0>"Mrs. Dalloway "</e0> should not be split in two segments, so an exception rule should be established for Mrs (and for Mr, for Dr, for prof etc), followed by a period.
不考虑句点的话， <e0>"Mrs. Dalloway "</e0> 不应被分割成两个片段，因此应该为后面跟着句点的 Mrs (以及 Mr 和 Dr 、prof 等等) 创建例外规则。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Segmentation.xml

5638
To define a rule as an exception rule, leave the Break/Exception check box unticked.
要定义例外规则，请取消选中中断/例外复选框。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Segmentation.xml

5639
The predefined break rules should be sufficient for most European languages and Japanese.
对于绝大多数欧洲语言和日语来说，预定义的中断规则已经够用了。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Segmentation.xml

5640
In view of the flexibility, you may consider defining more exception rules for your source language in order to provide more meaningful and coherent segments.
从灵活性的角度看，您可能考虑为要翻译的语种定义更多的例外规则，以获取语意更完整也更连贯的片段。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Segmentation.xml

5641
<p0>Segmentation</p0> <s1>Rules priority</s1>
<p0>片段分割</p0> <s1>规则优先级</s1>

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Segmentation.xml

5642
Rule priority
规则的优先级

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Segmentation.xml

5643
All segmentation rule sets for a matching language pattern are active and are applied in the given order of priority, so rules for specific language should be higher than default ones.
为匹配的语言模式定义的所有片段分割规则会按照规定的优先级别得到应用，因此为特定语言定义的规则优先级会比缺省规则要高。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Segmentation.xml

5644
For example, rules for Canadian French (FR-CA) should be set higher than rules for French (FR.*), and higher than Default (.*) ones.
例如，为加拿大法语 (FR-CA) 创建的规则优先级应该比为法语 (FR.*) 创建规则的优先级要高，也比缺省规则(.*) 要高。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Segmentation.xml

5645
Thus, when translating from Canadian French the rules for Canadian French - if any - will be applied first, followed by the rules for French and lastly, by the Default rules.
因此，在翻译加拿大法语时，会首先应用加拿大法语规则（如果存在的话），接着是法语规则，最后为缺省规则。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Segmentation.xml

5646
<p0>Segmentation</p0> <s1>Creating a new rule</s1> <s2>Regular expressions</s2>
<p0>片段分割</p0> <s1>创建新规则</s1> <s2>正则表达式</s2>

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Segmentation.xml

5647
Creating a new rule
创建新规则

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Segmentation.xml

5648
Major changes to the segmentation rules should be generally avoided, especially after completion of the first draft, but minor changes, such as the addition of a recognized abbreviation, can be advantageous.
一般应避免对分割规则进行大幅调整，尤其在开始翻译后，但进行细微修正，例如加上识别的缩略语，可能会有好处。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Segmentation.xml

5649
In order to edit or expand an existing set of rules, simply click on it in the top table.
要编辑或扩展现有规则集合，仅需在上面的表格中打开它。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Segmentation.xml

5650
The rules for that set will appear in the bottom half of the window.
规则集合将出现在窗口的下半部分。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Segmentation.xml

5651
In order to create an empty set of rules for a new language pattern click <e0>Add </e0>in the upper half of the dialog.
要为某新语种模式创建空的规则集合，在对话框的上半部分点击<e0>新增</e0>。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Segmentation.xml

5652
An empty line will appear at the bottom of the upper table (you may have to scroll down to see it).
上方表格的底部将出现一条空行（您可能需要向下滚动才能看到它）。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Segmentation.xml

5653
Change the name of the rule set and the language pattern to the language concerned and its code (see <x1/> for a list of language codes).
修改规则集的名称和语言模式到相关的语言及其代码（请参阅<x1/>语言代码列表）。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Segmentation.xml

5654
The syntax of the language pattern conforms to regular expression syntax.
语言模式的语法遵循正则表达式的语法规则。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Segmentation.xml

5655
If your set of rules handles a language-country pair, we advise you to move it to the top using the <e2>Move Up</e2> button.
如果您设置了规则集来处理语言——国家对，我们建议您使用<e2>上移</e2>按钮将它移到顶部。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Segmentation.xml

5656
Add the <e0>Before</e0> and<e1> After</e1> patterns.
添加<e0>之前</e0>和<e1>之后</e1>模式。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Segmentation.xml

5657
To check their syntax and their applicability, it is advisable to use tools which allow you to see their effect directly.
要检查它们的语法和适用性，建议使用工具来直接查看效果。

Fu Rhong

5658
See the chapter on <l2>Regular expressions</l2>.

Fu Rhong

5659
A good starting point will always be the existing rules.

5684
Spell checker
拼写检查

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Spellchecker.xml

5685
OmegaT has a built-in spell checker based on the spelling checker used in Apache OpenOffice, LibreOffice, Firefox and Thunderbird.
OmegaT内置有拼写检查器，它基于在Apache OpenOffice、LibreOffice、Firefox和Thunderbird中使用的拼写检查器。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Spellchecker.xml

5686
It is consequently able to use the huge range of free spelling dictionaries available for these applications.
因此能使用在这些程序中可用的大量免费的拼写检查词典。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Spellchecker.xml

5687

安装拼写词典

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Spellchecker.xml

5688
Before the spell check function can be used, a suitable dictionary or dictionaries (i.e. for your target language) must be installed.
在检查拼写前，必须先安装适合的词典（例如用于您的目标语言）。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Spellchecker.xml

5689
To install spelling dictionaries, follow this procedure:
要安装拼写词典，请参照这些步骤：

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Spellchecker.xml

5690

请在文件管理器中适当的位置创建新文件夹用来保存拼写词典（在下面的示例中为D:\Translations\spellcheckers）。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Spellchecker.xml

5691

5692

Fu Rhong

doc_src/Spellchecker.xml

5695
There are essentially two ways in which you can do this.
进行这个操作实际分成两步。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Spellchecker.xml

5696
You can either copy files manually, i.e. from elsewhere on your system, using your file manager; or you can use OmegaT's <e0>"Install new dictionary"</e0> function to provide a list of available dictionaries to select from.
您可以使用文件管理器从其他位置手动复制文件，或使用 OmegaT 的<e0>“安装”</e0>功能来提供可选择的词典列表。

Fu Rhong

5698

随后选中的语言将会被安装，并出现在拼写检查器窗口中（可能需要一段时间）。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Spellchecker.xml

5699

如果您系统中已经有合适的词典，那么可以手动复制，例如在Apache OpenOffice、LibreOffice、Firefox或Thunderbird安装过程中已经安装了。

5701

5702
Spellchecker setup
拼写检查器设置

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Spellchecker.xml

5703

点击<g0>安装新词典</g0>按钮将打开词典安装窗口，此处您可选择要安装的词典。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Spellchecker.xml

5704
The names of the files must correspond to the language code of your target language as defined in the project properties dialog (<g0>Project > Properties</g0>).
文件的名称必须与项目属性对话框（<g0>项目>属性</g0>）中定义的目标语言的代码一致。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Spellchecker.xml

5705
For example, if you have selected ES-MX (Mexican Spanish) as the target language, the dictionary files must be named es_MX.dic and es_MX.aff.
例如，如果你选择ES-MX（墨西哥式西班牙语）为目标语言，则词典文件必须命名为es_MX.dic和es_MX.aff。

Zoe
doc_src/Spellchecker.xml

5706
If you only have a standard Spanish dictionary available, with file names es_es.dic and es_es.aff for instance, you can copy these files to es_MX.dic and es_MX.aff, and the spelling dictionary will work.
如果您只有标准的西班牙语词典（例如文件名为es_es.dic和es_es.aff），您把这些文件改名为es_MX.dic和es_MX.aff也能让拼写检查词典正常工作。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Spellchecker.xml

5707
Note that this will of course check for the standard (Castillian) rather than for Mexican Spanish.
请注意，除墨西哥式西班牙语外这时也会检查标准的卡斯提尔语。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Spellchecker.xml

5708
Using spelling dictionaries
使用拼写词典

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Spellchecker.xml

5709
There is no need to instruct OmegaT to use a particular spelling dictionary; OmegaT will use the correct language dictionary based upon the language codes of your project.
无需告诉 OmegaT 使用特殊的拼写词典，它会根据项目的语言代码来使用正确的语言词典。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Spellchecker.xml

5710
Check however that the language codes are exactly the same: an FR-FR dictionary will not work with an FR target setting, for example.
请确保目标文件的语言代码与字典的语言代码相同：例如，FR-FR 字典在 FR 为目标语言设置下将无法正常使用。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Spellchecker.xml

5711

5717
Hints
提示

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Spellchecker.xml

5718
If the spell checker is not working, then make sure first that the check box <g0>"Automatically check the spelling of text"</g0> in the spell checker dialog (<g1>Options > Spell checking...)</g1> is checked.
如果拼写检查器没有运行，首先确保选中了拼写检查器对话框（<g1>选项>拼写检查...</g1>）中<g0>“自动检查文本拼写”</g0>的复选框。

xulihang
doc_src/Spellchecker.xml

5719
Also check that the target language code of your project against the available vocabularies in the setup window.
在设置窗口中对照可用术语表检查项目的目标语言代码。

xulihang
doc_src/Spellchecker.xml

5720
The spell checker uses the target language code to determine the language to be used : if the target language is Brazilian Portuguese (PT_BR), the subfolder with vocabularies must contain the two vocabulary files, called <e0>pt_br.aff</e0> and <e1>pt_br.dic</e1>.
拼写检查器根据目标语言代码来决定要使用的语言：如果目标语言是巴西葡萄牙语 (PT_BR)，存放术语表的目录必须包括两份术语表，名为 <e0>pt_br.aff</e0> 和 <e1>pt_br.dic</e1>。

xulihang
doc_src/Spellchecker.xml

5721
If you have already translated a large body of text, and then realize the target language code of the project does not match the spell checker's language code (you specified pt_BR as the language, but there are no pt_BR vocabularies, for instance) you can simply copy the two corresponding files and rename them (e.g. from <e0>pt_PT.aff</e0> and <e1>pt_PT.dic</e1> to <e2>pt_BR.aff</e2> and <e3>pt_BR.dic</e3>).
如果已经译了一大段文本，但是才意识到项目的目标语言代码与拼写检查器的语言代码不符（如将pt_BR设为目标语言，但没有pt_BR术语表），您只需复制两份对应的文件并进行重命名（例如把<e0>pt_PT.aff</e0>和<e1>pt_PT.dic</e1>改名为<e2>pt_BR.aff</e2>和<e3>pt_BR.dic</e3>）。

xulihang
doc_src/Spellchecker.xml

5722
Of course it is much wiser, to take a short break and download the correct versions of the spell checker.
当然，中断一小段时间并下载正确的拼写检查器版本的做法更加理智。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Spellchecker.xml

5723
Note that <f0>Remove</f0> physically removes the selected vocabularies.
注意<f0>删除</f0>实际上只是删除了选择的术语表。

xulihang
doc_src/Spellchecker.xml

5724
If they are used by some other application on your system, they will disappear from that application, too.
如果系统上有其他程序使用它们，则它们也会从那些程序中消失。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Spellchecker.xml

5725
If, for whatever reason, you need to do this from time to time, it may make sense to copy the files involved to a different folder, reserved just for use by OmegaT.
如果出于某种原因，您必须不时地重复该操作，将这些文件复制到其它目录并为 OmegaT 保留它们是非常有意义的。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/Spellchecker.xml

doc_src/TaaS.xml

5727
Using TaaS in OmegaT
在OmegaT中使用TaaS

Doris
doc_src/TaaS.xml

5728
Generalities
概述

Doris
doc_src/TaaS.xml

5729
The TaaS service at https://demo.taas-project.eu/info provides terminology services in European languages (plus Russian).
TaaS服务提供欧洲语言（以及俄语）的术语服务，网址位于https://demo.taas-project.eu/info。

Doris
doc_src/TaaS.xml

5730
It allows accessing both public and private data, where private glossaries (called "collections") can be extracted from existing documents, and the target terms partly populated automatically from various sources.
它允许访问公共和私人数据，可以从这些数据的现有文档中提取私人术语表（也称“集合”），并且部分目标术语能够从各种来源获得自动填充。

Doris
doc_src/TaaS.xml

5731
Creating a key
创建密钥

Doris
doc_src/TaaS.xml

5732
To access the TaaS service, a user must create a key using https://term.tilde.com/account/keys/create?system=omegaT.
要访问TaaS服务，用户必须通过 https://term.tilde.com/account/keys/create?system=omegaT 网址创建一个密钥。

Doris
doc_src/TaaS.xml

5733
The key must then be given to OmegaT using -Dtaas.user.key=xxxxx.
然后通过 -Dtaas.user.key=xxxxx 形式将密钥输入OmegaT。

Doris
doc_src/TaaS.xml

5734
OmegaT configuration launchers (OmegaT.l4J.ini, omegat.kaptn and Configuration.properties) contain a template entry.
OmegaT的配置启动器（包括OmegaT.l4J.ini、omegat.kaptn和Configuration.properties）包含模板条目。

Doris
doc_src/TaaS.xml

访问TaaS服务

doc_src/TaaS.xml

5736

点击<e0>选项，术语表</e0>将显示以下选项：

Doris
doc_src/TaaS.xml

5737
<e0>Browse TaaS Collections</e0> will allow browsing existing collections for the source and target languages of the project, and downloading them.
<e0>浏览TaaS集合</e0>将允许浏览现有集合以获取并下载项目所需的源语言和目标语言。

5738
Private collections are displayed in bold.
私人集合以粗体显示。

Doris

5739
The collections are downloaded as TBX glossaries in the current glossary folder.
这些集合将以TBX术语表格式下载至当前术语表文件夹中。

Doris
doc_src/TaaS.xml

5740
<e0>TaaS Terminology Lookup</e0>: when checked, will allow querying TaaS data on a segment by segment basis.
<e0>TaaS术语查询</e0>：勾选时，将允许逐段查询TaaS数据。

Doris
doc_src/TaaS.xml

5741
All collections (public and private) will be queried for the source and target language.
所有集合（公共和私人）都将被查询源语言和目标语言。

Doris
doc_src/TaaS.xml

5742
To limit the amount of data, it is possible to select a specific domain by selecting <e0>Select TaaS Terminology Lookup Domain</e0>.

Doris

Fu Rhong
doc_src/TranslationMemories.xml

5746
Translation memories
翻译记忆

Fu Rhong
doc_src/TranslationMemories.xml

5747
Translation memories in OmegaT
OmegaT 中的翻译记忆

Fu Rhong
doc_src/TranslationMemories.xml

5748
tmx folders - location and purpose
tmx 文件夹 - 位置及用途

Fu Rhong
doc_src/TranslationMemories.xml

5749
<a0>OmegaT</a0> projects can have translation memory files - i.e. files with the extension tmx - in five different places:
<a0>OmegaT</a0>项目含有在五个不同位置的翻译记忆文件，即扩展名为tmx的文件：

Fu Rhong
doc_src/TranslationMemories.xml

5750
<p0>Translation memories</p0> <s1>Subfolder omegat</s1> <s2>Project files</s2>
<p0>翻译记忆</p0> <s1>omegat 子目录</s1> <s2>项目文件</s2>

Fu Rhong
doc_src/TranslationMemories.xml

5751
omegat folder
omegat 文件夹

Fu Rhong
doc_src/TranslationMemories.xml

5752
The omegat folder contains the <f0>project_save.tmx</f0> and possibly a number of backup TMX files.
omegat 文件夹包含 <f0>project_save.tmx</f0> 文件，以及一些备份的 TMX 文件。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/TranslationMemories.xml

5753
The <f1>project_save.tmx</f1> file contains all the segments that have been recorded in memory since you started the project.
<f1>project_save.tmx</f1> 文件包含了自项目开始以来所有被保存的片段。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/TranslationMemories.xml

5754
This file always exists in the project.
项目中总是存在此文件。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/TranslationMemories.xml

5755
Its contents will always be sorted alphabetically by the source segment.
其内容总是根据源片段的字母进行排序。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/TranslationMemories.xml

5756
<p0>Translation memories</p0> <s1>Project main folder</s1>
<p0>翻译记忆</p0> <s1>项目主文件夹</s1>

Fu Rhong
doc_src/TranslationMemories.xml

5757
main project folder
项目主文件夹

Fu Rhong
doc_src/TranslationMemories.xml

5758
The main project folder contains 3 tmx files, <f0>project_name-omegat.tmx</f0>, <f1>project_name-level1.tmx</f1> and <f2>project_name-level2.tmx</f2> (project_name being the name of your project).
项目主文件夹中包含 3 个 tmx 文件：<f0>project_name-omegat.tmx</f0>，<f1>project_name-level1.tmx</f1> 以及 <f2>project_name-level2.tmx</f2>（project_name 是项目的名称）。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/TranslationMemories.xml

5759
The level1 file contains only textual information.
level1 文件仅包含文本信息。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/TranslationMemories.xml

5760
The level2 file encapsulates <a0>OmegaT</a0> specific tags in correct tmx tags so that the file can be used with its formatting information in a translation tool that supports tmx level 2 memories, or <a1>OmegaT</a1> itself.
level2 文件以适当的 TMX 标签封装了 <a0>OmegaT</a0> 的特殊标签，因此它可以在支持第 2 级 TMX 的翻译工具中使用其中的格式信息，包括 <a1>OmegaT</a1> 本身。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/TranslationMemories.xml

5761
The <a0>OmegaT</a0> file includes <a1>OmegaT</a1> specific formatting tags so that the file can be used in other <a2>OmegaT</a2> projects
<a0>OmegaT</a0> 文件包含了 <a1>OmegaT</a1> 特殊的格式标签，因此该文件可用于其他 <a2>OmegaT</a2> 项目。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/TranslationMemories.xml

5762
These files are copies of the file <f0>project_save.tmx</f0>, i.e. of the project's main translation memory, excluding the so-called orphan segments.
这些文件是 <f0>project_save.tmx</f0>文件的副本，即不包括被称为孤立片段的主翻译记忆。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/TranslationMemories.xml

5763
They carry appropriately changed names, so that its contents still remain identifiable, when used elsewhere, for instance in the <f1>tm</f1> subfolder of some other project (see below).
它们使用适当变化的名称，这样在其他地方使用时容易识别其中包含的内容，例如在其他项目的<f1>tm</f1>子文件夹（见下面）。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/TranslationMemories.xml

5764
<p0>Translation memories</p0> <s1>Subfolder tm</s1> <s2>Project files</s2>
<p0>翻译记忆</p0> <s1>tm 子目录</s1> <s2>项目文件</s2>

Fu Rhong
doc_src/TranslationMemories.xml

5765
<f0><i1/>tm</f0> folder
<f0><i1/>tm</f0> 目录

Fu Rhong
doc_src/TranslationMemories.xml

5766
The /tm/ folder can contain any number of ancillary translation memories - i.e. tmx files.
/tm/ 可包含任何数量的辅助翻译记忆，即 TMX 文件。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/TranslationMemories.xml

5767
Such files can be created in any of the three varieties indicated above.
这样的文件可创建为上面提示的三种形式。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/TranslationMemories.xml

5768
Note that other CAT tools can export (and import as well) tmx files, usually in all three forms.
注意：其他 CAT 也能导出（以及导入）TMX 文件，一般也有三种形式。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/TranslationMemories.xml

5769
The best thing of course is to use OmegaT-specific TMX files (see above), so that the in-line formatting within the segment is retained.
最好的来源是使用 OmegaT 特定的 TMX 文件（见上文），这样可以保持片段中的内联格式。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/TranslationMemories.xml

5770
The contents of translation memories in the tm subfolder serve to generate suggestions for the text(s) to be translated.
在 tm 子目录中翻译记忆的内容是为要翻译文本提供建议。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/TranslationMemories.xml

5771
Any text, already translated and stored in those files, will appear among the fuzzy matches, if it is sufficiently similar to the text currently being translated.
这些文件中已经保存并翻译的任何文本，当它们与正在翻译的文本十分相似时，将出现在模糊匹配窗格中。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/TranslationMemories.xml

5772
If the source segment in one of the ancillary TMs is identical to the text being translated, OmegaT acts as defined in the <m0> <g1>Options</g1> <g2>Editing Behavior...</g2> </m0> dialog window.
如果某个辅助TM中的某个源片段与待译的文本完全相同，OmegaT会安装在<m0> <g1>选项</g1> <g2>编辑行为...</g2> </m0>对话框中的设置进行操作。

xulihang
doc_src/TranslationMemories.xml

5773
For instance (if the default is accepted), the translation from the ancillary TM is accepted and prefixed with<e3> [fuzzy]</e3>, so that the translator can review the translations at a later stage and check whether the segments tagged this way, have been translated correctly (see the <l4>Editing behavior</l4> chapter) <m5> <g6>.</g6> </m5>
例如（使用缺省设置），在辅助TM中的译文被接受并加上前缀<e3>[模糊]</e3>，这样译员随后可以通过这个标记检查译文是否正确翻译（请参阅<l4>编辑行为</l4>章节）<m5> <g6>。</g6> </m5>

Fu Rhong
doc_src/TranslationMemories.xml

5774
It may happen, that translation memories, available in the <f0>tm</f0> subfolder, contain segments with identical source text, but differing targets.
可能出现这样的情况：在<f0>tm</f0>子文件夹的翻译记忆中多个片段含有相同的源文本，但目标译文不同。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/TranslationMemories.xml

5775
TMX files are read sorted by their names and segments within a given TMX file line by line.
在指定的TMX文件中是根据每行的名称和片段逐行读取TMX文件的。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/TranslationMemories.xml

5776
The last segment with the identical source text will thus prevail (Note: of course it makes more sense to avoid this to happen in the first place).
因此含相同源文本的最后一个片段将获得采用（注：当然预先避免这种情况发生会更有意义）。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/TranslationMemories.xml

5777
<p0>Translation memories</p0> <s1>compressed</s1>
<p0>翻译记忆</p0> <s1>打包</s1>

Fu Rhong
doc_src/TranslationMemories.xml

5778
Note that the TMX files in the tm folder can be compressed with gzip.
注意在tm文件夹中的TMX文件可使用gzip压缩。

Fu Rhong

5781
tm/auto folder
tm/auto  目录

Doris
doc_src/TranslationMemories.xml

5782
If it is clear from the very start, that translations in a given TM (or TMs) are all correct, one can put them into the<e0> tm/auto</e0> folder and avoid confirming a lot of<e1> [fuzzy]</e1> cases.
如果在提供的 TM 中的译文完全可靠的话，那么可以把它们放到 <e0> tm/auto</e0> 目录以避免需要对大量的 <e1> [模糊]</e1>进行确认。

Doris
doc_src/TranslationMemories.xml

5790
If you have no doubt that a TMX is more accurate than the <f0>project_save.tmx</f0> of OmegaT, put this TMX in /tm/enforce to overwrite existing default translations unconditionally.
如果您认同TMX比OmegaT的<f0>project_save.tmx</f0>更准确，请将此TMX置于/tm/enforce目录下，以便无条件覆盖现有的默认翻译。

5797
