doc_src/TranslationMemories.xml

5800
tm/mt folder
tm/mt 目录

Doris
doc_src/TranslationMemories.xml

5801
In the editor pane, when a match is inserted from a TMX contained in a folder named <e0>mt</e0>, the background of the active segment is changed to red.
在编辑窗格中，从<e0>mt</e0>的文件夹中的TMX文件插入匹配项时，当前所在片段的背景变为红色。

Doris
doc_src/TranslationMemories.xml

5802
The background is restored to normal when the segment is left.
从当前所在片段离开后，背景恢复正常。

Doris
doc_src/TranslationMemories.xml

5803
<p0>Translation memories</p0> <s1>Subfolders tm/penalty-xxx</s1> <s2>Project files</s2>
<p0>翻译记忆</p0> <s1>tm/penalty-xxx子文件夹</s1> <s2>项目文件</s2>

Fu Rhong
doc_src/TranslationMemories.xml

5804
tm/penalty-xxx folders
tm/penalty-xxx文件夹

Fu Rhong
doc_src/TranslationMemories.xml

5805
Sometimes, it is useful to distinguish between high-quality translation memories and those that are, because of the subject matter, client, revision status, etc., less reliable.
有时由于题材、客户、版本状态等，需要从翻译记忆中区分出高质量译文与不可靠译文。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/TranslationMemories.xml

5806
For translation memories in folders with a name "penalty-xxx" (with xxx between 0 and 100), matches will be degraded according to the name of the folder: a 100% match in any of TMs, residing in a folder called Penalty-30 for instance, will be lowered to a 70% match.
在名称为“penalty-xxx”（其中xxx在0到100之间）文件夹中的翻译记忆产生的匹配其匹配度将减少文件夹名称中的数字：例如Penalty-30文件夹中所有TM中100%匹配的条目将减低至70%的匹配度。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/TranslationMemories.xml

5807
The penalty applies to all three match percentages: matches 75, 80, 90 will in this case be lowered to 45, 50, 60.
罚点适用于所有的三种匹配百分率：此时匹配度75、80、90将减低至45、50和60。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/TranslationMemories.xml

5808
Optionally, you can let <a0>OmegaT</a0> have an additional tmx file (<a1>OmegaT</a1>-style) anywhere you specify, containing all translatable segments of the project.
或者，您可以让 <a0>OmegaT</a0> 制作一份附加的 TMX 文件（<a1>OmegaT</a1> 风格）到您指定的地方，包含了项目所有的可译片段。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/TranslationMemories.xml

5809
See pseudo-translated memory below.
请参阅下面的伪翻译记忆。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/TranslationMemories.xml

5810
Note that all the translation memories are loaded into memory when the project is opened.
注意：打开项目时会把所有的翻译记忆加载到内存中。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/TranslationMemories.xml

5811
Back-ups of the project translation memory are produced regularly (see next chapter), and <f0>project_save.tmx</f0> is also saved/updated when the project is closed or loaded again.
对项目翻译记忆的备份会定期进行（请参阅下一章），同时在打开或关闭项目时也会保存/更新<f0>project_save.tmx</f0>。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/TranslationMemories.xml

5812
This means for instance that you do not need to exit a project you are currently working on if you decide to add another ancillary TM to it: you simply reload the project, and the changes you have made will be included.
这里的意思是，例如如果您想添加一个辅助 TM 到当前正在工作的项目时，无需退出项目：只要简单地重新载入项目，所做的更改就会生效。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/TranslationMemories.xml

5813
The locations of the various different translation memories for a given project are user-defined (see Project dialog window in <l0>Project properties)</l0>
对于指定的项目，多种不同翻译记忆的位置是由用户定义的（请参阅<l0>项目属性</l0>中的项目对话框）。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/TranslationMemories.xml

5814
Depending on the situation, different strategies are thus possible, for instance:
根据不同的情况可采取不同的策略，例如：

Fu Rhong
doc_src/TranslationMemories.xml

5815
<e0>several projects on the same subject: </e0>keep the project structure, and change source and target folders (Source = source/order1, target = target/order1 etc).
<e0>在相同主题中保存多个项目：</e0>保留项目结构，同时改变源和目标目录（Source = source/order1，target = target/order1等）。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/TranslationMemories.xml

5816
Note that you segments from order1, that are not present in order2 and other subsequent jobs, will be tagged as orphan segments; however, they will still be useful for getting fuzzy matches.
需要注意存在于order1而不在order2或后续任务中的片段，会被标记为孤立片段，不过这样仍可用来获取模糊匹配。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/TranslationMemories.xml

5817
<e0>several translators working on the same project:</e0> split the source files into source/Alice, source/Bob... and allocate them to team members (Alice, Bob ...).
<e0>多个译员工作于相同项目：</e0>把源文件分成 source/Alice, source/Bob 等，同时把它们分配给项目成员 (Alice, Bob ...)。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/TranslationMemories.xml

5818
They can then create their own projects and, deliver their own <f1>project_save.tmx</f1>, when finished or when a given milestone has been reached.
随后他们可创建自己的项目，当结束或到达阶段性目标时实现他们自己的 <f1>project_save.tmx</f1>。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/TranslationMemories.xml

5819
The <f2>project_save.tmx</f2> files are then collected and possible conflicts as regards terminology for instance get resolved.
然后收集 <f2>project_save.tmx</f2>，并解决可能存在的用词冲突。 

Fu Rhong
doc_src/TranslationMemories.xml

5820
A new version of the master TM is then created, either to be put in team members' <e3>tm/auto</e3>subfolders or to replace their <f4>project_save.tmx</f4> files.
之后创建新的主翻译记忆，可以放到项目成员的<e3>tm/auto</e3>子文件夹或覆盖他们的<f4>project_save.tmx</f4>文件。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/TranslationMemories.xml

5821
The team can also use the same subfolder structure for the target files.
该团队还可以使用相同的子目录结构来保存目标文件。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/TranslationMemories.xml

5822
This allows them for instance to check at any moment, whether the target version for the complete project is still OK
这样允许他们，例如在任何时刻进行检查整个项目的目标版本是否已经完成。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/TranslationMemories.xml

5823
<p0>Translation memories</p0> <s1>Backup</s1>
<p0>翻译记忆</p0> <s1>备份</s1>

Fu Rhong
doc_src/TranslationMemories.xml

5824
tmx backup
TMX 备份

Fu Rhong
doc_src/TranslationMemories.xml

5825
As you translate your files, <a0>OmegaT</a0> stores your work continually in <f1>project_save.tmx</f1> in the project's /<f2>omegat</f2> subfolder.
翻译时，<a0>OmegaT</a0>会不断在项目/<f2>omegat</f2>子文件夹的<f1>project_save.tmx</f1>文件中保存您的工作。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/TranslationMemories.xml

5826
<a0>OmegaT</a0> also backups translation memory to <f1>project_save.tmx.YEARMMDDHHNN.bak</f1> in the same subfolder whenever a project is opened or reloaded.
<a0>OmegaT</a0> 还会在每次项目被打开或重新载入时备份翻译记忆到同一子目录的 <f1>project_save.tmx.YEARMMDDHHNN.bak</f1>。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/TranslationMemories.xml

5827
YEAR is 4-digit year, MM is a month, DD day of the month, HH and NN are hours and minutes when the previous translation memory was saved.
YEAR 是 4 位数的年份；MM 是月份；DD 是日期；HH 和 NN 是前一份翻译记忆保存时的小时和分钟。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/TranslationMemories.xml

5828
If you believe you have lost translation data, follow the following procedure:
如果您认为丢失了翻译数据，可执行下列步骤：

Fu Rhong
doc_src/TranslationMemories.xml

5829
Close the project
关闭项目

Fu Rhong
doc_src/TranslationMemories.xml

5830
Rename the current <f0>project_save.tmx</f0> file ( e.g. to <f1>project_save.tmx.temporary</f1>)
重命名当前的 <f0>project_save.tmx</f0> 文件（例如改名为 <f1>project_save.tmx.temporary</f1>）

Fu Rhong
doc_src/TranslationMemories.xml

5831
Select the backup translation memory that is most likely - e.g. the most recent one, or the last version from the day before) to contain the data you are looking for
选择最有可能包含所需数据的翻译记忆备份（例如最近的那个或从某个日子的最后版本）

Fu Rhong
doc_src/TranslationMemories.xml

5832
Copy it to <f0>project_save.tmx</f0>
复制并更名为 <f0>project_save.tmx</f0>

Fu Rhong
doc_src/TranslationMemories.xml

5833
Open the project
打开项目

Fu Rhong
doc_src/TranslationMemories.xml

5834
<p0>Translation memories</p0> <s1>Language</s1>
<p0>翻译记忆</p0> <s1>语种</s1>

Fu Rhong
doc_src/TranslationMemories.xml

5835
tmx files and language
tmx 文件和语种

Fu Rhong
doc_src/TranslationMemories.xml

5836
Tmx files contain translation units, made of a number of equivalent segments in several languages.
tmx文件包含了由一定数量多种语言的等义片段组成的翻译单元。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/TranslationMemories.xml

5837
A translation unit comprises at least two translation unit variants (TUV).
一个翻译单元至少包含了两个翻译单元变体（tuv）组成。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/TranslationMemories.xml

5838
Either can be used as the source or target.
每个都可以当作源或者目标使用。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/TranslationMemories.xml

5839
The settings in your project indicate which is the source and which the target language.
项目的设置将指出哪个是源语言，哪个是目标语言。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/TranslationMemories.xml

5840
OmegaT thus takes the TUV segments corresponding to the project's source and target language codes and uses them as the source and target segments respectively.
因此OmegaT抓取符合项目的源和目标语言代码的tuv片段，并把它们分别作为源和目标片段使用。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/TranslationMemories.xml

5841
OmegaT recognizes the language codes using the following two standard conventions :
OmegaT 使用下面两个标准约定来识别语言代码：

Fu Rhong
doc_src/TranslationMemories.xml

5842
2 letters (e.g. JA for Japanese), or
2 字母（例如对于 Japanese 为 JA），或者

Fu Rhong
doc_src/TranslationMemories.xml

5843
2- or 3-letter language code followed by the 2-letter country code (e.g. EN-US - See <x0/> for a partial list of language and country codes).
2 或 3 个字母的语言代码后跟着 2 个字母的国家代码（例如 EN-US - 请参阅<x0/>了解部分的语言和国家代码）。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/TranslationMemories.xml

5844
If the project language codes and the tmx language codes fully match, the segments are loaded in memory.
如果项目语言代码和 TMX 语言代码完全匹配，片段将会导入内存中。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/TranslationMemories.xml

5845
If languages match but not the country, the segments still get loaded.
如果语言匹配但国家不匹配，仍会导入片段。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/TranslationMemories.xml

5846
If neither the language code not the country code match, the segments will be ignored.
如果语言代码和国家代码都不符合，片段将被忽略。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/TranslationMemories.xml

5847
<p0>Translation memories</p0> <s1>multilingual, handling of</s1>
<p0>翻译记忆</p0> <s1>多语种处理</s1>

Fu Rhong
doc_src/TranslationMemories.xml

5848
TMX files can generally contain translation units with several candidate languages.
TMX文件通常包含有多种候选语言的翻译单元。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/TranslationMemories.xml

5849
If for a given source segment there is no entry for the selected target language, all other target segments are loaded, regardless of the language.
如果一个指定的源片段在选择的目标语言中没有条目，则不考虑语言而加载其他所有目标片段。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/TranslationMemories.xml

5850
For instance, if the language pair of the project is DE-FR, it can be still be of some help to see hits in the DE-EN translation, if there's none in the DE-FR pair.
例如如果项目的语言对为DE-FR，则在不存在DE-FR对的情况下，看看DE-EN翻译仍然会有些帮助。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/TranslationMemories.xml

5851
<p0>Translation memories</p0> <s1>Orphan segments</s1>
<p0>翻译记忆</p0> <s1>孤立片段</s1>

Fu Rhong
doc_src/TranslationMemories.xml

5852
Orphan segments
孤立片段

钢
doc_src/TranslationMemories.xml

5853
The file <f0>project_save.tmx</f0> contains all the segments that have been translated since you started the project.
<f0>project_save.tmx</f0> 文件包含了自项目开始以来已翻译的所有片段。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/TranslationMemories.xml

5854
If you modify the project segmentation or delete files from the source, some matches may appear as <e1>orphan strings</e1> in the Match Viewer: such matches refer to segments that do not exist any more in the source documents, as they correspond to segments translated and recorded before the modifications took place.
如果您修改了项目的分割规则或从源中删除了文件，那么在匹配查看器中可能出现<e1>孤立字符串</e1>。这样的匹配指向源文档中不存在的片段，而是指向修改发生前的片段记录。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/TranslationMemories.xml

5855
<p0>Translation memories</p0> <s1>Reusing translation memories</s1>
<p0>翻译记忆</p0> <s1>重用翻译记忆</s1>

Fu Rhong
doc_src/TranslationMemories.xml

5856
Reusing translation memories
重用翻译记忆

Fu Rhong
doc_src/TranslationMemories.xml

5857
Initially, that is when the project is created, the main TM of the project, <f0>project_save.tmx</f0> is empty.
在创建项目时，项目的主 TM <f0>project_save.tmx</f0> 是空的。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/TranslationMemories.xml

5858
This TM gradually becomes filled during the translation.
该 TM 文件会在翻译时逐步进行填充。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/TranslationMemories.xml

5859
To speed up this process, existing translations can be reused.
要加快这个过程，可重用现有的翻译。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/TranslationMemories.xml

5860
If a given sentence has already been translated once, and translated correctly, there is no need for it to be retranslated.
如果指定的片段已翻译过一次且翻译正确，则无需再次翻译它们。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/TranslationMemories.xml

5861
Translation memories may also contain reference translations: multinational legislation, such as that of the European Community, is a typical example.
翻译记忆还可以包含参考翻译：多国法律，例如欧共体的法律是个实际的例子。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/TranslationMemories.xml

5862
When you create the target documents in an <a0>OmegaT</a0> project, the translation memory of the project is output in the form of three files in the root folder of your <a1>OmegaT</a1> project (see the above description).
在<a0>OmegaT</a0>项目中创建目标文档时，项目的翻译记忆记忆将会在<a1>OmegaT</a1>项目的根目录中输出三份文件（查阅之前的表述）。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/TranslationMemories.xml

5863
You can regard these three tmx files (<f2>-omegat.tmx</f2>, <f3>-level1.tmx</f3> and <f4>-level2.tmx</f4>) as an "export translation memory", i.e. as an export of your current project's content in bilingual form.
可将这三份 TMX 文件（<f2>-omegat.tmx</f2>，<f3>-level1.tmx</f3> 和 <f4>-level2.tmx</f4>）视为一份“导出的翻译记忆”，即当前项目的可导出双语形式。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/TranslationMemories.xml

5864
Should you wish to reuse a translation memory from a previous project (for example because the new project is similar to the previous project, or uses terminology which might have been used before), you can use these translation memories as "input translation memories", i.e. for import into your new project.
如果希望复用之前某个项目的翻译记忆（例如新的项目与之前的项目非常相似，或者使用了之前可能用到的术语），您可以将这些用法记忆用作“输入翻译记忆”，也就是说导入您的新项目。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/TranslationMemories.xml

5865
In this case, place the translation memories you wish to use in the <e0>/tm</e0> or <e1>/tm</e1>/auto folder of your new project: in the former case you will get hits from these translation memories in the fuzzy matches viewer, and in the latter case these TMs will be used to pre-translate your source text.
在此情况下，可将这些翻译记忆记忆文件放置在新项目的<e0>/tm</e0>或<e1>/tm</e1>/auto目录下：以前您将在模糊匹配查看器中获取来自这些翻译记忆的提示，现在开始将使用这些翻译记忆预翻译您的源文本。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/TranslationMemories.xml

5866
By default, the /tm folder is below the project's root folder (e.g. ...<e0>/MyProject/tm</e0>), but you can choose a different folder in the project properties dialog if you wish.
默认情况下，/tm文件夹位于项目的根文件夹中（例如：...<e0>/MyProject/tm)</e0>，但如果您愿意您也可以在项目属性对话框中选择不同的文件夹。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/TranslationMemories.xml

5867
This is useful if you frequently use translation memories produced in the past, for example because they are on the same subject or for the same customer.
如果您频繁使用过去创建的翻译记忆，这将非常有用，比方说因为您一直在同一领域或为同一客户服务。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/TranslationMemories.xml

5868
In this case, a useful procedure would be:
在此情况下，有益的过程可能包括如下步骤：

Fu Rhong
doc_src/TranslationMemories.xml

5869
Create a folder (a "repository folder") in a convenient location on your hard drive for the translation memories for a particular customer or subject.
在硬盘上某个习惯的位置创建一个文件夹（“仓库文件夹”）以保存某个客户或者主题的翻译记忆。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/TranslationMemories.xml

5870
Whenever you finish a project, copy one of the three "export" translation memory files from the root folder of the project to the repository folder.
每当完成一个项目，将该三份“导出”翻译记忆从项目的根文件夹复制到仓库文件夹。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/TranslationMemories.xml

5871
When you begin a new project on the same subject or for the same customer, navigate to the repository folder in the <g0>Project > Properties > Edit Project dialog</g0> and select it as the translation memory folder.
当您为同一主题或者客户启动一个新项目时，在<g0>项目 > 属性 > 编辑项目</g0>对话框找到该仓库文件夹，将其选中为翻译记忆文件夹。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/TranslationMemories.xml

5872
Note that all the tmx files in the /tm repository are parsed when the project is opened, so putting all different TMs you may have on hand into this folder may unnecessarily slow OmegaT down.
注意在程序启动时，/tm 仓库中的所有 TMX 文件将会被解析，因此将手头所有的 TMX 文件导入将会不必要地减慢 OmegaT 的运行。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/TranslationMemories.xml

5873
You may even consider removing those that are not required any more, once you have used their contents to fill up the <f0>project-save.tmx</f0> file.
每当翻译记忆文件的内容已经转到<f0>project-save.tmx</f0>文件的时候，您可能要考虑移除那些不再需要的文件。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/TranslationMemories.xml

5874
<p0>Translation memories</p0> <s1>Importing and exporting</s1>
<p0>翻译记忆</p0> <s1>导入和导出</s1>

Fu Rhong
doc_src/TranslationMemories.xml

5875
Importing and exporting translation memories
导入和导出翻译记忆

Fu Rhong
doc_src/TranslationMemories.xml

5876
OmegaT supports imported tmx versions 1.1-1.4b (both level 1 and level 2).
OmegaT 支持导入 tmx 的 1.1-1.4b 版本（包括级别 1 和级别 2）。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/TranslationMemories.xml

5877
This enables the translation memories produced by other tools to be read by OmegaT.
这样就可以在 OmegaT 中使用其他工具创建的翻译记忆。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/TranslationMemories.xml

5878
However, OmegaT does not fully support imported level 2 tmx files (these store not only the translation, but also the formatting).
然而，OmegaT 不完全支持导入级别 2 tmx 文件（同时保存了译文和格式）。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/TranslationMemories.xml

5879
Level 2 tmx files will still be imported and their textual content can be seen in OmegaT, but the quality of fuzzy matches will be somewhat lower.
支持导入级别 2 tmx 文件并在 OmegaT 中看到它们的文本信息，但模糊匹配的质量会有所下降。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/TranslationMemories.xml

5880
OmegaT follows very strict procedures when loading translation memory (tmx) files.
OmegaT在加载翻译记忆文件（TMX 文件）时遵循非常严格的过程。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/TranslationMemories.xml

5881
If an error is found in such a file, OmegaT will indicate the position within the defective file at which the error is located.
如果在文件中发现了错误，则 OmegaT 将提示问题文件中发现错误的位置。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/TranslationMemories.xml

5882
Some tools are known to produce invalid tmx files under certain conditions.
已知有些工具在某些情况下会产生非法的TMX文件。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/TranslationMemories.xml

5883
If you wish to use such files as reference translations in OmegaT, they must be repaired, or OmegaT will report an error and fail to load them.
如果您想在 OmegaT 中使用这样的文件作为参考翻译，您必须对它们进行修补，否则 OmegaT 会加载失败并报告错误。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/TranslationMemories.xml

5884
Fixes are trivial operations and OmegaT assists troubleshooting with the related error message.
修补是琐碎的操作，OmegaT 将会在相关的错误信息中给您一些提示。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/TranslationMemories.xml

5885
You can ask the user group for advice if you have problems.
如果遇到麻烦，可以向用户组垂询。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/TranslationMemories.xml

5886
OmegaT exports version 1.4 TMX files (both level 1 and level 2).
OmegaT 导出 1.4 版本的 TMX 文件（包括级别 1 和级别 2）。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/TranslationMemories.xml

5887
The level 2 export is not fully compliant with the level 2 standard, but is sufficiently close and will generate correct matches in other translation memory tools supporting TMX Level 2.
导出的级别 2 不是标准的级别 2，但是足以在支持 TMX 级别 2 的翻译工具中产生正确的匹配。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/TranslationMemories.xml

5888
If you only need textual information (and not formatting information), use the level 1 file that OmegaT has created.
如果您只需要文本信息（而不是格式信息），可以使用 OmegaT 创建的级别 1 文件。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/TranslationMemories.xml

5889
Creating a translation memory for selected documents
创建所选文档的翻译记忆

Fu Rhong
doc_src/TranslationMemories.xml

5890
In case translators need to share their TMX bases while excluding some of their parts or including just translations of certain files, sharing the complete <f0>ProjectName-omegat.tmx</f0> is out of question.
在译员需要与别人分享排除或仅包含某些文件的TMX翻译记忆文件时，此时无法分享<f0>ProjectName-omegat.tmx</f0>文件。

Doris
doc_src/TranslationMemories.xml

5891
The following recipee is just one of the possibilities, but simple enough to follow and without any dangers for the assets.
下面的窍门只是其中一种方法，不过非常简单、容易操作且没有危险性。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/TranslationMemories.xml

5892
Create a project, separate for other projects, in the desired language pair, with an appropriate name - note that the TMXs created will include this name.
使用希望的语言对和名称（注创建的翻译记忆文件也包含此名称）创建一个独立于其他项目的项目。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/TranslationMemories.xml

5893
Copy the documents, you need the translation memory for, into the source folder of the project.
复制您希望获取翻译记忆的源文档到项目的源文件夹。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/TranslationMemories.xml

5894
Copy the translation memories, containing the translations of the documents above, into <f0>tm/auto</f0> subfolder of the new project.
复制包含上述源文档翻译的翻译记忆到新项目的<f0>tm/auto</f0>子文件夹。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/TranslationMemories.xml

5895
Start the project.
打开项目。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/TranslationMemories.xml

5896
Check for possible Tag errors with <k0>Ctrl+T </k0>and untranslated segments with <k1>Ctrl+U</k1>.
使用<k0>Ctrl+T </k0>检查标签错误，并用<k1>Ctrl+U</k1>检查未译片段。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/TranslationMemories.xml

5897
To check everything is as expected, you may press <k2>Ctrl+D</k2> to create the target documents and check their contents.
一切就绪后，按下<k2>Ctrl+D</k2>创建目标文档并检查其内容。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/TranslationMemories.xml

5898
When you exit the project.
在退出项目时，

Fu Rhong
doc_src/TranslationMemories.xml

5899
the TMX files in the main project folder (see above) now contain the transltions in the selected language pair, for the files, you have copied into the source folder.
现在在项目主文件夹（见上面）中的翻译记忆文件包含了所选语言对和您所复制到源文件夹中的所选文件的翻译。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/TranslationMemories.xml

5900
Copy them to a safe place for future referrals.
把它们复制到安全位置供将来使用。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/TranslationMemories.xml

5901
To avoid reusing the project and thus possibly polluting future cases, delete the project folder or archive it away from your workplace.
要避免重用该项目而可能破坏将来的情况，则删除项目或存档到工作区外的其他位置。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/TranslationMemories.xml

5902
<p0>Translation memories</p0> <s1>Sharing</s1> <s2>Project,Download Team Project...</s2>
<p0>翻译记忆</p0> <s1>分享</s1> <s2>项目，下载团队项目...</s2>

xulihang
doc_src/TranslationMemories.xml

5903
Sharing translation memories
分享翻译记忆

Fu Rhong
doc_src/TranslationMemories.xml

5904
In cases where a team of translators is involved, translators will prefer to share common translation memories rather than distribute their local versions.
在一个翻译团队参与的情况下，译员更喜欢分享公共的翻译记忆而不是发布他们的本地版本。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/TranslationMemories.xml

5905
OmegaT interfaces to SVN and Git, two common team software versioning and revision control systems (RCS), available under an open source license.
OmegaT为SVN和Git提供了界面，它们是在开源许可下提供的版本控制系统的两种常用协作软件。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/TranslationMemories.xml

5906
In case of OmegaT complete project folders - in other words the translation memories involved as well as source folders, project settings etc - are managed by the selected RCS.
在OmegaT中完整的项目文件夹（即包含翻译记忆、源文件夹、项目设置等）都由所选的RCS进行管理。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/TranslationMemories.xml

5907
see more in Chapter
在**章节中可进一步了解

Fu Rhong
doc_src/TranslationMemories.xml

5908
<p0>Translation memories</p0> <s1>Alternative language pairs</s1>
<p0>翻译记忆</p0> <s1>可选语言对</s1>

Fu Rhong
doc_src/TranslationMemories.xml

5909
Using TMX with alternative language pairs
使用包含可选语言对的翻译记忆文件

Fu Rhong
doc_src/TranslationMemories.xml

5910
There may be cases where you have done a project with e.g. Dutch sources, and a translation in say English.
可能会遇到这样的情况：项目源语言为荷兰语、目标语言为英语。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/TranslationMemories.xml

5911
Then you need a translation in e.g. Chinese, but your translator does not understand Dutch; she, however, understands perfectly English.
然而您需要翻译成中文，但您的译员不懂荷兰语，不过她英语极好。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/TranslationMemories.xml

5912
In this case, the NL-EN translation memory can serve as a go-between to help generate NL to ZH translation.
此时NL-EN的翻译记忆可作为桥梁以帮助生成NL-ZH的译文。

Doris
doc_src/TranslationMemories.xml

5913
The solution in our example is to copy the existing translation memory into the tm/tmx2source/ subfolder and rename it to ZH_CN.tmx to indicate the target language of the tmx.
我们的解决方法是复制已有的翻译记忆到 tm/tmx2source/ 子文件夹，并重命名为ZH_CN.tmx，以表明TMX的目标语言。

Doris
doc_src/TranslationMemories.xml

5914
The translator will be shown English translations for source segments in Dutch and use them to create the Chinese translation.
这样将显示给译员荷兰语的源片段其译文为英文，并使用它们创建中文译文。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/TranslationMemories.xml

5915
<e0>Important: </e0>the supporting TMX must be renamed XX_YY.tmx, where XX_YY is the target language of the tmx, for instance to ZH_CN.tmx in the example above.
<e0>重要提示：</e0>受支持的TMX必须重命名为XX_YY.tmx，其中XX_YY为TMX的目标语言，例如上面例子中的ZH_CN.tmx。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/TranslationMemories.xml

5916
The project and TMX source languages should of course be identical - NL in our example.
当然项目和TMX的源语言必须一致，此例中为NL。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/TranslationMemories.xml

5917
Note that only one TMX for a given language pair is possible, so if several translation memories should be involved, you will need to merge them all into the XX_YY.tmx.
请注意，对于指定的语言对只有一个TMX是可行的，所以当应该包含多个翻译记忆时您需要将它们全部合并到XX_YY.tmx。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/TranslationMemories.xml

5918
<p0>Translation memories</p0> <s1>PO and OKAPI TTX files</s1> <s2>Translation memories Subfolder tm/auto</s2>
<p0>翻译记忆</p0> <s1>PO和OKAPI TTX文件</s1> <s2>翻译记忆tm/auto子文件夹</s2>

Fu Rhong
doc_src/TranslationMemories.xml

5919
Sources with existing translations
带有现存译文的源

Fu Rhong
doc_src/TranslationMemories.xml

5920
Some types of source files (for instance PO, TTX, etc.) are bilingual, i.e. they serve both as a source and as a translation memory.
某些类型的源文件（例如PO、TTX等）是双语文件，即它们即作为源文件又作为翻译记忆。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/TranslationMemories.xml

5921
In such cases, an existing translation, found in the file, is included in the <f0>project_save.tmx</f0>.
此时在文件中的已有译文会包含到<f0>project_save.tmx</f0>。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/TranslationMemories.xml

5922
It is treated as a default translation, if no match has been found, or as an alternative translation, in case the same source segment exists, but with a target text.
在没有找到匹配的源片段中这些译文被视为默认译文，当已含有目标译文的相同源片段中它们被作为可选译文。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/TranslationMemories.xml

5923
The result will thus depend on the order in which the source segments have been loaded.
因此结果取决于其中源片段被加载的顺序。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/TranslationMemories.xml

5924
All translations from source documents are also displayed in the Comment pane, in addition to the Match pane.
源片段的所有译文除显示在匹配窗格外，还显示在注解窗格。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/TranslationMemories.xml

5925
In case of PO files, a 20% penalty applied to the alternative translation (i.e., a 100% match becomes an 80% match).
如果是PO文件，会对可选译文应用20%的罚点（即100%的匹配度变成80%）。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/TranslationMemories.xml

5926
The word [Fuzzy] is displayed on the source segment.
[模糊]短语会显示在源片段中。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/TranslationMemories.xml

5927
When you load a segmented TTX file, segments with source = target will be included, if "Allow translation to be equal to source" in Options → Editing Behavior... has been checked.
当您加载片段化的TTX文件时，如果选中了选项→编辑行为...中的“允许译文和原文相同”选项时将会包含源文本与目标文本相同的片段。

xulihang
doc_src/TranslationMemories.xml

5928
This may be confusing, so you may consider unchecking this option in this case.
这样可能引起混乱，所以此时您应考虑取消该选项。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/TranslationMemories.xml

5929
<p0>Translation memories</p0> <s1>Pseudotranslation</s1>
<p0>翻译记忆</p0> <s1>伪翻译</s1>

Fu Rhong
doc_src/TranslationMemories.xml

5930
Pseudo-translated memory
伪翻译记忆

Fu Rhong
doc_src/TranslationMemories.xml

5931
Of interest for advanced users only!
这些内容为感兴趣的高级用户准备的！

Fu Rhong
doc_src/TranslationMemories.xml

5932
Before segments get translated, you may wish to pre-process them or address them in some other way than is possible with OmegaT.
在翻译片段之前，您可能想以不同于 OmegaT 的其他方式预处理它们。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/TranslationMemories.xml

5933
For example, if you wish to create a pseudo-translation for testing purposes, OmegaT enables you to create an additional tmx file that contains all segments of the project.
例如，如果想创建伪翻译进行测试，OmegaT 能为您创建包含项目所有片段的附加 TMX 文件。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/TranslationMemories.xml

5934
The translation in this tmx can be either
该翻译记忆中的译文可以是：

Fu Rhong
doc_src/TranslationMemories.xml

5935
translation equals source (default)
和原文相同的译文（缺省）

Fu Rhong
doc_src/TranslationMemories.xml

5936
translation segment is empty
译文片段为空

Fu Rhong
doc_src/TranslationMemories.xml

5937
The tmx file can be given any name you specify.
翻译记忆文件的名称可以任意指定。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/TranslationMemories.xml

5938
A pseudo-translated memory can be generated with the following command line parameters:
通过下列命令行参数可生成伪翻译记忆：

Fu Rhong
doc_src/TranslationMemories.xml

5939
java -jar omegat.jar --pseudotranslatetmx=<filename> [pseudotranslatetype=[equal|empty]]
java -jar omegat.jar --pseudotranslatetmx=<filename> [pseudotranslatetype=[equal|empty]]

Fu Rhong
doc_src/TranslationMemories.xml

5940
Replace <l0><filename></l0> with the name of the file you wish to create, either absolute or relative to the working folder (the folder you start <a1>OmegaT</a1> from).
把其中的<l0><filename></l0>替换为想创建的文件名，可以为绝对目录或也可以相对于工作目录（<a1>OmegaT</a1>的启动文件夹）。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/TranslationMemories.xml

5941
The second argument <l2>--pseudotranslatetype</l2> is optional.
第二个参数 <l2>--pseudotranslatetype</l2> 是可选的。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/TranslationMemories.xml

5942
Its value is either <l3>equal</l3> (default value, for source=target) or <l4>empty</l4> (target segment is empty).
它的值可以是 <l3>equal</l3>（缺省值，此时 source=target）或 <l4>empty</l4>（目标片段为空）。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/TranslationMemories.xml

5943
You can process the generated tmx with any tool you want.
可以使用任何工具处理生成的 tmx 文件。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/TranslationMemories.xml

5944
To reuse it in <a5>OmegaT</a5> rename it to <e6>project_save.tmx </e6> and place it in the <l7>omegat</l7>-folder of your project.
要在 <a5>OmegaT</a5> 重用这个文件，请把它更名为 <e6>project_save.tmx </e6> 并放置到项目的 <l7>omegat</l7> 文件夹。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/TranslationMemories.xml

5945
<p0>Translation memories</p0> <s1>Upgrading to sentence segmentation</s1>
<p0>翻译记忆</p0> <s1>更新句子分割规则</s1>

Fu Rhong
doc_src/TranslationMemories.xml

5946
Upgrading translation memories
更新翻译记忆

Fu Rhong
doc_src/TranslationMemories.xml

5947
Very early versions of <a0>OmegaT</a0> were capable of segmenting source files into paragraphs only and were inconsistent when numbering formatting tags in HTML and Open Document files.
<a0>OmegaT</a0> 的早期版本只能将源文本按照段落切割成片段，而且对HTML和开放文档文件的格式标签编号时会出现前后不一致。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/TranslationMemories.xml

5948
<a1>OmegaT</a1> can detect and upgrade such tmx files on the fly to increase fuzzy matching quality and leverage your existing translation better, saving you the work of doing this manually.
<a1>OmegaT</a1>可以实时检测并更新这样的TMX文件，以此提高模糊匹配的质量、提高现有翻译的水平，减少您的手工操作。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/TranslationMemories.xml

5949
A project's tmx will be upgraded only once, and will be written in upgraded form into the <f0>project-save.tmx</f0>; legacy tmx files will be upgraded on the fly each time the project is loaded.
项目的 TMX 只会更新一次，且会以更新过的格式写入 <f0>project-save.tmx</f0>，而每次项目被载入时都会对所继承的TMX文件进行更新。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/TranslationMemories.xml

5950
Note that in some cases changes in file filters in <a1>OmegaT</a1> may lead to totally different segmentation; as a result, you will have to upgrade your translation manually in such rare cases.
注意：修改<a1>OmegaT</a1>中的文件过滤器在某些情况下可能会导致完全不同的片段分割结构，结果在少数情况下您必须手动更新译文。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/TranslationMemories.xml

6003
Used to change how <a0>OmegaT</a0> behaves when you iterate between the segments (access via <m1> <g2>Options</g2> <g3>Behavior...</g3> </m1>, close via <k4>Esc</k4>)
用来改变在片段间往返移动时 <a0>OmegaT</a0> 的行为（通过<m1> <g2>选项</g2> <g3>编辑行为...</g3> </m1>关闭，通过 <k4>Esc</k4> 关闭）

6007

6008
You can change the position of any pane or even undock it to a separate window by clicking and dragging the pane by its name.
您可以改变任何窗格的位置，甚至可以通过点击和拖动窗格的名称将其变成独立的窗口。

Fu Rhong

6010

6023

6024

doc_src/UserInterface.xml

6025
Editor pane: If an OmegaT project file (<f0>omegat.project</f0>) is dropped on this pane, the corresponding project will be opened, closing first any opened project.
编辑窗格：如果一个OmegaT项目文件（<f0>omegat.project</f0>）被拖放至该窗格内，当前打开的任何项目将先被关闭，相应的被拖放项目将被打开。

Doris
doc_src/UserInterface.xml

6026

其他被拖放文件将被复制到<f1>源</ f1>文件夹。

6028

6029

doc_src/UserInterface.xml

6044
Editor pane
编辑器窗格

Fu Rhong
doc_src/UserInterface.xml

6045
This is where you type and edit your translation.
这是输入和编辑译文的地方。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/UserInterface.xml

6046
The Editor pane displays the text of the partially translated document: the text already translated is displayed in translation while the untranslated text is displayed in the original language.
编辑窗格显示部分被翻译的文本：已经被翻译好的文本将会显示为已翻译，而未翻译的文本以原始语言显示。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/UserInterface.xml

6047
The displayed text is split into segments and you may scroll through the document and double-click on any segment to open and edit it.
显示的文本被分成片段，您可以在文档中上下移动或者双击某个片段进行编辑。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/UserInterface.xml

6048
In the above case, the segments already translated are shown in yellow.
在上面的情况中，已译片段显示为黄色。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/UserInterface.xml

6049
Segment marker
片段标记

Fu Rhong
doc_src/UserInterface.xml

6050
One of the above segments is the current segment.
其中某个片段是激活状态的片段。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/UserInterface.xml

6051
It is the segment that is displayed in two parts.
这是那个显示为两部分的片段。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/UserInterface.xml

6052
The upper part is in the source language, in bold characters with a green background color, the lower part is the editing field, ended by a marker: <i0/>the marker is <l1><segment nnnn></l1> where nnnn is a number of the segment in the project.
上面部分是源语言，使用绿色背景并加粗字体显示；下面部分是编辑区域，以标记结尾：<i0/>这里的标记是 <l1><segment nnnn></l1>，其中 nnnn 为当前片段在项目中的编号。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/UserInterface.xml

6053
Use the upper part as a reference and replace or modify the contents of the editing field with your translation.
您可以使用上面部分作为参考，覆盖或者修改编辑区域的内容以使它包括译文。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/UserInterface.xml

6054
Note: the segment marker displays <l0><segment nnnn +yy more> when the segment is non-unique.
提示：片段不唯一时，片段标记将显示<l0><段nnnn + yy 更多>。

Doris
doc_src/UserInterface.xml

6055
In that case, yy is the number of other occurrences of the segment in the project.</l0>
这种情况下，yy是该项目中出现的片段总数。</l0>

Doris
doc_src/UserInterface.xml

6056
Depending upon the preferred editing behavior, the editing field for the untranslated segment may be empty, contain the source text, or contain the translation of the string most similar to the one to be translated.
根据不同的首选编辑行为，未译片段的编辑区域可能是空的、可能包含源文本或者与待译内容最接近的字符串的译文。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/UserInterface.xml

6057
When you move to another segment, the translation is validated and stored.
移动到另一个片段时，译文将被确认并保存。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/UserInterface.xml

6058
If you want the translation to be the same as the source, simply make the editing field empty by removing all the text (select all with <k0>Ctrl+A</k0> and delete with <k1>Del</k1>).
如果您想让译文等同于原文，只需简单地删除所有文本使编辑区域为空（<k0>Ctrl+A</k0> 然后用 <k1>Del</k1> 删除）。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/UserInterface.xml

6059
OmegaT is able to store translations that are identical to the source.
OmegaT 会保存等同于原文的译文。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/UserInterface.xml

6060
This is useful for documents that contain trade marks, names or other proper nouns, or parts in a third language that do not require translation.
该功能对翻译包含商标、姓名或专用名词以及不须翻译的第三方语言的文档非常有用。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/UserInterface.xml

6061
See <e2>Translation editing</e2> for more details.
请参阅<e2>译文编辑</e2>了解更多信息。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/UserInterface.xml

6062
If you right click on the Editor pane, a pop-up menu opens, offering<e0> Cut, Copy, Paste</e0> (i.e. same functions as <k1> <k2>Ctrl</k2> <k3>X</k3> </k1>, <k4> <k5>Ctrl</k5> <k6>C</k6> </k4> and <k7> <k8>Ctrl</k8> <k9>V</k9> </k7>), <e10>GoTo segment</e10> and <e11>Add glossary entry</e11> functions.
如果在编辑窗格中点击右键，会打开弹出菜单，其中提供了<e0>剪切、复制、粘贴</e0>（即功能等同于 <k1> <k2>Ctrl</k2> <k3>X</k3> </k1>, <k4> <k5>Ctrl</k5> <k6>C</k6> </k4> 和 <k7> <k8>Ctrl</k8> <k9>V</k9> </k7>）；<e10>转到片段</e10>功能和<e11>添加术语表入口</e11>功能。

Doris
doc_src/UserInterface.xml

6063
In addition, when the right click occurs on an opened segment, other options concerning <e12>Alternative translations</e12> are proposed, for example to to jump to another instance of non-unique segments.
另外，在打开的片段上右击，会出现<e12>替换译文</e12>的选项，例如跳转到若干片段中的另一个实例。

Doris
doc_src/UserInterface.xml

6064
It is possible to drag text from anywhere in the main window and to drop it within the segment.
可以从主窗口中的任何位置拖动文本并将其放入片段内。

Doris
doc_src/UserInterface.xml

6065
Texted dragged from outside the target segment is copied, while text dragged from within the segment is moved.
从目标片段之外拖动的文本将被复制，而目标片段内部拖动的文本将被移动。

Doris
doc_src/UserInterface.xml

6066
By default, it is not possible to select words in the source segment using the keyboard rather than the mouse.
默认情况下，如果不使用鼠标而使用键盘，无法在源片段中选择单词。

Doris
doc_src/UserInterface.xml

6067
Pressing <k0>F2</k0> key allows to move the cursor into the source segment (or anywhere in the editor) with the keyboard arrows.
按下<k0>F2</k0>键可以使用键盘箭头在源片段（或编辑器中的任何位置）中移动光标。

Doris
doc_src/UserInterface.xml

6068
In this mode, "<g1>Cursor lock off</g1>" is displayed at the bottom of the pane.
在此模式下，窗格底部会显示“<g1>光标解锁</g1>”。

Doris
doc_src/UserInterface.xml

6069
To come back to the standard mode "<g2>Cursor lock on</g2>", press <k3>F2</k3> again.
要回到标准模式“<g2>光标锁定</g2>”，再次按<k3>F2</k3>。

Doris

6073

doc_src/UserInterface.xml

6074
Matches pane
匹配窗格

Fu Rhong
doc_src/UserInterface.xml

6075
The match viewer shows the most similar segments from translation memories, both from internal project translation memory created in real time as you translate your project and from ancillary translation memories you have imported from your earlier jobs, or received from your client or translation agency.
匹配查看器中显示译法记忆中最相似的片段，包括您在项目翻译过程中创建的项目翻译记忆，也包括从您早前工作中导入的辅助记忆，或者是您从客户或翻译代理那里得到得到的。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/UserInterface.xml

6076
<p0>Shortcuts</p0> <s1>Selecting the match - Ctrl+N</s1>
<p0>快捷键</p0> <s1>选择匹配——Ctrl+N</s1>

Fu Rhong
doc_src/UserInterface.xml

6077
<p0>Shortcuts</p0> <s1>Replace text - Ctrl+R</s1>
<p0>快捷键</p0> <s1>替换文本——Ctrl+R</s1>

Fu Rhong
doc_src/UserInterface.xml

6078
<p0>Shortcuts</p0> <s1>Insert text - Ctrl+I</s1>
<p0>快捷键</p0> <s1>插入——Ctrl+I</s1>

Fu Rhong
doc_src/UserInterface.xml

6079
When you move to the next segment, the first fuzzy match (the one with the best matching percentage) is automatically selected.
当您进入下一片段，第一个模糊匹配（拥有最高匹配百分比的那个）自动被选中。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/UserInterface.xml

6080
You may select a different match by pressing <g0>Ctrl+2, 3, 4, or 5</g0>.<i1/> Of course, pressing <k2> <k3>Ctrl</k3> <k4>5</k4> </k2> will have no effect, if there is no match #5.
您可以使用 <g0>Ctrl+2, 3, 4 或 5</g0>选择另一个。<i1/>当然，如果没有第 5 号匹配，按下<k2> <k3>Ctrl</k3> <k4>5</k4> </k2>是没有效果的。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/UserInterface.xml

6081
To use the selected match in your translation, use <g5>Ctrl+R</g5><i6/> to replace the target field with the match or use <g7>Ctrl+I <i8/></g7> to insert it at the cursor position.
要在译文中使用选中的匹配，请使用 <g5>Ctrl+R</g5><i6/> 以用匹配替换目标区域，或使用 <g7>Ctrl+I <i8/></g7> 以将匹配插入到当前光标位置。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/UserInterface.xml

6082
<p0>Translation memories</p0> <s1>Matches</s1>
<p0>翻译记忆</p0> <s1>匹配</s1>

Fu Rhong
doc_src/UserInterface.xml

6083
<p0>Translation memories</p0> <s1>Orphan segments</s1>
<p0>翻译记忆</p0> <s1>孤立片段</s1>

Fu Rhong
doc_src/UserInterface.xml

6084
The matching percentage is roughly equivalent to taking the number of common words in the matched and the matching segment and dividing by the number of words in the longer of the two.
匹配率大体上相当于匹配片段和被匹配片段中相同的单词数量，并除以两者单词数量中较大者。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/UserInterface.xml

6085
The selected fuzzy match is highlighted in bold, words that are missing in the segment you are translating are colored blue and words adjacent to the missing parts green.
被选中的模糊匹配会以粗体突出显示，对正在翻译片段中缺少的单词显示为蓝色，而在缺少单词旁边的单词显示为绿色。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/UserInterface.xml

6086
In the above example the source segment is <e0>Context menu command</e0>.
在上述示例中源片段为<e0>Context menu command</e0>。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/UserInterface.xml

6087
The top match is 100%, because all words match.
第一个匹配度是100%，因为所有的单词都相同。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/UserInterface.xml

6088
So do the next two matches, and the match #4 is similar, but different.
而接下来的两个匹配和第4个匹配是类似的，但不同。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/UserInterface.xml

6089
The line with the matching percentage also includes the name of the translation memory <i1/> containing the match.
在显示匹配率的这一行还显示了包含该匹配的翻译记忆的名称<i1/>。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/UserInterface.xml

6090
If there's no file name displayed, the source is the internal project translation memory.
如果未显示文件名，则发现匹配的源为缺省项目的翻译记忆。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/UserInterface.xml

6091
Orphan segments<i2/> (the match #2) describe segments in the default project translation memory that have no corresponding source segment.
孤立片段<i2/>（第2个匹配）表示该片段存在默认项目的翻译记忆中，但不存在于项目的源片段。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/UserInterface.xml

6092
There are actually three match estimates available (66/66/30 in the case of the match #4 above).
实际上还有三个可用的匹配估计（在上面第4个匹配中为66/66/30）。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/UserInterface.xml

6093
They are defined as follows:
它们的含义如下：

Fu Rhong
doc_src/UserInterface.xml

6094
match percentage (taking into account tokenizers)
匹配百分比（考虑分词器）

Doris
doc_src/UserInterface.xml

6095
default OmegaT match - number of matched words - with numerals and tags ignored - divided by the total word count
缺省的OmegaT匹配度，即忽略数字和标签后匹配词汇数除以总的词汇数

Fu Rhong
doc_src/UserInterface.xml

6096
OmegaT match, including numbers, tags
包含数字、标签的OmegaT匹配度

Fu Rhong
doc_src/UserInterface.xml

6097
<p0>Windows and panes in OmegaT</p0> <s1>Fuzzy matches pane</s1> <t2>Customizing</t2>
<p0>OmegaT窗口和窗格</p0> <s1>模糊匹配窗格</s1> <t2>定制</t2>

Fu Rhong
doc_src/UserInterface.xml

6098
<p0>Source files</p0> <s1>Translating updated source</s1>
<p0>源文件</p0> <s1>翻译更新过的源文件</s1>

Fu Rhong
doc_src/UserInterface.xml

6099
Customizing the Fuzzy matches pane
定制模糊匹配窗格

Fu Rhong
doc_src/UserInterface.xml

6100
In <g0>Options > External TMXs</g0>, a number of variables allow to configure the display of the match pane:
在<g0>选项>外部TMX</g0>中有一些用来配置匹配窗格显示的选项。

Fu Rhong

6115
String showing the differences between the source and the match.<e0> Hint:</e0> use this if the text you are translating has been updated.

6117

6140

<p0>OmegaT 窗口和窗格</p0> <s1>术语表窗格</s1>

xulihang
doc_src/UserInterface.xml

6141
Glossary pane
术语表窗格

xulihang
doc_src/UserInterface.xml

6142
The Glossary pane allows you to access your own collection of expressions and specialist terminology which you have built up in your glossary files.
术语表窗格允许您使用个人收集的词汇和专业术语，这些词汇都存放在术语表文件中。

xulihang
doc_src/UserInterface.xml

6143
It shows translation of terms found in the current segment.
它显示当前片段中找到的术语。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/UserInterface.xml

6144
The source segment in the example below was “<e0>Context menu command</e0>”, as in the Fuzzy Matches example above, and the terms shown were found in the glossaries, available (Microsoft's Term collection and Slovenian Linux User group Glossary).
下面例子中源片段为“<e0>Context menu command</e0>”（就像上面例子中模糊匹配显示的一样），显示出在可用的术语表（微软术语集和斯洛文尼亚语Linux用户组术语表）中找到的术语。

xulihang
doc_src/UserInterface.xml

6145
Glossaries
术语表

钢
doc_src/UserInterface.xml

6146
multi-word entry in the glossary
术语表中的多词条目

xulihang
doc_src/UserInterface.xml

6147
If you have TransTips option activated (<g0>Options → TransTips</g0>), you can right click on the highlighted word in the source segment to open a pop-up menu with suggested translation, as offered by your glossary.
如果您激活<g0>选项→翻译提示</g0>中的翻译提示，那么可在源片段中突出显示的单词上点击右键来打开包含由术语表提供的可选译文的弹出菜单。

xulihang
doc_src/UserInterface.xml

6148
Selecting one of them will insert it at the current cursor position into the target segment.
选择其中一个可将其插入到目标片段的当前光标位置。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/UserInterface.xml

6149
You can also highlight your preferred alternative in the glossary pane and insert it into the target by right clicking on the selection.
您可以让术语表窗格中的首选译文突出显示，并通过右键点击选区来将它插入目标片段中。

xulihang
doc_src/UserInterface.xml

6151
Dictionary pane
词典窗格

Fu Rhong
doc_src/UserInterface.xml

6152
Dictionaries are the electronic equivalents of printed dictionaries like Merriam Webster, Duden, Larousse etc., that you may have on your desk.
词典是等同于 Merriam Webster、Duden、Larousse 等桌面上的印刷词典的电子版本。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/UserInterface.xml

6153

请在<l0>词典</l0>章节中了解关于它们的更多信息

doc_src/UserInterface.xml

6154

doc_src/UserInterface.xml

6155
Multiple Translations pane
多选译文窗格

Fu Rhong
doc_src/UserInterface.xml

6156
A given source segment may require several different translations, depending on the context.
特定的源片段在不同的语境中可能需要集中不同的翻译。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/UserInterface.xml

6157
If the current translation of the segment does not fit, the user can select <g0>Edit → Create Alternative Translation</g0>.
如果片段的当前译文不适合，则用户可选择<g0>编辑→创建可选译文</g0>。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/UserInterface.xml

6158
The target text entered after that will be treated as an alternative translation of the source segment.
之后输入的目标文本会被视为当前源片段的可选译文。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/UserInterface.xml

6159
You can define one of the alternative - for instance the most probable among them - as default translation by selecting <g1>Edit → Use as Default Translation</g1>
您可以通过<g1>编辑→用作默认译文</g1>指定某个可选译文（例如其中可能性最大的译文）为默认译文。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/UserInterface.xml

6160
Notes pane
笔记窗格

Fu Rhong
doc_src/UserInterface.xml

6161
The translator can add notes to the opened segment, for instance to come back later to the segment and redo the translation, check that alternative translations are correct or to ask colleagues for their opinion.
译员可添加笔记到打开的片段（例如之后返回该片段并撤销译文、检查可选译文是否正确或询问同事的看法。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/UserInterface.xml

6162
You can browse through notes using <g0>GoTo → Next Note</g0> and <g1>GoTo → Previous Note</g1>.
您可通过<g0>前往→后一笔记</g0>和<g1>前往→前一笔记</g1>以浏览笔记。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/UserInterface.xml

6163
Comments pane
注解面板

Fu Rhong
doc_src/UserInterface.xml

6164
Some of the file formats, specialized for translation work, for instance PO, allow the inclusion of comments.
某些专门用于翻译工作的文件格式（例如PO）允许包含注释。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/UserInterface.xml

6165
This way the translator can be provided the context about the segment to be translated.
这样就为译者提供了待译片段的相关信息。

Fu Rhong

在机器翻译窗格中，打开后其中会包含由机器翻译工具为当前片段提供的翻译建议。

6172
Press <k0>Ctrl+M</k0> to replace the translation of the current segment with the suggested translation.

6177
The most frequently used functions are accessible with keyboard shortcuts, so once you become accustomed to them, you will no longer need to browse through the menus while translating.
最常用的功能可以使用键盘快捷键访问，因此当您习惯了使用它们之后，在翻译的时候根本不需要使用菜单。

doc_src/UserInterface.xml

6185
Project files
项目文件

Fu Rhong
doc_src/UserInterface.xml

6186
The Project Files window lists the project files and displays other project information.
项目文件窗口显示所有的项目文件和其他项目的信息。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/UserInterface.xml

6187
It is displayed automatically when OmegaT loads a project.
当 OmegaT 载入项目时这个窗口自动出现。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/UserInterface.xml

6188
<r0>Note:</r0> it is possible to inhibit this Project Files window displaying, by setting <e1>project_files_show_on_load</e1> to <e2>false</e2> in <f3>omegat.prefs</f3> file (accessible by Options / Access Configuration Folder menu).
<r0>提示：</r0>可以通过在<f3>omegat.prefs</f3>文件中将<e1>project_files_show_on_load</e1>设置为<e2>false</e2>来禁止显示此项目文件窗口（文件仍可通过选项/访问配置文件夹菜单访问）。

Doris
doc_src/UserInterface.xml

6189
<p0>Shortcuts</p0> <s1>Project files list - Ctrl+L</s1>
<p0>快捷键</p0> <s1>项目文件列表——Ctrl+L</s1>

Fu Rhong
doc_src/UserInterface.xml

6190
Use <g0>Ctrl+L<i1/></g0> to open and <k2>Esc</k2> to close it.
使用 <g0>Ctrl+L<i1/></g0> 打开，使用 <k2>Esc</k2> 关闭。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/UserInterface.xml

6191
The Project Files Window displays the following information:
项目文件窗口显示了下列信息：

Fu Rhong
doc_src/UserInterface.xml

6192
the total number of translatable files in the project.
项目中可翻译文件总数。

Doris
doc_src/UserInterface.xml

6193
These are the files present in the /source folder in a format that OmegaT is able to recognize.
这些是指以OmegaT能够识别的格式存储于/source文件夹中的文件。

Doris
doc_src/UserInterface.xml

6194
This number is displayed in brackets, next to the "Project file" title
该数据显示在“项目文件”标题旁边的括号内。

Doris
doc_src/UserInterface.xml

6195
the list of all translatable files in the project.
项目中所有待译文件组成的列表。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/UserInterface.xml

6196
Clicking on any file will open it for translation.
点击任何一份文件将打开它用于翻译

Doris
doc_src/UserInterface.xml

6197
Typing any text will open a Filter field where parts of filenames can be entered.
输入任何文本都会打开一个Filter字段，其中可以输入部分文件名。

Doris
doc_src/UserInterface.xml

6198
You can select a file with <k0>Up</k0> and <k1>Down</k1> keys, and open it for translation by pressing <k2>Enter</k2>
您可以使用<k0>Up</k0>和<k1>Down</k1>选择文件，然后按<k2> Enter</k2>打开此文件开始翻译。

Doris
doc_src/UserInterface.xml

6199
Note: filenames (in first column) can be sorted alphabetically by clicking in the header.
提示：单击标题可将文件名（第一列）按字母顺序排序。

Doris
doc_src/UserInterface.xml

6200
It also possible to change the position of a filename, by clicking on it and pressing <e0>Move ...</e0> buttons.
也可以通过单击并长按<e0>移动...</e0>按钮来更改文件名的位置。

Doris
doc_src/UserInterface.xml

6201
Right-clicking on a filename opens a popup that allows to open the source file and (if it exists) the target file.
右键单击文件名将打开一个弹出窗口，允许打开源文件（如果源文件存在）和目标文件。

Doris
doc_src/UserInterface.xml

6202
File entries include their names, file filter types, their encoding and the number of segments each file contains
每个文件条目包含它的名称、文件过滤器类型、编码和它所包含的片段数

Fu Rhong
doc_src/UserInterface.xml

6203
the total number of segments, the number of unique segments in the whole project, and the number of unique segments already translated are shown at the bottom
整个项目的片段总数、唯一片段数和已译唯一片段数显示在底部

xulihang
doc_src/UserInterface.xml

6204
The set of <e0>Unique </e0>segments is computed by taking all the segments and removing all duplicate segments.
<e0>唯一</e0>片段数目的计算方法为统计所有的片段并去除所有重复片段。

xulihang
doc_src/UserInterface.xml

6205
(The definition of “unique” is case-sensitive: "Run" and "run" are treated as being different)
（“唯一” 的判断方法是区分大小写的："Run" 和 "run" 被看作是不同的片段）

xulihang
doc_src/UserInterface.xml

6206
The difference between "Number of segments" and "Number of unique segments" provides an approximate idea of the number of repetitions in the text.
通过“片段数”和“唯一片段数”的差异可粗略估算出文本中有多少重复内容。

xulihang
doc_src/UserInterface.xml

6207
Note however that the numbers do not indicate how relevant the repetitions are: they could mean relatively long sentences repeated a number of times (in which case you are fortunate) or it could describe a table of keywords (not so fortunate).
但是请注意：该数字并未透露这些重复的相关性，它们可能是多次重复的相当长的句子（此时是幸运的）或关键字表格（不那么幸运了）。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/UserInterface.xml

6208
The <f0>project_stats.txt</f0> located in the omegat folder of your project contains more detailed segment information, broken down by file.
项目 omegat 文件夹中的 <f0>project_stats.txt</f0> 提供了每份文件更多的片段细节信息。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/UserInterface.xml

6209
Modifying the segmentation rules may have the effect of modifying the number of segments/unique segments.
修改分割规则可能改变片段数和唯一片段数。

xulihang
doc_src/UserInterface.xml

6210
This, however, should generally be avoided once you have started translating the project.
然而，一旦启动项目的翻译工作，就应该避免发生这样的事情。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/UserInterface.xml

6211
See the chapter <e0>Segmentation rules</e0> for more information.
请参阅<e0>分割规则</e0>章节了解更多信息。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/UserInterface.xml

6212
<p0>Source files</p0> <s1>Adding files to the project</s1>
<p0>源文件</p0> <s1>添加文件到项目</s1>

Fu Rhong
doc_src/UserInterface.xml

6213
<e0><i1/>Adding files to the project: </e0>You can add source files to the project by clicking on the "<g2>Import Source Files..."</g2> button.
<e0><i1/>添加文件到项目：</e0>您可以通过点击<g2>“导入源文件”</g2>按钮将源文件添加到项目中。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/UserInterface.xml

6214
This copies the selected files to the <f3>source</f3> folder and reloads the project to import the new files.
它将选中的文件拷贝到 <f3>/source</f3> 目录并重新载入项目以导入新文件。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/UserInterface.xml

6215
You can also add source files from Internet pages, written in MediaWiki, by clicking on<g4> "Import from MediaWiki"</g4> button and providing the corresponding URL.
通过点击<g4>“从 MediaWiki 导入”</g4>按钮并输入相应的网址，您还可以添加互联网页中用MediaWiki编写的源文件。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/UserInterface.xml

6216
<p0>Windows and panes in OmegaT</p0> <s1>Search pane</s1>
<p0>OmegaT 窗口和窗格</p0> <s1>搜索面板</s1>

Fu Rhong
doc_src/UserInterface.xml

6217
Search window
搜索窗口

Fu Rhong
doc_src/UserInterface.xml

6218

Fu Rhong
doc_src/UserInterface.xml

6219
You can also have several search windows open simultaneously.
可以同时打开多个搜索窗口。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/UserInterface.xml

6220
To open a new search window, use <k0> <k1>Ctrl</k1> <k2>F</k2> </k0> in the Main window.
在主窗口中使用<k0> <k1>Ctrl</k1> <k2>F</k2> </k0>可打开一个新的搜索窗口。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/UserInterface.xml

6221
The search window consists of a text field for search strings or keywords, flags and radio buttons for setting up the search and a display area containing the results of the search.
搜索窗口由三个部分组成：用于输入搜索字符串或关键字的文本框、用于设置搜索的标志和单选按钮、包含搜索结果的显示区域。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/UserInterface.xml

6222
See the chapter<e3> <l4>Searches</l4> </e3>for more information about the search window.
请参阅<e3> <l4>搜索</l4> </e3>章节来了解关于搜索窗口的更多信息。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/UserInterface.xml

6223

6224

Fu Rhong
doc_src/UserInterface.xml

6225
Tag validation
标签验证

Fu Rhong
doc_src/UserInterface.xml

6226
The tag validation window detects and lists any tag errors and inconsistencies in the translation.
标签检验窗口检测译文中出现的所有标签错误和不一致并列出来。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/UserInterface.xml

6227
Open the window with <g0>Ctrl+T.
使用<g0>Ctrl+T 打开该窗口。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/UserInterface.xml

6228
</g0>The window features a 3 column table with a link to the segment and its source and target contents:
</g0>该窗口显示了一个三列表格，其中列出了指向出错片段的链接及其原文和译文内容：

Fu Rhong
doc_src/UserInterface.xml

6229
<p0>Tag validation</p0> <s1>Window - figure</s1> <s2>Tags</s2>
<p0>标签验证</p0> <s1>窗口 - 配置</s1> <s2>标签</s2>

Fu Rhong
doc_src/UserInterface.xml

6230
Tag validation window
标签验证窗口

Fu Rhong
doc_src/UserInterface.xml

6231
Tags are highlighted in bold blue for easy comparison between the original and the translated contents.
标签用加粗蓝色突出显示，以便于对源内容和译后内容进行比较。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/UserInterface.xml

6232
Click on the link to jump to the segment in the Editor pane.
点击该链接可在编辑器窗格中跳转至该片段。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/UserInterface.xml

6233
Correct the error if necessary and press <g0>Ctrl+T</g0> to return to the tag validation window to correct other errors.
如果必要的话，修正错误然后按<g0>Ctrl+T</g0> 键返回标签验证窗口以修正其它错误。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/UserInterface.xml

6234
In the first and third case above tags are paired incorrectly, and in the second case the < sign is missing from the starting tag.
在上述的第一和第三种情况中，标签的错误成对出现，而在第二种情况中开始标记缺失了 < 标记。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/UserInterface.xml

6235
Tag errors are cases in which the tags in the translation do not correspond in order and number to the original segment.
标签错误是指译文中标签的顺序和数目与源片段不一致。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/UserInterface.xml

6236
Some tag scenarios flagged in the tag validation window are necessary and are benign, others will cause problems when the translated document is created.
在标签验证窗口中包含的某些情况的标签是必要的和良性的，但有些在创建已译文档时会导致问题。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/UserInterface.xml

6237
Tags generally represent some kind of formatting in the original text.
标签通常代表了原始文本中的某种格式。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/UserInterface.xml

6238
Simplifying the original text formatting in the source file before commencing translation greatly contributes to reducing the number of tags.
开始翻译前对源文本格式的简化很大程度上有助于减少标签的数目。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/UserInterface.xml

6239
<p0>Statistics</p0> <s1>Menu Tools</s1>
<p0>统计</p0> <s1>菜单工具</s1>

Fu Rhong
doc_src/UserInterface.xml

6240
Statistics
统计

Andrew
doc_src/UserInterface.xml

6241
<p0>Shortcuts</p0> <s1>Select All - Ctrl+A</s1>
<p0>快捷键</p0> <s1>选择所有——Ctrl+A</s1>

Fu Rhong
doc_src/UserInterface.xml

6242
<p0>Shortcuts</p0> <s1>Copy text - Ctrl+C</s1>
<p0>快捷键</p0> <s1>复制文本——Ctrl+C</s1>

Fu Rhong
doc_src/UserInterface.xml

6243
<p0>Shortcuts</p0> <s1>Paste text - Ctrl+V</s1>
<p0>快捷键</p0> <s1>粘贴文本——Ctrl+V</s1>

Fu Rhong
doc_src/UserInterface.xml

6244
The statistics window - accessed via <e0>Tools>Statistics </e0>- shows the statistics of the current OmegaT project, both in the summary form as well as in detail for every file to be translated.
统计窗口（通过<e0>工具>统计</e0>打开）显示了OmegaT当前项目的统计信息，包括整个项目的总的统计信息和其中每个待译文件的详细情况。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/UserInterface.xml

6245
The statistics shown is available as a tab-separated <f1>project_stats.txt</f1> file (subfolder <f2>omegat</f2>), ready to be loaded into a spreadsheet program for the user's convenience.
这里显示的统计信息是tab分隔的<f1>project_stats.txt</f1>文件（在<f2>omegat</f2>子文件夹），方便用户加载到电子表格程序。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/UserInterface.xml

6246
You can use <g3>Ctrl+A <i4/></g3><g5>, Ctrl+C <i6/></g5>, <g7>Ctrl+V <i8/></g7> to copy/paste the contents.
您可用<g3>Ctrl+A <i4/></g3><g5>、Ctrl+C <i6/></g5>、<g7>Ctrl+V <i8/></g7>复制/粘贴其中的内容。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/UserInterface.xml

6247
project statistics
项目统计

Fu Rhong
doc_src/UserInterface.xml

6248
<p0>Match Statistics</p0> <s1>Menu Tools</s1>
<p0>匹配统计</p0> <s1>工具菜单</s1>

Fu Rhong
doc_src/UserInterface.xml

6249
Match statistics
匹配统计

Fu Rhong
doc_src/UserInterface.xml

6250
The match statistics are accessed via<g0>Tools>Match Statistics.</g0> The evaluation is rather CPU intensive and can be time-consuming, so a progress bar is shown during the calculation.
通过<g0>工具/匹配统计</g0>可访问统计信息。该统计需要CPU进行繁重的运算而耗时较多，所以在计算时会显示进度条。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/UserInterface.xml

6251
As far as categories are concerned, the de facto industry standard of classifying matches into the following groups is used: Repetitions, Exact match, 95%-100%, 85%-94%, 75%-84%, 50%-74% and No match.
至于相关的分类，下面这些组的分类符合工业标准：重复率、精确匹配、95%-100%、85%-94%、75%-84%、50%-74%和无匹配。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/UserInterface.xml

6252
This information is computed for segments as well as for words and for characters (without and including spaces).
这些信息是针对片段、文字和字符（不包括空格）计算的。

Doris
doc_src/UserInterface.xml

6253
Note that there could be minor differences between the OmegaT counts and the numbers, provided by other CAT tools.
请注意，由其他CAT工具提供的数据同OmegaT提供的数据之间可能存在细微差异。

Doris
doc_src/UserInterface.xml

6254
Match statistics
匹配统计

Fu Rhong
doc_src/UserInterface.xml

6255
Note that these totals are a good (or as good as they can be) approximation of the work involved in the project and thus can serve as a basis for your cost and price calculations.
请注意，这些数据是对项目中所涉及工作的较好（或尽可能好的）估计，因此可以作为您估算成本和价格的基础。

Doris
doc_src/UserInterface.xml

6256
Spaces between segments are not taken into account in the last column.
在最后一列片段间的空格无需考虑。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/UserInterface.xml

6257
Repetitions stand for identical segments present several times in the text.
重复表示多次出现在文本中的相同片段。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/UserInterface.xml

6258
The first segment and its contents will be classified as "no match", and the rest of them as a repetition of the first.
第一个片段及其内容将被归类到“无匹配”中，而剩余片段则被视为第一个的重复。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/UserInterface.xml

6259
If the translation for several identical source segments already exists in the translation memory of the project, these segments, together with other, already translated unique segments, will be classified as an "Exact match".
如果在项目的翻译记忆中存在多个相同源片段的译文，这些及其他已译唯一片段将被归类为“精确匹配”。

xulihang
doc_src/UserInterface.xml

6260
The number of unique segments, if needed, is provided in the standard statistics window, regardless of whether they have been translated or not.
在需要时，标准统计窗口中会显示唯一片段数，不论它们是否已经翻译。

xulihang
doc_src/UserInterface.xml

6261
The rest of the categories (50-100%) involves untranslated segments with a fuzzy match.
分类中的其他部分 (50-100%) 包含了具有模糊匹配的未译片段。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/UserInterface.xml

6262
Fuzzy matches can come from the <f0>/tm</f0> folder as well - and not just from the internal translation memory in <f1>/omegaT,</f1> as is the case for repetitions and exact matches.
在统计重复和精确匹配时模糊匹配不仅可以来自 <f1>/omegaT</f1>，也可以可以来自 <f0>/tm</f0> 文件夹。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/UserInterface.xml

6263
The only difference with matches from the <f2>project_save</f2> translation memory is that external TMs cannot give exact matches, only 100%.
与 <f2>project_save</f2> 翻译记忆的匹配的唯一区别是外部 TM 中的统计不会得到精确匹配，而只是 100%。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/UserInterface.xml

6264
If one does not wish to use external TMs for counting, one will either have to empty the /tm folder or change the project setup (temporarily) so that the value for /tm points to a different location.
如果不想使用外部翻译记忆参与统计，可以让 /tm 文件夹为空或临时改变项目设置以让 /tm 指向其他地方。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/UserInterface.xml

6265
<p0>Shortcuts</p0> <s1>Select All - Ctrl+A</s1>
<p0>快捷键</p0> <s1>选择所有——Ctrl+A</s1>

Fu Rhong
doc_src/UserInterface.xml

6266
<p0>Shortcuts</p0> <s1>copy text - Ctrl+C</s1>
<p0>快捷键</p0> <s1>复制文本——Ctrl+C</s1>

Doris
doc_src/UserInterface.xml

6267
<p0>Shortcuts</p0> <s1>Paste text - Ctrl+V</s1>
<p0>快捷键</p0> <s1>粘贴文本——Ctrl+V</s1>

Fu Rhong
doc_src/UserInterface.xml

6268
The Match Statistics are tab-separated and you can use <g0>Ctrl+A <i1/></g0><g2>, Ctrl+C <i3/></g2>, <g4>Ctrl+V <i5/></g4> to copy/paste them, for instance into a spreadsheet or into your cost-accounting application.
该匹配统计是 tab 分割的，您可用 <g0>Ctrl+A <i1/></g0><g2>, Ctrl+C <i3/></g2>, <g4>Ctrl+V <i5/></g4> 来复制/粘贴它们，例如到工作表或费用统计程序中。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/UserInterface.xml

6269
Once computed, the data also available in <f6>omegat/project_stats_match.txt.</f6> Note that the file is time-stamped, as the calculation (contrary to the standard statistics) is not instantaneous and can thus quickly become obsolete.
在计算后，该数据还可以在 <f6>omegat/project_stats_match.txt</f6> 中找到。需要注意的是该文件是有时间戳记录的，因为计算不是瞬时的（相对于统计），所以可能很快过时。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/UserInterface.xml

6270
<p0>Menu Help</p0> <s1>Help browser</s1>
<p0>帮助菜单</p0> <s1>帮助浏览器</s1>

Fu Rhong

帮助浏览器

Fu Rhong
doc_src/UserInterface.xml

Fu Rhong

6273

xulihang

6274
The help browser (which displays this manual) can be opened by pressing <k0><i1/>F1</k0> or navigating to <g2><i3/>Help → User Manual...</g2> in the main menu.
帮助浏览器（显示本手册）可通过按 <k0><i1/>F1</k0> 或调用主菜单中的<g2><i3/>帮助→用户手册...</g2>条目来打开。

xulihang
doc_src/UserInterface.xml

6275
In the window, the manual and two buttons are displayed: Back and Contents.
在该窗口中会显示手册和两个按钮：退后和内容。

Fu Rhong

6276
The user manual is an HTML document with links to different chapters.
用户手册是一份包含各个不同章节链接的 HTML 文档。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/UserInterface.xml

6277
Clicking on a link as you would do in a web browser brings the desired page to the front.
像在网页浏览器中那样点击一个链接将会打开要看的页面。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/UserInterface.xml

6278
The user manual is located in the docs subfolder under the OmegaT installation folder, so you may can, for instance, view the English documentation by opening the <f0>docs/en/index.html </f0>file in your browser.
用户手册存放在 OmegaT 安装目录的 doc 子目录中，因此可在浏览器中打开 <f0>doc/en/index.hmtl</f0> 文件来查看英文文档。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/UserInterface.xml

6279
Opening the user manual in this way also enables you to follow external links, as the built-in help browser does not accept external Internet links.
用这种方法，您也可以打开外部的链接，因为内建的帮助浏览器并不接受外部互联网链接。

Fu Rhong
doc_src/UserInterface.xml

readme_zh_CN.txt

6281
What is OmegaT?
什么是OmegaT？

xulihang
readme_zh_CN.txt

6282
===============
未翻译

没有修改者
readme_zh_CN.txt

6283
OmegaT is a free and open source multiplatform Computer Assisted Translation
tool with fuzzy matching, translation memory, keyword search, glossaries, and
translation leveraging into updated projects.
OmegaT 是一种免费开源的跨平台计算机辅助翻译工具软件，包含模糊匹配、翻译记忆、关键词搜索、术语表和协作翻译等功能

xulihang
readme_zh_CN.txt

6284
Licensing information
=====================
许可信息
=====================

xulihang
readme_zh_CN.txt

6285
OmegaT is available under the terms of the GNU General Public License as
published by the Free Software Foundation, either version 3 of the License, or
(at your option) any later version.
该程序是免费软件，遵循 FSF 的 GNU General Public License v3或者更高版本，你可以对它进行编辑或者重新发布。

xulihang
readme_zh_CN.txt

6286
You can find the text of the license in
/docs/OmegaT-license.txt.
你可以在此找到证书的文本：
/docs/OmegaT-license.txt.

xulihang
readme_zh_CN.txt

6287
OmegaT uses a number of librairies.
OmegaT使用了许多类库。

xulihang
readme_zh_CN.txt

6288
The license of each library is mentionned
in /lib/licenses/Licenses.txt.
每个类库的许可证书在以下文本中都有提到：/lib/licenses/Licenses.txt。

xulihang
readme_zh_CN.txt

===================================
安装OmegaT的要求
===================================

xulihang
readme_zh_CN.txt

6290
OmegaT requires the Java Runtime Environment (JRE) version 1.8 or higher to be
installed on your system.
OmegaT需要您的系统安装了Java运行环境（JRE）1.8或者更高的版本。

xulihang
readme_zh_CN.txt

6291
We recommend using OmegaT packages that include the JRE, to save you the
trouble of selecting, obtaining and installing it.
我们推荐使用自带JRE的OmegaT安装包，免去您安装JRE的麻烦。

xulihang
readme_zh_CN.txt

and the linux-install.sh script, and execute the script with ./linux-
install.sh.
要使用此脚本，请打开终端窗口（控制台），进入包含OmegaT.jar和linux-install.sh的目录并执行./linux-install.sh。

click on that shortcut.
* Windows用户：
若在安装时您选择创建了桌面快捷方式，那么双击它。

xulihang
readme_zh_CN.txt

6313
The install program can create shortcuts for you in the start menu, on the
desktop and in the quick launch area.
* Windows用户：
安装程序可以在开始菜单、桌面和快速启动栏创建快捷方式。

xulihang

6314
You can also manually drag the file
OmegaT.exe to the start menu, the desktop or the quick launch area to link it
from there.
您也可以手动将 OmegaT.exe 文件拖动到开始菜单、桌面或快速启动栏，以将其链接到该处。

xulihang
readme_zh_CN.txt

6315
If you can see the file OmegaT but not OmegaT.exe in your File Manager
(Windows Explorer), change the settings so that file extensions are displayed.
如果您能在文件管理器（Windows资源管理器）中看到OmegaT但没有OmegaT.exe文件，请修改此设置以显示文件扩展名。

6331
Launching OmegaT from the command line (all systems)
====================================================
从命令行启动OmegaT（支持所有系统）
====================================================

xulihang
readme_zh_CN.txt

6332
The command to launch OmegaT is:
启动OmegaT的命令是：

xulihang
readme_zh_CN.txt

6333
cd <folder where the file OmegaT.jar is located>
cd <OmegaT.jar 文件所在文件夹>

Fu Rhong
readme_zh_CN.txt

6334
<name and path of the Java executable file> -jar OmegaT.jar
<Java 可执行文件的路径和名称> -jar OmegaT.jar

Fu Rhong
readme_zh_CN.txt

6335
(The Java executable file is the file java on Linux and java.exe on Windows.
（Java 可执行文件即 Linux 系统中的 java 文件和 Windows 系统中的 java.exe 文件。

Fu Rhong
readme_zh_CN.txt

6336
If Java is installed at system level and is in the command path, the full path
need not be entered.)
如果系统上安装了Java且处于命令行路径中，则无需输入它的完整路径。）

xulihang
readme_zh_CN.txt

6370
OmegaT User Interface Language
OmegaT 用户界面语言

钢
release/win32-specific/CustomMessages.ini

6371
User interface language for OmegaT
OmegaT 所使用的用户界面语言

钢
release/win32-specific/CustomMessages.ini

6372
If you want to use the same language in OmegaT as the one used during installation, check the box below.
如果要在 OmegaT 中使用安装时所用的语言，请勾选下面的方框。

钢
release/win32-specific/CustomMessages.ini

6373
Otherwise, OmegaT will use the language of the operating system.
否则，OmegaT 将会使用操作系统的语言。

钢
release/win32-specific/CustomMessages.ini

6374
Use the installation language in OmegaT
在 OmegaT 中使用安装时的语言。

钢
release/win32-specific/CustomMessages.ini

6512
The OmegaT project
OmegaT 项目

cpeishan
website/about.html

6513
The OmegaT project is maintained by an informal, international group of volunteers.
OmegaT项目由一个非正式的国际志愿者组织维护。

cpeishan
website/about.html

6514
Its purpose is to develop, distribute and support the use of OmegaT, an open-source translation memory software application.
其目的是开发，分发和支持使用OmegaT，一个开源翻译记忆软件应用程序。

cpeishan
website/about.html

6515

6545

6552
User manuals
用户手册

cpeishan
website/documentation.html

6553
OmegaT is supplied with a comprehensive user manual.
OmegaT 提供了一份全面详细的用户手册。

cpeishan
website/documentation.html

6554
To call up the manual from within OmegaT, simply select Help > Users manual, or press F1.
选择 "帮助 > 用户手册", 或按 F1，调用OmegaT用户手册。

cpeishan
website/documentation.html

6555
An Instant Start Guide, which guides you through the main procedures and functions of OmegaT, is displayed in the OmegaT user interface by default.
默认情况下,  OmegaT 用户界面上显示的 "即时启动向导"指导用户完成 OmegaT 的主要步骤和功能。

cpeishan
website/documentation.html

6556
You can also call up the user manual supplied with OmegaT without launching OmegaT itself.
用户也能在OmegaT未启动时调用用户手册。

cpeishan
website/documentation.html

6557
It can be found in the "docs" folder in your OmegaT program folder.
用户可在OmegaT项目文件夹的docs文件夹中找到用户手册。

cpeishan
website/documentation.html

6661
Web Start

Zenobia Fang
website/download.html

6662
The Web Start version is the "install and forget" version.<br0/>
网页启动版本为“简单安装'版本。<br0/>

Zenobia Fang
website/download.html

6663
<s1>The benefit</s1>: once launched, future updates of the Web Start version will be installed automatically on your computer.<br2/>
<s1>优点</s1>: 一旦启动，网页启动版本之后的更新将自动安装在您的电脑上。<br2/>

Zenobia Fang
website/download.html

6664
<s3>The drawback</s3>: at present, this version cannot be used in conjunction with plug-ins, so not all functions are available.
<s3>调查问卷</s3>: 目前，该版本不能和插件一起使用，因此部分功能不可用。

Zenobia Fang
website/download.html

For installation on other operating systems (such as FreeBSD and Solaris).<br0/>

6673
<i1>OmegaT can be installed on any operating system capable of running version 1.6 of the Java runtime environment.</i1>
<i1>OmegaT 可安装在任何适应 Java 1.6 运行环境的操作系统上。</i1>

Zenobia Fang
website/download.html

6674
Select whether to download OmegaT with or without the Java Runtime Environment (JRE) included.
选择下载是否包含 Java 运行环境（JRE）的 OmegaT。

Zenobia Fang
website/download.html

6675
If a suitable JRE is already installed on your Windows system, select "Without JRE".
如果 Windows 系统中已经安装了适用的 JRE， 选择“不包含 JRE 版本”。

Zenobia Fang
website/download.html

6676
If not, or if you are not sure, select "with JRE".
如果未安装或不确定，选择“包含 JRE 版本”。

Zenobia Fang
website/download.html

6677
OmegaT will usually run on any Linux system on which a suitable version of the Java Runtime Environment (JRE) can be be installed.
OmegaT 可在任何能安装 Java 运行环境的 Linux 系统上运行。

Zenobia Fang
website/download.html

6678
OmegaT currently requires version 1.6 of the JRE or later.
OmegaT 现要求 JRE 1.6 或更高版本。

Zenobia Fang
website/download.html

6679
To check what version of the JRE, if any, is installed on your Linux system, open a console (command-line window) and type:
查看安装在 Linux 系统上的 JRE 版本，打开控制台（命令行窗口）和类型：

Zenobia Fang
website/download.html

6680
$ <s0>java -version</s0>
$ <s0>java—版本</s0>

Zenobia Fang
website/download.html

6681
If you are unsure whether a suitable JRE is already installed on your system, you can still download and install an OmegaT version with JRE.
如不确定系统中是否已安装了适用的 JRE，您可下载并安装包含 JRE 的 OmegaT 版本。

Zenobia Fang
website/download.html

6682
This version of the JRE will only be used locally for OmegaT, will not conflict with, override or uninstall any other JRE installations, and is therefore safe to use.
这个版本的 JRE 只会在本地用于 OmegaT，不会与安装的其他 JRE 冲突，不会覆盖或卸载任何其他安装的 JRE。

Zenobia Fang
website/download.html

6683
With JRE
包含 JRE

Zenobia Fang
website/download.html

6684
The "batteries included" version of OmegaT, with its own Java Runtime Environment.
“内置配置”的 OmegaT 版本，有其独立的 JRE。

Zenobia Fang
website/download.html

6685

6711

旧的 MS Word、Excel 和 Powerpoint 格式的文件可以在转换到等效的 Microsoft Office 格式文件后翻译，或者也可使用 OpenOffice.org 或 LibreOffice（同样免费）中转换成 Office Open XML 格式。

6747
With/without JRE
包含/不包含 JRE

Zenobia Fang
website/download.html

6748
In order to run, OmegaT requires the Java Runtime Environment (JRE) to be installed on your computer.
要想运行 OmegaT，电脑上必须安装 Java 运行环境（JRE）。

Zenobia Fang
website/download.html

6749
If you are confident that a suitable version of the JRE is already installed on your computer, you can download a version of OmegaT without the JRE.
如果您确定电脑中已经安装了适用的 JRE，您可下载不包含 JRE 的 OmegaT 版本。

Zenobia Fang
website/download.html

6750
The download will be faster, and the installation will require less space on your hard drive.
下载会更快，安装占用硬盘空间更小。

Zenobia Fang
website/download.html

6751
In this case, do not select the Default version; select a different version (e.g. Standard or Latest), then select a version marked "Java not included".
在此情况下，请勿选择默认版本；选择不同版本（例如标准或最新版本），然后选择标记“不包含 Java”的版本。

Zenobia Fang
website/download.html

6752
If you install the OmegaT version with JRE even though the JRE is already installed on your computer, OmegaT's JRE will be installed separately and will not conflict with it.
如果您在电脑上已安装 JRE 的情况下下载了包含 JRE 的 OmegaT 版本，OmegaT 的 JRE 会独立安装，不会与已有的 JRE 冲突

Zenobia Fang
website/download.html

6753
It is therefore always safe to install the version of OmegaT with JRE.
因此，安装含有 JRE 的 OmegaT 总是安全的。

Zenobia Fang
website/download.html

6754
If you are unsure whether or not you have a suitable version of the JRE, select a version with JRE (or the Default version).
如果您不确定您是否已安装了适用的 JRE 版本，选择包含 JRE 的版本（或默认版本）。

Zenobia Fang
website/download.html

6755
<s0>Mac OS X users</s0>: the JRE is installed on Mac OS X by default; there is therefore no version for Mac OS X with the JRE.
<s0>Mac OS X 用户</s0>：Mac OS X 上已默认安装 JRE；因此，不提供 Mac OS X 上的包含 JRE 版本。

Zenobia Fang
website/download.html

6756
<s0>Linux users</s0>: most Linux distributions are supplied with a Java Runtime Environment, but some open-source implementations do not work properly with OmegaT (although this may not be immediately apparent).
<s0>Linux 用户</s0>：多数 Linux 发行版都提供了 Java 运行环境，但一些开源实现不能很好地处理 OmegaT（尽管可能并不明显）。

Zenobia Fang
website/download.html

6757
If you are relatively new to Linux, we advise you to select an OmegaT version with the JRE included.
如果您是 Linux 的新用户，我们建议您选择包含 JRE 的 OmegaT 版本。

Zenobia Fang
website/download.html

6758
More experienced Linux users may prefer to install the Oracle (formerly Sun) JRE at system level.
较有经验的 Linux 用户可能更喜欢在系统上按照 Oracle（以前的 Sun）JRE。

Zenobia Fang
website/download.html

6760
Mac OS X has a feature called Gatekeeper that increases security by making it difficult to run unsigned programs.
Mac OS X 有一个叫做 Gatekeeper 的功能，该功能通过增加运行未签字程序的难度来增加安全性。

Zenobia Fang
website/download.html

6761
OmegaT for Mac OS X is available in both signed and unsigned versions; they are functionally identical, but the signed version is preferred as it is recognized by the system as being published by a known developer.
Mac OS X 上的 OmegaT 签名和未签名版都可用；他们在功能上相同，但首选签名版本，因为其是由已知开发者发布的。

Zenobia Fang
website/download.html

6762

在发布签名版本时可能会有延迟。

Zenobia Fang
website/download.html

6763

用户也可使用未签名版本替代；如果您在启动应用时遇到问题，请查看 <a0>如何打开未认证开发者的应用</a0>.

6773
The permissions you give to this version (which may be described as "unrestricted access to the computer") are no different from the permissions you assign to the local version, i.e., an access to the hard drive of your computer.
您赋予该版本的权限（可能会被描述为“对计算机的无限制访问”）与您赋予本地版本的权限相同，比如，可访问您电脑的硬盘。

6775
Privacy information: OmegaT Java Web Start does not save any of your information to OmegaT's web servers.
